text: Jason Statham is an English actor who broke into film with 1998's ‘ Lock , Stock , and Two Smoking Barrels ’ and later starred in high - profile action movie franchises , including ‘ DT Transporter , ’ ‘ Crank , ’ ‘ DT Expendables ’ and ‘ DT Fast and DT Furious . ’ English action star Jason Statham has convincingly portrayed a host of unsavory , yet oddly endearing , tough guys ( hit men , thieves , con men , assassins , super spies and bodyguards ) who can generally be counted on to dish out beat downs and lead car chases while intercutting DT action with a well - timed quip . But before he ever stepped foot on a movie set , Statham ’s life was just as colorful as DT characters he ’s played onscreen . From being an Olympic diver to fashion model to even having a side gig in DT black market , Statham amassed a unique set of skills WDT perfectly positioned him to be an action star . As of 2019 , Statham ’s net worth is estimated to be around $ 50 million . Statham once worked as a con artist , selling fake perfume and stolen jewelry on DT streets . " DT was street theater , " Statham VBD in a 2007 interview with DT Chicago Tribune . " PRP work with a team — some NNS in DT crowd , some guys who stand lookout for DT police . text: As DT Official Story of DT 1980 October Surprise case crumbles — with JJ revelations IN key evidence was hidden from investigators of a congressional task force and IN internal doubts were suppressed — history must finally confront DT troubling impression WDT remains : IN disgruntled elements of DT CIA and Israel ’s Likud hardliners teamed up to remove a U.S. NN from office . Indeed , PRP is this disturbing conclusion — perhaps even more than DT idea of a Republican dirty trick — WDT MD explain DT longstanding and determined cover - up of this political scandal . Too JJ powerful interests do not VB DT American NNS to accept even DT possibility IN U.S. intelligence operatives and a longtime ally MD intervene to oust a NN who had impinged on what those two groups considered their vital interests . To accept DT scenario MD mean IN two of DT great fears of American democracy had come true — George Washington ’s warning against DT dangers of “ entangling alliances ” and Harry Truman ’s concern IN DT clandestine operations of DT CIA had DT makings of an “ American Gestapo . ” PRP is far easier to assure DT American NNS IN no such thing MD occur , IN Israel ’s Likud — whatever its differences with Washington over Middle East peace policies — MD never seek to subvert a U.S. NN , and IN CIA dissidents — no matter how frustrated by political constraints — MD never sabotage their own NN . But DT evidence points in DT direction , and EX are some points WDT are not in dispute . For instance , EX is no doubt IN CIA Old Boys and Likudniks had strong motives for seeking NNP Jimmy Carter ’s defeat in 1980 . Inside DT CIA , Carter and his CIA Director Stansfield Turner were blamed for firing JJ of DT free - wheeling covert operatives from DT Vietnam era , for ousting legendary spymaster Ted Shackley , and for failing to protect longtime U.S. allies ( and friends of DT CIA ) , such as Iran ’s Shah and Nicaragua ’s dictator Anastasio Somoza . As for Israel , Likud Prime Minister Menachem Begin was furious over Carter ’s high - handed actions at Camp David in 1978 forcing Israel to trade DT occupied Sinai to Egypt for a peace deal . Begin feared IN Carter MD use his second term to bully Israel into accepting a Palestinian NN on West Bank lands WDT Likud considered part of Israel ’s divinely granted territory . Former Mossad and Foreign Ministry official David Kimche described Begin ’s attitude in his 1991 book , DT Last Option , saying IN Israeli officials had gotten wind of “ collusion ” between Carter and Egyptian NNP Anwar Sadat “ to force Israel to abandon her refusal to withdraw from territories occupied in 1967 , including Jerusalem , and to agree to DT establishment of a Palestinian NN . ” Kimche continued , “ This plan — prepared behind Israel ’s back and without her knowledge — must rank as a unique attempt in NNP NNPS ’s diplomatic history of short - changing a friend and ally by deceit and manipulation . ” However , Begin recognized IN DT scheme required Carter winning a second term in 1980 when , Kimche wrote , “ he MD be free to compel Israel to accept a settlement of DT Palestinian problem on his and Egyptian terms , without having to fear DT backlash of DT American Jewish lobby . ” In his 1992 memoir , Profits of War , Ari Ben-Menashe , an Israeli military intelligence officer who worked with Likud , agreed IN Begin and other Likud leaders held Carter in contempt . “ Begin loathed Carter for DT peace agreement forced upon him at Camp David , ” Ben-Menashe wrote . “ As Begin saw PRP , DT agreement took away Sinai from Israel , did not create a comprehensive peace , and left DT Palestinian issue hanging on Israel ’s back . ” So , in order to buy NN for Israel to “ VB DT facts on DT ground ” by moving Jewish settlers into DT West Bank , Begin felt Carter ’s reelection had to be prevented . A different NN RB presumably MD give Israel a freer hand to deal with problems on its northern border with Lebanon . As for DT CIA Old Boys , legendary CIA officer Miles Copeland told me IN “ DT CIA within DT CIA ” — DT inner-most circle of powerful intelligence figures who felt PRP understood best DT strategic needs of DT NNP NNPS — believed Carter and his naïve faith in American democratic ideals represented a grave threat to DT nation . “ Carter really believed in all DT principles WDT PRP talk about in DT West , ” Copeland VBD , shaking his mane of white hair . “ As smart as Carter is , he did believe in Mom , apple pie and DT corner drug store . And those things WDT are good in America are good everywhere else . … “ Carter , I say , was not a stupid man , ” Copeland VBD , adding IN Carter had an even worse flaw : “ He was a principled man . ” These attitudes of “ DT CIA within DT CIA ” and DT Likudniks appear to stem from their genuine beliefs IN PRP needed to protect what PRP regarded as vital interests of their respective NNS . DT CIA Old Boys thought PRP understood DT true strategic needs of DT NNP NNPS and Likud believed fervently in a “ Greater Israel . ” However , DT lingering October Surprise mystery is whether these two groups followed their strongly held feelings into a treacherous bid , in league with Republicans , to prevent Carter from gaining DT release of 52 hostages then held in Iran and thus torpedoing his reelection hopes . Carter ’s inability to resolve DT hostage crisis did set DT stage for Ronald Reagan ’s landslide victory in November 1980 as American voters reacted to DT long - running hostage humiliation by turning to a candidate PRP believed MD be a tougher player on DT international stage . Reagan ’s macho image was reinforced when DT Iranians released DT hostages immediately after he was inaugurated on Jan. 20 , 1981 , ending DT 444 - day standoff . DT coincidence of timing , which Reagan ’s supporters cited as proof IN foreign enemies feared DT JJ NN , gave momentum to Reagan ’s larger agenda , including sweeping tax cuts tilted toward DT wealthy , reduced NN regulation of corporations , and renewed reliance on fossil fuels . ( Carter ’s solar panels were pointedly dismantled from DT White House roof . ) Reagan ’s victory RB was great NN for CIA cold - warriors who were rewarded with DT choice of NNP War II spymaster ( and dedicated cold - warrior ) William Casey to be CIA director . Casey then purged CIA analysts who were detecting a declining Soviet Union WDT desired détente and replaced them with NNS IN DT young and ambitious Robert Gates , who agreed IN DT Soviets were on DT march and IN DT NNP NNPS needed a massive military expansion to counter them . Further , Casey again embraced old - NN CIA swashbuckling in Third NNP NNS and took pleasure in misleading or bullying members of Congress when PRP insisted on DT CIA oversight WDT had been forced on NNP Gerald Ford and had been accepted by NNP Carter . To Casey , CIA oversight became a game of hide and seek . As for Israel , Begin was pleased to find DT Reagan administration far less demanding about peace deals with DT Arabs , giving Israel NN to expand its West Bank settlements . Reagan and his team RB acquiesced to Israel ’s invasion of Lebanon in 1982 , a drive north WDT expelled DT Palestine Liberation Organization but RB led to DT slaughters at DT Sabra and Shatila refugee camps . And , behind DT scenes , Reagan gave a green light to Israeli weapons shipments to Iran ( which was fighting a war with Israel ’s greater enemy , Iraq ) . DT weapons sales helped Israel rebuild its contacts inside Iran and to turn large profits , which were then used to help finance West Bank settlements . In another important move , Reagan credentialed a JJ generation of pro-Israeli American ideologues known as DT neoconservatives , a move WDT MD pay big dividends for Israel in DT future as these bright and articulate operatives fought for Israeli interests both inside DT U.S. NN and through their opinion - leading roles in DT major American NN NN . In other words , if DT disgruntled CIA Old Boys and DT determined Likudniks did participate in an October Surprise scheme to unseat Jimmy Carter , PRP surely got much of what PRP were after . Yet , while motive is an important element in solving a mystery , PRP does not constitute proof by itself . What must be examined is whether EX is evidence IN DT motive was acted upon , whether Menachem Begin ’s NN and disgruntled CIA officers covertly assisted DT Reagan - Bush campaign in contacting Iranian officials to thwart Carter ’s hostage negotiations . On DT point DT evidence is strong though perhaps not ironclad . Still , a well - supported narrative does exist describing how DT October Surprise scheme MD have gone down with DT help of CIA personnel , Begin ’s NN , some right - wing intelligence figures in Europe , and a handful of other power brokers in DT NNP NNPS . Even before Iran took DT American hostages on Nov. 4 , 1979 , disgruntled CIA veterans had been lining up behind DT presidential candidacy of their former boss , George H.W. Bush . Casting off their traditional cloak of non-partisanship and anonymity , PRP were volunteering as foot soldiers in Bush ’s campaign . CD joke about Bush ’s announcement of his candidacy on NNP 1 , 1979 , was IN “ half DT audience was wearing raincoats . ” Bill Colby , Bush ’s predecessor as CIA director , VBD Bush “ had a flood of NNS from DT CIA who joined his supporters . PRP were retirees devoted to him for what he had done ” in defending DT spy agency in 1976 when DT CIA came under heavy criticism for spying on Americans , assassination plots and other abuses . Reagan ’s foreign policy adviser Richard Allen described DT group working on DT Bush campaign as a “ plane load of disgruntled former CIA ” officers who were “ playing cops and robbers . ” All told , at least two dozen former CIA officials went to work for Bush . Among them was DT CIA ’s director of security , Robert Gambino , who joined DT Bush campaign immediately after leaving DT CIA where he oversaw security investigations of senior Carter officials and thus knew about potentially damaging personal information . Besides DT ex-CIA personnel who joined DT Bush campaign , other pro-Bush intelligence officers remained inside DT CIA while making clear their political preference . “ DT seventh floor of Langley was plastered with ‘ Bush for NNP ’ signs , ” VBD senior CIA analyst George Carver , referring to DT floor WDT housed senior CIA officials . Carter administration officials RB grew concerned about DT deep personal ties between DT former CIA officers in Bush ’s campaign and active - duty CIA personnel who continued to hold sensitive jobs under Carter . For instance , Gambino , DT 25 - NN CIA veteran who oversaw personnel security checks , and CIA officer Donald Gregg , who served as a CIA representative on Carter ’s National Security Council , “ are good friends who knew each other from DT CIA , ” according to an unpublished part of a report by a House task force WDT investigated DT October Surprise issue in 1992 . [ I found this deleted section — still marked “ secret ” — in unpublished task force files in 1994 . ] Perhaps most significantly , Bush quietly enlisted Theodore Shackley , DT legendary CIA covert operations specialist known as DT “ blond ghost . ” During DT Cold War , Shackley had run JJ of DT CIA ’s most controversial paramilitary operations , from Vietnam and Laos to DT JMWAVE operations against Fidel Castro ’s Cuba . In those operations , Shackley had supervised DT work of hundreds of CIA officers and developed powerful bonds of loyalty with JJ of his subordinates . For instance , Donald Gregg had served under Shackley ’s command in Vietnam . When Bush was CIA director in 1976 , he appointed Shackley to a top clandestine job , associate deputy director for operations , laying DT foundation for Shackley ’s possible rise to director and cementing Shackley ’s loyalty to Bush . When Shackley had a falling out with Carter ’s CIA Director Turner in 1979 , Shackley quit DT agency . Privately , Shackley believed IN Turner had devastated DT agency by pushing out hundreds of covert officers , JJ of them Shackley ’s former subordinates . By early 1980 , DT Republicans RB were complaining IN PRP were being kept in DT dark about progress on DT Iran hostage negotiations . George Cave , then a top CIA specialist on Iran , told me IN DT “ Democrats never briefed DT Republicans ” on sensitive developments , creating suspicions among DT Republicans . So , DT Republicans sought out their own sources of information regarding DT hostage crisis . Shackley began monitoring Carter ’s progress on negotiations through his contacts with Iranians in Europe , Cave VBD . “ Ted , I VBP , had a couple of contacts in Germany , ” VBD Cave . “ I VBP he talked to them . I do n’t VB how far PRP went . … Ted was very active on DT thing in DT winter / spring of 1980 . ” Author David Corn RB got wind of DT Shackley - Bush connection when he was researching his biography of Shackley , Blond Ghost . “ Within DT spook NN DT belief spread IN Shackley was close to Bush , ” Corn wrote . “ Rafael Quintero [ an anti-Castro Cuban with close ties to DT CIA ] was saying IN Shackley met with Bush every week . He told CD associate IN should Reagan and Bush triumph , Shackley was considered a potential DCI , ” DT abbreviation for CIA director . Some of DT legendary CIA officers from an even earlier generation , those who had helped overthrow Iran ’s elected NN in 1953 and put DT Shah on DT Peacock Throne , RB injected themselves into DT hostage crisis . Miles Copeland , CD of DT agency ’s old Middle East hands , claimed in his memoir , DT Game Player , IN he and his CIA chums pondered their own hostage rescue plan while organizing an informal support group for DT Bush campaign , called “ Spooks for Bush . ” In a 1990 interview , Copeland told me IN “ DT way PRP saw Washington at DT NN was IN DT struggle was really not between DT Left and DT Right , DT liberals and DT conservatives , as between DT Utopians and DT realists , DT pragmatists . “ Carter was a Utopian . He believed , honestly , IN PRP must do DT right thing and take your chance on DT consequences . He told me DT . He literally believed DT . ” Copeland ’s deep Southern accent spit out DT words with a mixture of amazement and disgust . Copeland ’s contacts at DT NN included CIA veteran Archibald Roosevelt and former Secretary of NNP Henry Kissinger — both of whom were close to David Rockefeller whose Chase Manhattan Bank handled billions of dollars in DT Shah ’s accounts , a fortune WDT DT Iranian mullahs wanted to lay their hands on . “ EX were JJ of PRP — myself along with Henry Kissinger , David Rockefeller , Archie Roosevelt in DT CIA at DT NN — PRP believed very strongly IN PRP were showing a kind of weakness , which NNS in Iran and elsewhere in DT NN hold in great contempt , ” Copeland VBD . As Copeland and his friends contemplated what to do regarding DT hostage crisis , he reached out to other of his old CIA buddies . According to DT Game Player , Copeland turned to ex-CIA counter - intelligence chief James Angleton . DT famed spy hunter “ brought to lunch a Mossad chap who confided IN his service had identified at least half of DT ‘ students , ’ even to DT extent of having their home addresses in Tehran , ” Copeland wrote . “ He gave me a rundown on what sort of kids PRP were . Most of them , he VBD , were just DT , kids . ” CD of DT young Israeli intelligence agents assigned to DT task of figuring out who was who in DT JJ Iranian power structure was Ari Ben-Menashe , who was born in Iran but emigrated to Israel as a teen - ager . Not only did he speak fluent Farsi , but he had school friends who were rising within DT JJ revolutionary bureaucracy . In his memoir , Profits of War , Ben-Menashe offered his own depiction of Copeland ’s initiative . Though Copeland was generally regarded as a CIA “ Arabist ” who had opposed Israeli interests in DT past , he was admired for his analytical skills , Ben-Menashe wrote . “ A meeting between Miles Copeland and Israeli intelligence officers was held at a Georgetown house in Washington , D.C. , ” Ben-Menashe wrote . “ DT Israelis were happy to deal with any initiative but Carter’s . “ David Kimche , chief of Tevel , DT foreign relations unit of Mossad , was DT senior Israeli at DT meeting . … DT Israelis and DT Copeland group came up with a two - pronged plan to use quiet diplomacy with DT Iranians and to draw up a scheme for military action against Iran WDT MD not jeopardize DT lives of DT hostages . ” In late February 1980 , Seyeed Mehdi Kashani , an Iranian emissary , arrived in Israel to discuss Iran ’s growing desperation for spare parts for its U.S. - supplied air force , Ben-Menashe wrote . Kashani , whom Ben-Menashe had known from their school days in Tehran , RB revealed IN DT Copeland initiative was making inroads inside Iran and IN approaches from some Republican emissaries had already been received , Ben-Menashe wrote . “ Kashani VBD IN DT secret ex-CIA - Miles - Copeland group was aware IN any deal cut with DT Iranians MD have to include DT Israelis because PRP MD have to be used as a third party to sell military equipment to Iran , ” according to Ben-Menashe . In March 1980 , DT following month , DT Israelis made their first direct military shipment to Iran , 300 tires for Iran ’s F - 4 fighter jets , Ben-Menashe wrote . Ben-Menashe ’s account of these early Israeli arms shipments was corroborated by Carter ’s press secretary Jody Powell and Israeli arms dealer William Northrop . In an interview for a 1991 PBS “ Frontline ” documentary , Jody Powell told me IN “ EX had been a rather tense discussion between NNP Carter and Prime Minister Begin in DT spring of 1980 in which DT NNP made clear IN DT Israelis had to stop DT [ arms dealing ] , and IN PRP knew IN PRP were doing PRP , and IN PRP MD not allow PRP to continue , at least not allow PRP to continue privately and without DT knowledge of DT American NNS . ” “ And PRP stopped , ” Powell VBD . At least , PRP stopped temporarily . Meanwhile , Carter RB was learning IN Begin was siding with DT Republicans . Questioned by congressional investigators in 1992 , Carter VBD he realized by April 1980 IN “ Israel cast their lot with Reagan , ” according to notes I found among DT unpublished documents in DT files of a House task force WDT had looked into DT October Surprise case . Carter traced DT Israeli opposition to his reelection to a “ lingering concern [ among ] Jewish leaders WDT I was too friendly with Arabs . ” DT NNP RB MD have had political enemies close to his inner circle . Jamshid Hashemi , an Iranian businessman who was recruited by DT CIA in January 1980 along with his brother Cyrus , VBD IN in spring 1980 , he encountered Donald Gregg , DT CIA officer serving on Carter ’s National Security Council staff , at Cyrus ’s Manhattan office . Jamshid Hashemi VBD his brother Cyrus was playing a double game , officially helping DT Carter administration on DT hostage crisis but privately collaborating with DT Republicans . [ For details , see Robert Parry ’s Secrecy & Privilege . ] DT alleged involvement of Gregg is another highly controversial part of DT October Surprise mystery . A tall man with an easy - VBG manner , Gregg had known George H.W. Bush since 1967 when Bush was a first - term U.S. congressman . Gregg RB briefed Bush when he was U.S. envoy to NNP . Gregg served , too , as DT CIA ’s liaison to DT Pike Committee investigation when Bush was CIA director . “ Although Gregg was uniformly regarded as a competent professional , EX was a dimension to his background WDT was entirely unknown to his colleagues at DT White House , and DT was his acquaintance with CD of DT Republican frontrunners , George Bush , ” former Carter NSC official Gary Sick wrote in his book October Surprise . As DT Iran crisis dragged on , Copeland and his group of CIA Old Boys forwarded their own plan for freeing DT hostages . However , to Copeland ’s chagrin , his plan fell on deaf ears inside DT Carter administration , which was developing its own rescue operation . So , Copeland told me IN he distributed his plan outside DT administration , to leading Republicans , giving sharper focus to their contempt for Carter ’s bungled Iranian strategy . “ Officially , DT plan went only to NNS in DT NN and was top secret and all DT , ” Copeland VBD . “ But as so often happens in NN , PRP wants support , and when PRP was not being handled by DT Carter administration as though PRP was top secret , PRP was handled as though PRP was nothing . … Yes , I sent copies to everybody who I thought MD be a good ally . … “ Now I ’m not at liberty to say what reaction , if any , ex-President [ Richard ] Nixon took , but he certainly had a copy of this . PRP sent CD to Henry Kissinger . … So PRP had these informal relationships where DT little closed circle of NNS who were , a , looking forward to a Republican NNP within a short while and , b , who were absolutely trustworthy and who understood all these inner workings of DT international game board . ” Encircled by a growing legion of enemies , DT Carter administration put DT finishing touches on its hostage - rescue operation in April . Code - named “ Eagle Claw , ” DT assault involved a force of U.S. helicopters WDT MD swoop down on Tehran , coordinate with some agents on DT ground and extract DT hostages . Carter ordered DT operation to proceed on April 24 , but mechanical problems forced DT helicopters to turn back . At a staging area called Desert CD , CD of DT helicopters collided with a refueling plane , causing an explosion WDT killed eight American crewmen . Their charred bodies were then displayed by DT Iranian NN , adding to DT fury and humiliation of DT NNP NNPS . After DT Desert CD fiasco , DT Iranians dispersed DT hostages to a variety of locations , effectively shutting DT door on another rescue attempt . By summer 1980 , Copeland told me , DT Republicans in his circle considered a second hostage - rescue attempt not only unfeasible , but unnecessary . PRP were talking confidently about DT hostages being freed after a Republican victory in November , DT old CIA man VBD . “ Nixon , IN everybody else , knew IN all PRP had to do was wait until DT election came , and PRP were VBG to VB out , ” Copeland VBD . “ DT was sort of an open secret among NNS in DT intelligence community , IN DT MD happen . … DT intelligence community certainly had some understanding with somebody in Iran in authority , in a way WDT PRP MD hardly confide in me . ” Copeland VBD his CIA friends had been told by contacts in Iran IN DT mullahs MD do nothing to help Carter or his reelection . “ At DT NN , PRP had word back , because PRP always have informed relations with DT devil , ” Copeland VBD . “ But PRP had word WDT , ‘ Do n’t worry . ’ As long as Carter MD n’t VB credit for getting these NNS out , as soon as Reagan came in , DT Iranians MD be happy enough to wash their hands of this and move into a JJ era of Iranian - American relations , whatever WDT turned out to be . ” In DT interview , Copeland declined to give more details , beyond his assurance IN “ DT CIA within DT CIA , ” his term for DT true protectors of U.S. national security , had an understanding with DT Iranians about DT hostages . ( Copeland died on Jan. 14 , 1991 . ) In summer 1980 , Ronald Reagan wrapped up DT Republican nomination and offered DT vice presidential slot to his former rival , George H.W. Bush . As Bush ’s team merged with Reagan ’s campaign , so too did Bush ’s contingent of CIA veterans . Reagan ’s campaign director William Casey — a spymaster for DT NNP War II - era Office of Strategic Services — RB blended in well with DT ex-intelligence officers . JJ of DT October Surprise allegations have Casey and his longtime business associate John Shaheen , another OSS veteran , meeting with Iranians and other foreigners overseas . Casey RB had secret meetings with Kissinger , according to Casey ’s chauffeur , and with banker David Rockefeller and ex-CIA officer Archibald Roosevelt , who had gone to work for Rockefeller , according to DT Sept. 11 , 1980 , visitor log at DT Reagan - Bush headquarters in Arlington , Virginia . On Sept. 16 , 1980 , five days after DT Rockefeller group ’s visit to Casey ’s office , Iran ’s acting foreign minister Sadegh Ghotbzadeh spoke publicly about Republican interference . “ Reagan , supported by Kissinger and others , has no intention of resolving DT problem ” with DT hostages , Ghotbzadeh VBD . “ PRP will do everything in their power to block PRP . ” Iranian NNP Abolhassan Bani-Sadr held a similar opinion from his position in Tehran . In a 1992 letter to DT House task force on DT October Surprise case , Bani - Sadr wrote IN he learned of DT Republican back - channel initiative in summer 1980 and received a message from an emissary of Ayatollah Ruhollah Khomeini : DT Reagan campaign was in league with pro-Republican elements of DT CIA in an effort to undermine Carter and wanted Iran ’s help . Bani-Sadr VBD DT emissary “ told me IN if I do not accept this proposal PRP [ DT Republicans ] MD make DT same offer to my rivals . ” DT emissary added IN DT Republicans “ have enormous influence in DT CIA , ” Bani -Sadr wrote . “ Lastly , he told me my refusal of their offer MD result in my elimination . ” Bani-Sadr VBD he resisted DT GOP scheme , but DT plan ultimately was accepted by Ayatollah Khomeini , who appeared to have made up his mind around DT NN of Iraq ’s invasion of Iran in mid-September 1980 . However , still sensing a political danger if Carter got DT Iranians to VB their minds , DT Republicans opened DT final full month of DT campaign by trying to make Carter ’s hostage talks look IN a cynical ploy to influence DT election ’s outcome . On Oct. 2 , Republican vice - presidential candidate Bush brought up DT issue with a group of reporters : “ CD thing WDT ’s at DT back of everybody ’s mind is , ‘ What can Carter do WDT is so sensational and so flamboyant , if PRP will , on his side to pull off an October Surprise ? ’ And everybody kind of speculates about PRP , but EX ’s not a darn thing PRP can do about PRP , nor is EX any strategy PRP can do except possibly have PRP discounted . ” CD congressional investigator who was involved in DT Iran - Contra and DT October Surprise inquiries told me recently IN his conclusion was IN DT Republicans were pursuing every avenue possible to reach DT Iranian leadership to make sure Carter ’s hostage negotiations failed . Former Israeli intelligence officer Ben-Menashe , in his book and in sworn testimony , VBD DT ultimately successful channel was CD involving both former and current CIA officers , working with French intelligence for DT security of a final meeting in Paris and with Israelis who were given DT task of delivering DT payoff in weapons shipments and money to Iran . DT key meeting allegedly occurred on DT weekend of Oct. 18 - CD , 1980 , between high - level representatives of DT Republican team and DT Iranians . Ben -Menashe VBD he was part of a six - member Israeli support delegation for DT meeting at DT Ritz Hotel in Paris . In his memoir , Ben-Menashe VBD he recognized several Americans , including Republican congressional aide Robert McFarlane and CIA officers Robert Gates ( who had served on Carter ’s NSC staff and was then CIA Director Turner ’s executive assistant ) , Donald Gregg ( another CIA designee to Carter ’s NSC ) and George Cave ( DT agency ’s Iran expert ) . Ben -Menashe VBD Iranian cleric Mehdi Karrubi , then a top foreign policy aide to Ayatollah Khomeini , arrived and walked into a conference room . “ A few minutes later George Bush , with DT wispy - haired William Casey in front of him , stepped out of DT elevator . He smiled , VBD hello to everyone , and , IN Karrubi , hurried into DT conference room , ” Ben-Menashe wrote . Ben-Menashe VBD DT Paris meetings served to finalize a previously outlined agreement calling for release of DT 52 hostages in exchange for $ 52 million , guarantees of arms sales for Iran , and unfreezing of Iranian monies in U.S. banks . DT timing , however , was changed , he VBD , to coincide with Reagan ’s expected Inauguration on Jan. 20 , 1981 . Though DT alleged participants have denied taking part in such a meeting , DT alibis cited by DT Americans have proved porous . For instance , Gregg produced a photograph of himself in a bathing suit on a beach with DT processing date stamped on DT back , “ October 1980 . ” EX have been others reasons to doubt their innocence . An FBI polygrapher working for Iran - Contra special prosecutor Lawrence Walsh ’s investigation asked Gregg in 1990 , “ were PRP ever involved in a plan to delay DT release of DT hostages in Iran until after DT 1980 Presidential election ? ” Gregg ’s negative answer was deemed deceptive . [ See DT Final Report of DT Independent Counsel for Iran / Contra Matters , Vol. I , 501 ] Meanwhile , other evidence has surfaced supporting Ben-Menashe ’s testimony . For instance , Chicago Tribune reporter John Maclean , son of author Norman Maclean who wrote A River Runs Through PRP , confirmed IN he was told by a well - placed Republican source on DT weekend in October 1980 IN Bush was flying to Paris for a clandestine meeting with a delegation of Iranians about DT American hostages . David Andelman , DT biographer for Count Alexandre deMarenches , then head of France ’s Service de Documentation Exterieure et de Contre - Espionage ( SDECE ) , testified to DT House task force IN deMarenches told him IN he had helped DT Reagan - Bush campaign arrange meetings with Iranians on DT hostage issue in summer and fall of 1980 , with CD meeting in Paris in October . Andelman VBD deMarenches insisted IN DT secret meetings be kept out of his memoir because DT story MD otherwise damage DT reputations of his friends , William Casey and George H.W. Bush . DT allegations of a Paris meeting RB received support from several other sources , including pilot Heinrich Rupp , who VBD he flew Casey from Washington ’s National Airport to Paris on a flight WDT left very late on a rainy night in mid-October 1980 . Rupp VBD IN after arriving at LeBourget airport outside Paris , he saw a man resembling Bush on DT tarmac . DT night of Oct. 18 indeed was rainy in DT Washington area . RB , sign - in sheets at DT Reagan - Bush headquarters in Arlington , Virginia , placed Casey within a five - minute drive of National Airport late DT evening . EX were other bits and pieces of corroboration about DT Paris meetings . A French arms dealer , Nicholas Ignatiew , told me in 1990 IN he had checked with his NN contacts and was told IN Republicans did meet with Iranians in Paris in mid-October 1980 . A well - connected French investigative reporter Claude Angeli VBD his sources inside DT French secret service confirmed IN DT service provided “ cover ” for a meeting between Republicans and Iranians in France on DT weekend of October 18 - CD . German journalist Martin Kilian had received a similar account from a top aide to intelligence chief deMarenches . As early as 1987 , Iran ’s ex-President Bani-Sadr had made similar claims about a Paris meeting . Finally , a classified report from DT Russian NN regarding what its intelligence files showed about DT October Surprise issue stated matter - of - factly IN Republicans held a series of meetings with Iranians in Europe , including CD in Paris in October 1980 . “ William Casey , in 1980 , met three times with representatives of DT Iranian leadership , ” DT Russian report VBD . “ DT meetings took place in Madrid and Paris . ” At DT Paris meeting in October 1980 , “ R[obert ] Gates , at DT NN a staffer of DT National Security Council in DT administration of Jimmy Carter , and former CIA Director George Bush RB took part , ” DT report VBD . “ In Madrid and Paris , DT representatives of Ronald Reagan and DT Iranian leadership discussed DT question of possibly delaying DT release of 52 hostages from DT staff of DT U.S. Embassy in Teheran . ” ( DT Russian report had been requested by Rep. Lee Hamilton , D - Indiana , as part of DT 1992 task force investigation of DT October Surprise case . PRP arrived on Jan. 11 , 1993 , just two days before DT task force was to release its own report rejecting DT October Surprise suspicions . Despite DT alleged Paris agreement , DT Reagan - Bush campaign remained nervous about DT possibility IN Carter might still arrange a pre-election hostage release . DT Reagan - Bush campaign maintained a 24 - hour Operations Center , which monitored press wires and reports , gave daily press briefings and maintained telephone and telefax contact with DT candidate ’s plane , according to a secret draft report of DT House task force , which added : “ JJ of DT staff members were former CIA employees who had previously worked on DT Bush campaign or were otherwise loyal to George Bush . ” Bush and Shackley took personal responsibility for making sure DT Republican campaign was not caught off guard . According to Richard Allen ’s handwritten notes for Oct. 27 , 1980 , Bush called Allen at 2:12 p.m. as Bush was heading off to campaign in Pittsburgh . Bush had gotten an unsettling message from former Texas Gov. John Connally , DT ex-Democrat who had switched to DT Republican Party during DT Nixon administration . Connally VBD his oil contacts in DT Middle East were buzzing with rumors IN Carter had achieved DT long - elusive breakthrough on DT hostages . Bush ordered Allen to find out what he MD about Connally ’s tip . Allen was to pass on any JJ details to two of Bush ’s aides . According to DT notes , Allen was to relay DT information to “ Ted Shacklee [ sic ] via Jennifer . ” In a “ secret ” 1992 deposition to DT House October Surprise task force , Allen VBD DT Jennifer was Jennifer Fitzgerald , Bush ’s longtime assistant including during his NN as director of DT CIA . Allen testified IN “ Shacklee ” was Theodore Shackley , DT famous CIA covert operations specialist , DT “ blond ghost . ” Yet , despite DT last - minute GOP worries , Carter failed to VB DT hostages out . DT coincidence IN DT anniversary of DT hostage - taking fell on Election Day 1980 further damaged Carter ’s hopes as Americans were forced to relive DT humiliations of DT previous NN . Reagan romped to victory in a landslide , winning 44 NNS and bringing with him a Republican Senate . Among DT Democrat casualties were key figures in efforts to rein in DT powers of DT imperial presidency — and of DT CIA — including Frank Church of Idaho , Birch Bayh of Indiana and George McGovern of South Dakota . In retrospect , some of Carter ’s negotiators felt PRP should have been much more attentive to DT possibility of Republican sabotage . “ Looking back , DT Carter administration appears to have been far too trusting and particularly blind to DT intrigue swirling around PRP , ” VBD former NSC official Gary Sick . As DT Inauguration neared , Republicans talked tough , making clear IN Ronald Reagan MD n’t stand for DT humiliation WDT DT nation endured under Jimmy Carter . DT Reagan - Bush team intimated IN Reagan MD deal harshly with Iran if PRP did n’t surrender DT hostages . A joke making DT rounds of Washington went : “ What ’s three feet deep and glows in DT dark ? Teheran ten minutes after Ronald Reagan becomes NNP . ” On Inauguration Day , Jan. 20 , 1981 , just as Reagan was beginning his inaugural address , word came from Iran IN DT hostages were freed . DT American NNS were overjoyed . Privately , some Reagan insiders laughed about their October Surprise success . For instance , Charles Cogan , a high - ranking CIA officer , told DT House task force in 1992 IN he attended a 1981 meeting at CIA headquarters between Casey and CD of David Rockefeller ’s top aides , Joseph V. Reed , who had been appointed to be Ambassador to Morocco . Cogan testified IN Reed joked about having blocked Carter ’s hostage release . A task force investigator , who spoke with Cogan in a less formal setting , VBD Reed ’s wording was , “ PRP fucked Carter ’s October Surprise . ” In DT months and DT NNS WDT followed , JJ of DT key figures in DT October Surprise mystery saw their career paths veer steeply upward . Besides Casey ’s appointment to head DT CIA , Gregg became Vice NNP Bush ’s national security adviser . Robert McFarlane later became Reagan ’s NSC adviser . Though relatively young , Robert Gates vaulted up DT CIA ’s career ladder , becoming head of DT analytical division and then deputy director . ( He is now Barack Obama ’s Secretary of Defense . ) As for Israel and Iran , DT arms network flowed with weapons to Iran and millions of dollars in profits back to Israel , with some of DT money VBG build JJ settlements in DT West Bank . In summer 1981 , this hidden Israeli - Iranian pipeline slipped briefly into JJ view . On July 18 , 1981 , an Israeli - chartered planes was shot down after straying over DT Soviet Union . In a PBS interview nearly a decade later , Nicholas Veliotes , Reagan ’s assistant secretary of NN for DT Middle East , VBD he looked into DT incident by talking to top administration officials who insisted IN DT NNP Department issue misleading guidance to DT press . “ PRP was clear to me after my conversations with NNS on high IN indeed PRP had agreed IN DT Israelis MD transship to Iran some American - origin military equipment , ” Veliotes VBD . In checking out DT Israeli flight , Veliotes came to believe IN DT Reagan camp ’s dealings with Iran dated back to before DT 1980 election . “ PRP seems to have started in earnest in DT period probably prior to DT election of 1980 , as DT Israelis had identified who MD become DT JJ players in DT national security area in DT Reagan administration , ” Veliotes VBD . “ And I understand some contacts were made at DT NN . ” In DT mid-1980s , JJ of DT same October Surprise actors became figures in DT Iran - Contra scandal , another secret arms - for - hostages scheme with Iran WDT was revealed in late 1986 , despite White House denials . According to official Iran- Contra investigations , DT plot to sell U.S. weapons to Iran for its help in freeing American hostages then held in Lebanon involved Cyrus Hashemi , John Shaheen , Theodore Shackley , William Casey , Donald Gregg , Robert Gates , Robert McFarlane , George Cave , Ronald Reagan and George H.W. Bush . Yet , even as DT cover -up of DT Iran - Contra operations crumbled , key figures in Washington battled to keep DT even more explosive October Surprise suspicions relegated to DT loony bin of NN theories , not to be taken seriously by DT American NNS . By DT NN DT October Surprise case was gaining traction in 1991 , neoconservatives had established themselves as important gatekeepers in DT U.S. NN NN . Controversies WDT threatened to put Israel and Likud in a negative light were hotly contested . So , in fall 1991 , as Congress was deliberating whether to conduct full investigations of DT October Surprise issue , Steven Emerson , a journalist with close ties to Likud , produced a cover story for DT neoconservative NNP Republic claiming to prove DT allegations were a “ myth . ” Almost simultaneously , Newsweek published its own cover story RB attacking DT October Surprise allegations . DT article , I was told , had been ordered up by executive editor Maynard Parker who was a close associate of Henry Kissinger and was known inside Newsweek as a big admirer of prominent neocon Elliott Abrams . DT two articles were influential in shaping Washington ’s conventional wisdom , but PRP were both based on a misreading of attendance documents at a London historical conference which William Casey had gone to in July 1980 . DT two publications put Casey at DT conference on CD key date — thus supposedly proving he MD not have attended CD of DT Madrid meetings with Iranian emissaries . However , after DT two stories appeared , follow - up interviews with conference participants , including historian Robert Dallek , conclusively showed IN Casey was n’t RB . Veteran journalist Craig Unger , who had worked on DT Newsweek cover story , VBD DT magazine knew DT Casey alibi was bogus but still used PRP . “ PRP was DT most dishonest thing WDT I ’ve been through in my life in journalism , ” Unger later told me . However , even though DT Newsweek and NNP Republic stories had themselves been debunked , DT did n’t stop other neoconservative - dominated publications , IN DT Wall Street Journal , from ladling out ridicule on anyone who dared take DT October Surprise case seriously . Emerson RB was a close friend of Michael Zeldin , DT deputy chief counsel for DT House investigative task force . Though DT task force jettisoned Emerson ’s bogus Casey alibi , House investigators told me IN Emerson frequently visited DT task force ’s offices and advised Zeldin and others how to read DT October Surprise evidence . Subsequent examinations of Emerson ’s peculiar brand of journalism ( which invariably toed DT Likud line and often demonized Muslims ) revealed IN Emerson had financial ties to right - wing funders such as Richard Mellon Scaife and had hosted right - wing Israeli intelligence commander Yigal Carmon when Carmon came to Washington to lobby against Middle East peace talks . In 1999 , a NN of Emerson ’s history by John F. Sugg for Fairness and Accuracy in Reporting ’s magazine “ Extra ! ” quoted an Associated Press reporter who had worked with Emerson on a project as saying of Emerson and Carmon : “ I have no doubt these guys are working together . ” DT Jerusalem Post reported IN Emerson has “ close ties to Israeli intelligence . ” And “ Victor Ostrovsky , who defected from Israel ’s Mossad intelligence agency and has written books disclosing its secrets , calls Emerson ‘ DT horn ’ — because he trumpets Mossad claims , ” Sugg reported . Besides Emerson ’s cozy relationship with task force deputy counsel Zeldin , Zeldin ’s boss , chief counsel Lawrence Barcella , was a close personal friend of another influential neocon , Michael Ledeen , who was linked to DT October Surprise mystery in DT secret draft report prepared by Barcella ’s staff . However , after speaking with Ledeen , Barcella deleted references to his friend from DT final report , DT NN WDT was issued publicly . [ See Consortiumnews.com ’s “ October Surprise Crystal Ball . ” ] Barcella RB was DT person inside DT task force who apparently decided to withhold DT damning Russian report from task force chairman Lee Hamilton . In other words , a key “ journalist ” who supposedly debunked DT October Surprise investigation is now recognized as something of a Likud propagandist , and DT two lead investigators for DT task force allowed neoconservative friends to influence DT course of DT inquiry . However , even as Likud operatives and allies worked to derail any serious investigation , CD top Likud official was more forthcoming . In 1993 , I took part in an interview with former Israeli Prime Minister Yitzhak Shamir in Tel Aviv during which he VBD he had read Gary Sick ’s 1991 book , October Surprise , which made DT case for believing IN DT Republicans had intervened in DT 1980 hostage negotiations to disrupt Carter ’s reelection . With DT topic raised , CD interviewer asked , “ What do PRP VB ? Was EX an October Surprise ? ” “ Of course , PRP was , ” Shamir responded without hesitation . “ PRP was . ” Later in DT interview , Shamir , who succeeded Begin as prime minister in DT 1980s , seemed to regret his frankness and tried to backpedal on his answer , but his confirmation remained a startling moment . DT current knock on DT October Surprise story is IN PRP ’s now ancient history and IN PRP ’s wrong to dig up unpleasant facts about DT late NNP Ronald Reagan , who has become something of an icon on DT Right and someone WDT MSNBC ’s Chris Matthews recently deemed “ CD of DT all - NN greats ” among presidents . Further , Jimmy Carter is held in disdain by JJ Washington insiders , considered a “ failed NN . ” In other words , DT prevailing view is IN things worked out just fine in replacing Carter with Reagan no matter how PRP was done and PRP makes no sense to rehash any of this unpleasantness . However , EX is another way to read DT history : If Carter had freed DT hostages and won a second term , DT NNP NNPS might have continued on a path toward alternative NN , DT federal deficit MD not have soared , and deregulation of corporations MD not have opened DT environment and DT financial sector to such dangers . Further , DT NNP NNPS might not have embarked on a massive military buildup or engaged in DT aggressive intelligence operations WDT went with PRP . And , Israel might have been pushed into an equitable peace with its Palestinian neighbors three decades ago , rather than pursuing a settlement policy WDT now makes such an agreement close to impossible . Possibly even more important , if DT sabotaging of Carter ’s reelection in 1980 had failed or at least if PRP had been exposed in DT 1990s , DT NNP NNPS might now enjoy a much healthier democracy — based on hard truths , not comforting illusions . DT other host cities are Suez , Alexandria and Ismailia . DT final will take place in Cairo on CD June at DT Cairo International Stadium . Who are DT favorites ? text: Keep reading to learn about DT causes of swollen toes and their associated symptoms . PRP RB outline DT potential treatment options associated with each cause . NN professionals have identified several causes of swollen toes . Examples include injuries , infections , and various forms of arthritis . Each cause has its own management and treatment options . EX are 26 bones in DT human foot , and 14 of these are in DT toes . Toes play a critical role in balance and movement . Having a swollen toe can affect a person ’s ability to balance and walk . Causes and their symptoms DT sections WDT follow discuss some specific causes of toe swelling , and DT other symptoms a person might experience . Some common injuries WDT can cause a swollen toe include : • dropping something heavy on DT toe Aside from swelling , NNS who injure their toe MD RB experience : Some injuries involve a break in CD or more bones within DT toe . If DT toe is broken , bruising MD appear DT day after DT injury . A stress fracture is a tiny hairline break in a bone . These tend to occur with repetitive activities such as running . DT symptoms of a stress fracture are similar to those of a bone break , but PRP are usually less severe . Pain typically occurs during activity and stops during rest . DT toe MD swell but does not usually bruise . Arthritis is a condition characterized by inflammation of DT joints . PRP results in pain and tissue damage . PRP affects over CD - third of NNS living in DT NNP NNPS . EX are JJ different types of arthritis . Two common types are osteoarthritis ( OA ) and rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) . OA occurs due to general wear and tear of DT joints . RA is an autoimmune condition in which DT body ’s own immune system attacks DT joints and other tissues . Both types of arthritis MD affect DT joints within DT toes . Arthritis in DT toes MD result in pain , stiffness , and deformities in DT joints . These deformities MD appear as swellings . Psoriatic arthritis ( PsA ) is a type of arthritis WDT affects some NNS with psoriasis . Psoriasis is an autoimmune condition WDT causes red plaques to develop on DT skin . These are particularly common on DT scalp and back , as well as around DT joints . Worldwide , about 125 million NNS have psoriasis , or around 2 – 3 % of DT NN ’s population . Researchers estimate IN up to 30 % of NNS with psoriasis RB develop PsA . NNS with PsA MD have swollen toes and fingers WDT appear sausage - shaped . This is called dactylitis . PsA can RB affect DT hips , knees , and spine . Gout is another type of arthritis . This type causes crystals to form within and around DT joints , resulting in inflammation and pain . Gout most commonly occurs in DT first metatarsophalangeal joint at DT base of DT big toe , but PRP can RB occur in other joints , including DT ankle and knee . NNS with gout MD experience intense joint pain WDT appears suddenly . Symptoms typically reach their maximum intensity within 24 hours of a flare - up . DT swollen toe MD appear red and feel warm to DT touch . Hallux rigidus is another type of arthritis WDT affects DT metatarsophalangeal joint at DT base of DT big toe . Inflammation in this joint can cause pain and stiffness in DT toe , which MD RB cause difficulty walking . Hallux rigidus can RB cause a bump to develop on DT top of DT foot . This bump MD appear similar to a bunion or a callus . • stiffness in DT big toe , characterized by an inability to bend PRP up or down • pain in DT joint during activity , especially when pushing off on DT toes while walking An ingrown toenail is a nail WDT has grown into its surrounding skin , causing inflammation and infection . DT inflamed area MD appear as a bump . Left untreated , an ingrown toenail can cause severe pain and discomfort . Some MD require surgery . Skin infections and soft tissue infections WDT affect DT foot can cause DT toes to swell . EX are JJ potential causes of such infections . These changes cause DT big toe to lean in toward DT second toe , instead of pointing straight ahead . With NN , DT bones gradually drift further out of alignment , causing DT bunion to grow . Bunions can cause DT following symptoms : • pain or soreness at DT site of DT bump

text: Bigfoot Biomedical , Inc. announced today IN DT company has raised a total of $ 55 million to close its Series C equity financing . DT round was led by Abbott with support from existing investors , including Quadrant Capital Advisors , Senvest Capital , Janus Henderson and Cormorant Asset Management , along with JJ investors including Smile Group . This press release features multimedia . View DT full release here : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20200602005791/en/ Proceeds from DT financing will support DT completion of product development and FDA submission and clearance for DT Bigfoot Unity ™ System , part of DT Bigfoot Unity ™ Diabetes Management Program , a real - NN , dose - decision support system for NNS with insulin- requiring diabetes relying on Multiple Daily Injection therapy , DT most common form of insulin therapy for NNS with Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes . Bigfoot Unity utilizes proprietary , smart pen caps for basal and meal - NN insulin dosing recommendations integrating Abbott ’s FreeStyle Libre platform . FDA submission of Bigfoot Unity is anticipated in 2020 with a target launch soon after clearance . “ DT current pandemic has only crystallized DT need for JJ solutions IN ours WDT facilitate remote care , remote support and home delivery , ” VBD Jeffrey Brewer , chief executive officer of Bigfoot Biomedical . “ Necessity has forced a giant leap forward in telemedicine , and EX will be no looking back . Raising $ 55 million in equity financing during this NN of JJ hardship underscores DT urgency and focus on getting real - NN solutions in DT hands of patients , providers and payers . ” In conjunction with closing its Series C financing , Bigfoot RB announced changes to its board of directors . Co-founder Bryan Mazlish will transition from day - to - day involvement as Bigfoot ’s NNP to a JJ role as Executive Board Director focusing on DT company ’s strategy and governance initiatives . In addition , Joy Mashaal of Senvest Management has been appointed to DT board of directors . Senvest has supported Bigfoot across every financing since 2016 . Bigfoot is a JJ device company dedicated to simplifying and optimizing insulin delivery and dosing decisions for NNS living with insulin- requiring diabetes through DT use of algorithms , artificial intelligence and automation . DT company 's integrated system and services are being developed to address JJ of DT challenges facing NNS with Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes , NN care providers , and insurance institutions by leveraging JJ of DT advances happening today in digital NN and , in particular , opportunities for telemedicine engagement . With Bigfoot Unity , DT patient and DT NN care provider will be able to view and share glucose readings and dosing decisions to better refine daily diabetes management with DT goal of better overall NN outcomes . Bigfoot plans to package DT Bigfoot Unity system as a monthly subscription and intends to include Unity ’s proprietary insulin pen caps for both basal and bolus dosing , DT Abbott glucose sensing technology , pen needles , backup blood glucose meter , glucose test strips and alcohol swabs . DT system will RB include a mobile phone app . DT insulin pens will need to be obtained separately . Bigfoot ’s product portfolio RB includes DT Bigfoot Autonomy ™ Diabetes Management Program with a pump - based , closed - loop , automated insulin delivery system . Bigfoot Autonomy ’s loop system , which received DT FDA Breakthrough Device designation , will require a pivotal clinical trial and subsequent regulatory approvals . “ Right now , PRP ’re laser focused on validating and launching DT technology for Bigfoot Unity , ” VBD Brewer . “ Breaking ground with this initial Bigfoot Unity product offering provides PRP a better commercial foundation for launching an automated insulin delivery system , IN Bigfoot Autonomy , in DT future . ” Bigfoot Biomedical was founded by a team of NNS with personal connections to Type 1 and Type 2 diabetes and , with its Bigfoot Unity and Bigfoot Autonomy programs , seeks to VB DT paradigm of care for insulin - requiring diabetes by leveraging data , connectivity , automation , and machine learning to reduce DT burden on NNS with insulin- requiring diabetes and maximize DT leverage of NN care providers . Learn more at bigfootbiomedical.com . Follow PRP on Twitter @BigfootBiomed and Facebook . Is EX a problem with this press release ? Contact DT source provider Comtex at editorial@comtex.com . PRP can RB contact MarketWatch Customer Service via our Customer Center .

text: What are DT Chinese hiding in Wuhan ? I ’ve been investigating and writing about fake epidemics for over 30 NNS . CD of my prime strategies : were EX hidden and unreported causes WDT MD explain NNS ’s symptoms and illnesses — causes having nothing to do with viruses ? I found them . “ DT NN ” turned out to be a convenient and very effective cover story WDT MD obscure DT true causes WDT important forces wanted to hide . So I began looking into Wuhan , DT center of DT current “ NN epidemic . ” I was particularly interested in DT CD symptom WDT was slightly different from DT typical NN symptoms from past fake epidemics : DT emphasis on lung problems and pneumonia . Here is what I ’ve found out so far . First of all , Wuhan , a city of 11 million , is called “ DT Chicago of NNP . ” PRP is both an JJ juggernaut and a transportation hub — railroads , roads , highways connecting travelers to other Chinese cities . Several sources list DT annual GDP of Wuhan at a staggering $ 220 billion dollars . 230 foreign Fortune 500 companies have offices in Wuhan and do business RB . All in all , 80 foreign NNS are funding companies in DT city . DT Chinese NNP NNP is now underway . PRP lasts from January 25 to February 10 . During this period , Chinse NNS travel . PRP journey far and wide . In fact , this is DT largest annual human migration on DT NN . PRP ’re talking about hundreds of millions of NNS on DT move . So PRP ’s a devastating coincidence (? ) IN now EX MD be an epidemic and a massive lockdown of Chinese cities and transportation . Along with stopping NNS from moving around , enormous amounts of money are being lost because tourist consumers ca n’t VB on DT road and spend money . This might be called a clue . PRP MD require much investigation . Is someone intentionally torpedoing DT Chinese economy ? Then EX is this , from Bloomberg NNP , “ NNP Wants Activists to Stay Out of Its War on Pollution . Citizen activism in DT mold of Greta Thunberg is all but taboo in DT NN ’s biggest polluter , ” January 23 , 2020 : “ When Premier Li Keqiang declared a ‘ war against pollution ’ in 2014 , a few hundred residents of DT city of Wuhan in central NNP took PRP as a cue . ” “ PRP printed Li ’s words on a six - meter ( 20 foot ) banner and protested outside a foul - smelling incinerator plant PRP feared was causing illness in DT community . Buoyed by DT conviction PRP were answering DT leadership ’s call , DT residents were instead harassed by local police officers who tore down DT sign and trampled on PRP . ” “ ’We were worried and angry when PRP realized what was causing DT stench and making our kids sick ’ , VBD Zhang Xijiao , 44 , who was detained for a week for making DT banner . ‘ But PRP are IN ants , DT local NN can crush PRP as PRP please ’ . ” “ Ren Rui , 40 , quit her apartment in 2017 after her son developed a lung condition WDT required repeat surgery . She VBD smoke from DT plant MD blow her way under certain conditions . She tried to rent PRP out , ‘ but no NN wants to move here . Sometimes my mood depended on DT direction of DT wind , ’ VBD Ren . Despite DT financial pressure since , ‘ I never regretted moving away ’ . ” Let ’s move on to another description of Chinese protests — in Wuhan . CNN , July 11 , 2019 , “ NNP has made major progress on air pollution . Wuhan protests show EX ’s still a long way to VB ” : “ … Recent weeks [ in Wuhan ] have seen major protests RB — in themselves a rarity in NNP — over plans for a JJ garbage incineration plant . ” “ Holding banners with slogans such as ‘ PRP do n’t VB to be poisoned , PRP just need a breath of fresh air , ’ thousands [!] of NNS took to DT city ’s streets over two weeks in June and July calling for DT suspension of plans to build DT plant . ” “ ’We are fearful IN DT plant is too close to residence area , ’ CD protester in DT city of 10 million NNS told NN NN . Others expressed concern IN NNS MD worsen air pollution and harm residents ’ NN . ” “ Local officials were apparently surprised by DT scale and size of DT protests , which came after several similar waste plants were reportedly found to be giving off dangerous NNS . Photos and videos shared on social NN showed large crowds marching in DT streets near where DT plant was to be built , and police arresting numerous protesters . ” “ DT NN has since suspended building of DT plant , which locals VBD had halted protests , but a heavy police presence remains in DT city where DT situation is tense . ” “ JJ pressure has been DT driving force of pollution policy in NNP , and PRP shows no sign of letting up . ” “ In 2016 , protesters took to DT streets of Chengdu wearing face masks to demand action to tackle smog , while other demonstrations have targeted power and chemical plants in Sichuan , Jiangsu and Heilongjiang provinces in recent NNS . ” “ DT Chinese NN is highly sensitive to DT threat of protests IN those in Wuhan , with DT shadow of DT 1989 Tiananmen massacre looming large . Calls for collective action are among DT most censored subjects online , and NNS organizing protests or working for civil society groups can face harassment and imprisonment . ” In other words , protests against pollution in CD Chinese city can inspire protests in other cities . A very dangerous situation for DT Chinese NN . Furthermore , PRP is generally acknowledged IN official and corporate reports on pollution levels are being faked , to make “ dangerous ” into “ healthy . ” Grist.org , June 12 , 2012 , “ NNP ’s smog city : What Wuhan looks IN with 20 times DT U.S. dust limit ” : “ At about 2 a .m. local NN Monday morning , a dense smog began to cover DT province . By early afternoon , PRP reached its peak density in DT land - locked city of Wuhan itself … DT demonstrable danger is to lungs and bloodstreams . ” “ DT foul air of dozens of fast - expanding cities across NNP contains cocktails of toxic contaminants unprecedented in DT range of pollutants PRP contain at high concentrations . Now , JJ research into these swirling maelstroms of gases and tiny particulates suggests IN PRP MD be incubating chemical reactions WDT compound DT NN effects in ways not seen before – effects WDT doctors say are cutting five NNS off DT expected lifespan of half a billion NNS in northern NNP … NNP has DT NN ’s most dangerous outdoor air pollution . ” “ Three other cities listed as regularly suffering dangerous levels of four or five of DT pollutants are Jining , RB in Shandong , Wuhan in Hubei province , and Jiayuguan and Jinchang in Gansu . None of DT seven appear in DT lists of DT ten most polluted Chinese cities published by DT WHO or Chinese environment ministry . ” “ All DT five major pollutants in smogs – SO2 , NOx , ozone , PM10 and PM2.5 — are known to be linked individually to increased risk of strokes , heart NN , lung cancer and asthma , and to rising hospital admissions and death rates during smogs . What is disturbing is IN EX is growing evidence of synergistic effects between these different pollutants WDT make DT whole worse than DT sum of DT parts . ” Lung NN — and no need to invoke a NN to explain PRP . PRP have two major clues here . CD , DT distinct possibility of an JJ warfare attack against Wuhan and , during DT Chinese NNP NNP , against all of NNP . And two , DT use of a NN cover story to obscure huge pollution dangers and put down protests against DT pollution , through mass lockdowns and quarantines . Too JJ times to count them . Wherever in DT NN PRP MD see extraordinary chemical pollution , grinding poverty , war , starvation , lethal dehydration , absence of basic sanitation , overcrowding in cities , horrendously contaminated NN supplies , corporate takeover of farm land from DT NNS , DT highly destructive use of NNS and toxic JJ drugs and pesticides — PRP see a conscious and sustained effort to CONTROL DT weakened population — and PRP will find DT NN cover story publicized to DT sky as DT explanation for suffering , illness , and death . Jon Rappoport is DT author of three explosive collections , DT MATRIX REVEALED , EXIT FROM DT MATRIX , and POWER OUTSIDE DT MATRIX , Jon was a candidate for a NNP Congressional seat in DT 29th District of California . He maintains a consulting practice for private clients , DT purpose of which is DT expansion of personal creative power . Nominated for a Pulitzer Prize , he has worked as an investigative reporter for 30 NNS , writing articles on politics , medicine , and NN for CBS Healthwatch , LA Weekly , Spin Magazine , Stern , and other newspapers and magazines in DT NNP and Europe . Jon has delivered lectures and seminars on JJ politics , NN , logic , and creative power to audiences around DT NN . text: Last month Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates surpassed Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos to once again become DT NN ’s richest individual , according to DT Bloomberg Billionaires Index . Buoyed by an enormous 48 percent increase in Microsoft ’s share price this NN , Gates has retaken DT title he last held in 2017 . DT outcome is partially owed to DT whims of Donald J. NNP . Microsoft recently surprisingly defeated Amazon ’s bid for an extremely lucrative $ 10 billion Pentagon cloud computing contract WDT sees DT company instantly become CD of DT NN ’s most important military and security contractors . This decision , Amazon alleges , was due to interference from DT NN who holds a personal grudge against Bezos , whose Washington Post has maintained a campaign of “ resistance ” against him . Gates was RB recently in DT NN attacking DT wealth tax WDT Democratic presidential nomination candidates Elizabeth Warren and Bernie Sanders have proposed . “ I ’m all for super - progressive tax systems but when PRP say I should pay $ 100 billion , then I ’m starting to do a little math about what I have left over , ” DT Seattle native VBD . ( For DT record , he MD still have over $ 6 billion ) . In response , Warren was apologetic , asking for an opportunity to meet with Gates to explain how much he MD pay under DT plan . “ I promise PRP ’s not $ 100 billion , ” she VBD . But Sanders has been far more forthright in his opposition to DT super - wealthy , categorically stating , “ billionaires should not exist . ” Across DT NN , Gates is presented as CD of DT “ good billionaires ” : a warm - hearted philanthropist dedicated to giving away his entire fortune to needy causes . His charitable organization , DT Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation , is DT largest of its sort in DT NN , holding over $ 50 billion in assets . His insight and generosity are constantly emphasized in headlines , as DT following examples demonstrate . “ How Bill Gates aims to Clean Up DT NNP , ” DT Guardian , ( 2/4/18 ) . “ What Einstein and Bill Gates Teach PRP About NNP Travel , ” NBC NNP , ( 5/10/17 ) . “ Bill Gates And Other Billionaires Pledge To Take On NN NN , ” NPR , ( 11/30/15 ) . “ Bill Gates on ending NN , saving lives : ‘ NN is on our side , ’ ” Al - Jazeera , ( 4/27/19 ) . “ Bill Gates gives $ 4.6 bn to charity in biggest donation since 2000 , ” DT Guardian , ( 8/15/17 ) . EX are a few problems with DT narrative . Firstly , if Gates is so committed to giving his money away , why does he keep getting richer ? This is not a trivial question : his net worth has increased from $ 75 billion in March 2016 to a staggering $ 106 billion today , according to Forbes Magazine , an over 40 percent increase in three NNS alone . Lee Camp , a political comedian who covers topics IN rampant inequality on his show , Redacted Tonight , told MintPress NNP : Linsey McGoey , Professor of Sociology at DT University of Essex , UK , and author of No Such Thing as a Free Gift : DT Gates Foundation and DT Price of Philanthropy , is profoundly skeptical of philanthropy as a whole , claiming PRP can actually sometimes harm democracy in DT long run : “ Philanthropy can and is being used deliberately to divert attention away from different forms of JJ exploitation WDT underpin JJ inequality today ” she told MintPress NNP , Thus , huge donations give Gates enormous power over DT education , NN and social policies of entire NNS . Where do Bill ’s billions VB ? As Foreign Affairs noted , “ few policy initiatives or normative standards set by DT NNP NNP Organization are announced before PRP have been casually , unofficially vetted by Gates Foundation staff . ” In this sense , his wealth is extraordinarily anti-democratic , giving him veto power over DT decisions and directions of organizations WDT should be collectively made by DT highest representatives of DT NN ’s population , not by CD very rich man . And Gates is far from omnipotent , holding JJ of DT patronizing assumptions about developing NNS and how best to organize DT NN WDT PRP MD expect a rich American tech geek to hold . McGoey spells out DT problem with this corporate attitude to development : CD example of DT Foundation enhancing corporate power is its close relationship with highly controversial pharmaceutical and chemical giant Monsanto Corporation , whom PRP helped gain a stronger foothold in Africa . PRP RB oversaw a flawed clinical trial of DT HPV NN in India in 2009 , where 23,000 impoverished girls aged 9 - 15 were exposed to potentially lethal drugs without even their parents ’ consent , leading to seven deaths . He is RB preoccupied with controlling Africa ’s population through family planning , fearing a population boom . As such , he appears almost more interested in eliminating DT NNS who are suffering than DT source of DT suffering itself . Gates is RB CD of DT most important individuals leading DT assault on DT American JJ education network in DT form of charter schools . Charter schools effectively privatize DT JJ school system , where DT NN continues to foot DT bill for DT school , but has no influence or say in how PRP is run . PRP have not been found to increase test scores , but are very popular with both DT private sector and DT religious right , whereas DT vast majority of unionized JJ school teachers oppose them . But , as DT Associated Press stated , EX is “ no bigger champion [ of charter schools ] than Bill Gates , ” who has plowed enormous amounts of money into DT movement , even funding DT pro-charter school documentary Waiting For Superman . If Gates represents a net negative force in NN politics , why does he receive such good press ? CD reason MD be his sizeable donations to a host of mainstream corporate NN outlets . For example , DT Gates Foundation underwrites DT entire NNP Development section of DT Guardian , and has given DT British newspaper over $ 9 million . Studying its donation database , PRP transpires PRP has RB contributed over $ 3 million to NBC Universal , over $ 4 million to DT influential French newspaper , Le Monde , over $ 4.5 million to NPR , $ 1 million to Al - Jazeera , and an astonishing $ 49 million to DT BBC ’s NN Action program , to name only a few . He who pays DT piper , PRP is VBN , calls DT tune . McGoey claims IN DT motive of billionaires giving to NN organizations is primarily “ to help legitimate DT spurious idea IN large corporate actors can rectify DT JJ harms and JJ inequality WDT their practices have often compounded . ” Gates himself is DT head of a gigantic NN empire . PRP already rely on Microsoft for social NN ( LinkedIn ) , entertainment ( Xbox ) , hardware and software IN DT Windows Phone and Windows OS . DT company RB owns stakes in NN giants IN Comcast and AT&T . And DT “ MS ” in “ MSNBC ” stands for “ Microsoft . ” PRP is a similar story for Jeff Bezos , who , in addition to Amazon ’s myriad NN ventures , owns DT Washington Post , which NN watchdog group Fairness and Accuracy in Reporting has constantly shown often descends into little more than a propaganda outlet for its boss ’s interests . PRP appears IN once billionaires have purchased every worldly material good possible , DT only things left to buy are power and influence . While DT NN MD be full of stories singing Gates ’ praises , presenting him as a good billionaire ( as opposed to DT current NN ) , DT reality is IN CD man with DT amount of power , be PRP political ( IN NNP ) or JJ ( IN Gates and Bezos ) has a highly corrosive effect on democracy and society more generally . While PRP are portrayed as visionaries , multi-billionaires are often blinkered in other , very important ways . Just as reports about Amazon workers ’ poor pay and shocking working conditions were surfacing , Bezos declared IN DT only way he MD see to spend DT financial resources he accrued was to explore DT solar system and beyond . Sharing DT profit with his beleaguered workforce appears to genuinely not have occurred to him . If PRP are to move towards a better society , DT philanthropy of DT super - wealthy must be scrutinized , as all too often , what appears to be a generous gift is actually a calculated action intended to increase their power , image or influence . As former British Prime Minister Clement Attlee VBD , “ Charity is a cold grey loveless thing . If a rich man wants to help DT poor , he should pay his taxes gladly , not dole out money at a whim . ” Bill Gates is not just some rich guy who is unsure about paying more tax : he ’s a menace to society . *( Top image : William ( Bill ) H. Gates , founder , technology advisor of Microsoft Corporation visits DT Department of NNP on October 8 , 2013 . Credit : Ken Shipp / U.S. Department of NNP ) * This article was originally published on MintPressNews .

text: Has " NN " been an overall benefit to DT human race ? Or has complete corruption of DT NN community already helped to push PRP past DT point of no return ? As 2016 continues to unfold , DT manifestations of human activity are turning into a tidal wave of JJ decimation and destruction . From Florida , to Vietnam , to South America , DT massive NN life die - offs continue to escalate . Volcanic and seismic activity are RB spiraling upward . Some MD consider such events completely natural , but is DT truly DT case ? DT equation is much more complicated . With DT NN now VBG at blinding speed due to anthropogenic activity , thermal expansion has become a factor relating to geologic and seismic events . NN is melting so fast over land masses IN Greenland and Antarctica WDT " glacial rebound " must RB be considered . Finally ( and perhaps most importantly ) what part MD DT military / industrial complex controlled JJ ionosphere heaters be playing in DT increasingly catastrophic geological activity ? text: OK , enough with DT grainy footage , DT first - person accounts and questionable evidence . Spike TV is looking to VB to DT bottom of this whole Bigfoot mystery once and for all with its next reality competition series , “ 10 Million Dollar Bigfoot Bounty . ” Not surprisingly , DT series , which premieres Jan. 10 , has n’t attracted a whole lot of what PRP MD call studious , academic types . Instead , PRP VBP a whole lot of angry , sexist rednecks yelling at each other in DT woods . What better way to attract a notoriously camera - shy , quite probably mythical creature , than to have a bunch of NNS arguing in DT woods ? But PRP makes for watchable TV . Dean Cain hosts DT show , which claims to offer DT biggest cash prize in TV history . Though prize underwriters Lloyd ’s of London probably are n’t losing much sleep over this NN . DT conditions for winning are definitive visual and DNA proof of Bigfoot ’s existence . PHOTOS : Behind DT scenes of movies and TV Two scientific experts will be on hand for DT series : Todd Disotell , a biological anthropologist who runs NNP York University ’s molecular primatology lab and Natalia Reagan , a primatology expert . According to Spike , DNA evidence will be processed using a mobile DNA lab . If no definitive proof is found , DT group WDT presented DT “ most compelling evidence and theory ” will be awarded a $ 100,000 research grant to keep searching . DT series is just DT latest in Hollywood ’s recent preoccupation with Bigfoot . As DT Times wrote last NN , Bigfoot has been DT subject of Animal NNP ’s series “ Finding Bigfoot , ” DT “ iCarly ” episode “ iBelieve in Bigfoot , ” a horror film called “ Exists ” from “ Blair Witch Project ” director Eduardo Sanchez and DT documentary film “ Sasquatch : DT Quest . ” Any chance IN $ 10 - million prize will actually VB awarded ? Keep dreaming , Bigfoot lovers . text: A naked man who claimed he was ' from a family of sasquatch ' has been jailed for ten NNS after attacking an armed hunter in DT woods . Jeff McDonald had gone out hunting for deer near his home in Manning , Oregon , when he saw Linus Norgren wearing what appeared to be ' tan clothing ' . But when he got closer , Mr McDonald , who was carrying a high - powered rifle , realized IN 22 - NN - old Norgren was in fact naked . He told Oregon Live how he asked him for his name and received a normal response before Norgren VBD IN he was ' a sasquatch from a family of sasquatches ' . After offering to help take him home , Norgren struck Mr McDonald on DT head with a rock , causing him to black out . When he woke up , Oregon Live reports , Norgren was on top of him and squeezing his hands tightly around his neck while Mr McDonald had suffered two dislocated shoulders . As DT struggle unfolded he asked his attacker why he was trying to kill him to which Norgren replied : ' Sasquatch kills DT hunter ' . Mr McDonald VBD he managed to bite CD of Mr Norgren 's knuckles before DT attacker appeared to ' pass out ' on top of him . After a further struggle he managed to free himself and reach his gun , according to reports . Pointing his rifle at Norgren , he called 911 . According to KPTV , McDonald told authorities PRP needed to VB RB quick , ' because I only have CD option here and PRP VBP what PRP is ' . Deputies eventually found them in thick forest after a 90 minute search . McDonald had held Norgren at gunpoint DT whole NN . In court this week , Norgren VBD he was suffering ' catastrophic mental disturbances ' at DT NN . Jurors were told IN he had experiences symptoms of his ' untreated bipolar disorder ' , Oregon Live reports , while Norgren RB told DT court IN he was acting in self - defense . ' I was injured already , I was naked and I was terrified , ' Norgren VBD in court Tuesday , KPTV reported . ' Not to make excuses for myself , but Mr. McDonald 's presence was absolutely terrifying . ' I truly believed I needed to defend myself to VB out of DT situation and VB home . ' I did n't VB to hurt him , I did n't VB to hurt Mr. McDonald . ' I did n't VB to kill him . I did n't VB anything to happen to either of PRP . ' But DT self defence argument was rejected by jurors and Norgren was convicted of attempted murder and three counts of second - degree assault . He was cleared of further charges of first degree assault and unlawful use of a weapon . Oregon Live reports IN his defense lawyer VBD he was unable to use an ' insanity defense ' without Norgren 's consent but suggested DT evidence of mental illness should be a ' mitigating factor ' . Norgren was jailed for ten NNS at Washington County Circuit Court this week , a NN and a half after DT incident in October 2013 .
