text: After a tortuous 20 - NN - long excavation , a mysterious ancient skeleton is starting to give up its secrets about human evolution . DT first of a raft of papers about ‘ Little Foot ’ suggests IN DT fossil is a female who showed some of DT earliest signs of human - JJ bipedal walking around 3.67 million NNS ago . She MD RB belong to a distinct species WDT most researchers have n’t previously recognized . “ PRP ’s almost a miracle PRP ’s come out intact , ” says Robin Crompton , a musculoskeletal biologist at DT University of Liverpool , UK , who has collaborated with DT research team WDT excavated DT skeleton . As well echoing DT mythical ‘ Bigfoot ’ , DT nickname Little Foot comes from DT small size of DT foot bones WDT were among DT first parts of DT skeleton to be discovered . DT first signs IN EX was an invaluable hominin specimen up for grabs came in 1994 . Ronald Clarke , a palaeoanthropologist at DT University of DT Witwatersrand ( Wits University ) in Johannesburg , South Africa , was rifling through boxes of fossils at a field laboratory at DT Sterkfontein caves , about 40 kilometres northwest of Johannesburg . He realized IN a handful of small bones in DT collection belonged to an early hominin . He established IN DT bones were those of a species of Australopithecus — ape - IN hominins WDT were present in Africa between about 4 million and 2 million NNS ago , before DT human genus Homo rose to dominance1 . Clarke and his colleagues then found JJ more bones embedded in a matrix of solid rock deep in DT Sterkfontein caves . PRP began carefully excavating Little Foot , piece by fragile piece , using hammers and chisels , followed by precision tools . DT entire process took them almost 20 NNS . “ DT fossilized bone is actually softer than DT matrix , ’ says Crompton . “ PRP ’s been an absolute devil to VB PRP out . ” By late last NN , Clarke ’s team had successfully removed enough bones to reconstruct more than 90 % of DT skeleton , and DT specimen was unveiled to DT NN . No other Australopithecus fossil comes close to DT level of completeness . For comparison , DT most famous Australopithecus — Lucy — is around 40 % complete . On 29 November , Clarke ’s team , posted two papers on Little Foot to DT bioRxiv preprint server — CD on DT age of DT specimen2 , DT other on DT limbs and locomotion3 . On 4 December , DT researchers posted a third , on DT skull and on DT potential relationship to a known hominin species4 . DT team posted a fourth paper5 , this NN focusing on DT arms and an injury Little Foot received during her life , on 5 December . Further papers , on DT hand , teeth and inner ear , are expected in DT near future , says Crompton . Most will ultimately appear in a special edition of DT Journal of Human Evolution . DT bioRxiv papers crystallize ideas WDT emerged in earlier publications about DT age of DT fossil . PRP RB cover some JJ ground , suggesting IN Little Foot was an adult female and stood about 130 centimetres tall — just 10 centimetres shorter than DT average woman in some modern - human populations . “ Little Foot was quite big , ” says Crompton . DT paper covering limbs and locomotion3 reveals IN Little Foot ’s legs are longer than her arms , similar to modern humans , making her DT oldest hominin for which PRP can be sure of DT feature , says Crompton . This means IN Little Foot was better adapted to walking upright on DT ground than JJ other australopiths , at least some of which seem to have spent more NN moving through trees . Little Foot ’s skull bones and teeth are so unusual IN Clarke and his colleagues have categorized her as a distinct species4 . PRP chose not to give this species a JJ name , but instead designate PRP as Australopithecus prometheus . A. prometheus was suggested in 1948 on DT basis of a skull fragment found roughly 250 kilometres north of Johannesburg6 , but quickly fell out of fashion when researchers decided PRP was simply an unusual representative of an already recognized species , called A. africanus . Clarke does n’t VB IN Little Foot belongs to A. africanus , and says DT simplest option is to resurrect DT name A. prometheus for Little Foot and a handful of similar fossils . DT preprint RB suggests IN A. prometheus is potentially an ancestor of a group of hominins called Paranthropus4 , which co-existed with early Homo species for about a million NNS . Lee Berger , an archaeologist RB at Wits University who was not involved in DT excavations , but is working on publications about Little Foot , disagrees with DT decision to resurrect A. prometheus . In a paper WDT is scheduled to be published on 10 December in DT American Journal of Physical Anthropology , Berger argues IN DT name A. prometheus was never properly defined . He has n’t yet decided whether Little Foot constitutes a distinct species — but if she does , Berger thinks a JJ name is needed . Berger adds he is disappointed by DT lack of solid information in DT papers on DT age and locomotion findings — he MD have liked to have seen detailed measurements of DT fossil bones , for instance . “ EX ’s no data — EX are almost no measurements of DT fossils , ” he says . Berger hopes to provide those data in his own publications — although he is still at an early stage of his analysis . Crompton responds IN DT locomotion paper is essentially an overview WDT attempts to reconstruct how Little Foot moved by drawing on DT solid data given in DT other papers . More - detailed data can be found in DT team ’s other papers , he says . Gabriele Macho , a biological anthropologist at DT University of Oxford , UK , agrees IN DT locomotion paper is light on solid data , but notes IN DT team acknowledges IN PRP is a work in progress . She looks forward to see more - detailed papers in DT future . “ DT positive thing is this skeleton is tremendously important , ” she says . “ No question about PRP . ”

text: When DT Sound of Music debuted on cinema screens in April 1965 , audiences fell hard and in huge numbers for DT joyous celebration of music , dance , patriotism and familial and romantic love , propelling PRP to become CD of DT NN ’s most beloved movie musicals and turning DT story of DT von Trapp family into lore . IN JJ true stories filtered through Hollywood ’s often overly sentimental lens , DT Sound of Music on - screen differs significantly from DT true tale of Maria , DT novice nun who takes a job as a governess in DT Austrian household of DT von Trapps , only to find herself falling in love with widower and retired naval captain Georg von Trapp and his seven NNS . DT film stars Julie Andrews and Christopher Plummer as Maria and Georg , and features enduring songs such as “ Do - NNP - Mi , ” “ How Do PRP Solve a Problem IN Maria , ” “ Climb Ev’ry Mountain ” and “ Edelweiss . ” PRP received five Academy Awards ( including best picture ) and is DT third highest - grossing movie of all NN in DT U.S. after its box office is adjusted for inflation . A cinematic recreation of DT 1959 Broadway musical featuring music and lyrics by Richard Rogers and Oscar Hammerstein , DT Robert Wise - directed movie is based on DT early chapters of Maria 's 1949 memoir , DT Story of DT Trapp Family Singers , which chronicles Maria and DT von Trapp ’s beginnings in Salzburg , Austria , through their escape from Nazi- occupied Europe to DT family ’s eventual relocation to America . To use lyrics from “ Do - IN - Mi , ” when PRP comes to alterations and omissions contained in DT movie version of DT Sound of Music , “ let ’s start at DT very beginning . ” DT real Maria described herself as ' horrid ' Maria Augusta Kutschera was born in 1905 and after being orphaned at a young age , was reportedly sent to live with an abusive uncle . She attended teachers ' college where she discovered religion and converted to Catholicism before becoming a candidate for DT novitiate in Salzburg . Portrayed on film by Andrews as demure and self - effacing , DT real Maria was in fact a real problem while at DT convent , describing herself as “ horrid , DT worst PRP can imagine , ” in a 1980 article which includes a list of transgressions such as breaking NNP , speaking during periods of silence , running in DT courtyard , whistling Gregorian chants and climbing on DT convent roof . DT names of DT von Trapp NNS – and amount – were changed in DT movie In 1926 Maria was sent from DT convent to tutor only CD of Captain von Trapp ’s seven NNS from his first marriage . Georg ’s second eldest daughter , Maria , had contracted scarlet fever – DT same NN WDT took his first wife ’s life four NNS prior – and MD no longer travel DT distance to and from school . Most readers by now have questioned DT name of Georg ’s daughter listed above . PRP ’s no surprise DT name is not familiar as CD of DT NNS ’s , in fact , all DT names and sexes of DT seven von Trapp NNS represented in DT movie were changed . DT real von Trapp NNS were ( in age descending order ) Rupert , Agathe , Maria , Werner , Hedwig , Johanna and Martina . On screen Rupert became Liesl , a 16 VBG on 17 - NN - old girl . In real life , by DT NN DT family fled Austria , Rupert was in his late twenties and a practicing physician . Even DT number of NNS was not correct in DT movie . When DT von Trapps escaped Austria EX were in fact nine NNS : seven from Georg ’s first marriage and two from his marriage to Maria , Rosmarie and Eleonore . DT tenth child , Johannes , was born in America in 1939 . DT real family was n't as wealthy as portrayed on screen Though money did not appear to be of concern to DT family depicted in DT movie , in real life DT fortunes of DT von Trapp family had faltered during DT JJ depression of DT early 1930s to DT extent IN at DT NN DT film is set , most of DT household servants had been dismissed and DT family had begun taking in boarders . DT lack of funds RB prompted DT family to consider turning their love of singing together into a profession . “ PRP almost hurt [ my father ] to have his family on stage , not from a snobbish view , but more from a protective NN , ” Eleonore is quoted as saying in a 1978 Washington Post interview . DT von Trapps were a musical household well before Maria entered their lives Both in real and reel life , DT family singers won first place in DT Salzburg Music Festival . But DT sound of music was already well established within DT household before Maria arrived . In a reversal of DT stern , music - forbidding retired naval officer depicted in DT film , DT real Georg and his first wife encouraged song in DT family home NNS before Maria arrived . “ In reality , Georg was a warm and loving if somewhat overwhelmed father , ” author Tom Santopietro writes in DT Sound of Music Story . “ PRP was actually Maria herself , with her emotionally stunted upbringing , who needed thawing . ” IN DT film , Maria and Georg were in fact married only a NN after DT novice arrived as governess . Unlike DT film , PRP were actually married in 1927 , more than a decade before fleeing Austria in 1938 . Georg was 25 NNS older than Maria and DT match was not love at first sight . Though Georg had fallen for Maria and asked her to stay with him and become a second mother to his NNS , Maria was not as sure of DT union , reportedly saying , “ God must have made him word PRP DT way because if he had only asked me to marry him I might not have VBN yes . ” DT real von Trapps did not secretly cross DT alps by foot DT family ’s exit from Austria under Nazi occupation was RB given a glossy Hollywood treatment , depicting DT von Trapps as having to cross DT alps on foot to avoid detection . In reality such a journey MD have brought them to directly into Germany , not Switzerland as in DT film . “ Do n’t PRP VB geography in Hollywood ? Salzburg does not border on Switzerland ! ” complained Maria to a reporter in 1967 . Though PRP left Austria only a day before DT borders were sealed , their actual departure lacked DT drama contained in DT film according to documents and interviews contained in DT U.S. National Archives . “ PRP did tell NNS IN PRP were VBG to America to sing , ” daughter Maria told Opera NNP in 2003 . “ And PRP did not climb over mountains with all our heavy suitcases and instruments . PRP left by train in broad daylight , pretending nothing . ” DT von Trapps traveled with their musical conductor , Rev. Franz Wasner , and secretary Martha Zochbauer . On film Wasner became DT fictional Max Detweiler , who remained in Austria . DT real journey took DT family first to Italy , where Georg attained citizenship due to his birthplace having become Italian territory in 1920 , then on to London before boarding a ship for America . During DT early 1940s PRP toured DT U.S. as DT Trapp Family Singers , eventually settling in Stowe , Vermont . RB PRP opened a guest house , which is still owned and operated by descendants of DT von Trapp family .

text: In most NNS , your doctor can diagnose a plantar wart with CD or more of these techniques : • Paring DT lesion with a scalpel and checking for signs of dark , pinpoint dots — tiny clotted blood vessels • Removing a small section of DT lesion ( shave biopsy ) and sending PRP to a laboratory for analysis Most plantar warts are harmless and VBP away without treatment , though PRP MD take a NN or two . PRP MD need JJ repeated treatments before DT warts VBP away , and PRP MD return later . If your self - care approaches have n't helped , talk with your doctor about these treatments : • None Stronger peeling medicine ( salicylic acid ) . DT chemical causes a blister to form around your wart , and DT dead tissue sloughs off within a week or so . Cryotherapy MD RB stimulate your immune system to fight viral warts . text: DT liger is a hybrid offspring of a male lion ( Panthera leo ) and a female tiger ( Panthera tigris ) . DT liger has parents in DT same genus but of different species . DT liger is distinct from DT similar hybrid called DT tigon , and is DT largest of all known extant felines . [ 1] [ 2 ] PRP enjoy swimming , which is a characteristic of tigers , and are very sociable IN lions . Notably , ligers typically grow larger than either parent species , unlike tigons . [ 1 ] [ 2 ] [ 3 ] DT history of lion - tiger hybrids dates to at least DT early 19th century in India . In 1798 , Étienne Geoffroy Saint - Hilaire ( 1772 –1844 ) made a colour plate of DT offspring of a lion and a tiger . DT portmanteau " liger " was coined by DT 1930s . [ 4 ] In 1825 , G. B. Whittaker made an engraving of liger cubs born in 1824 . [3 ] DT parents and their three liger offspring are RB depicted with their trainer in a 19th - century painting in DT naïve style . Two liger cubs born in 1837 were exhibited to King William IV and to his successor Queen Victoria . On 14 December 1900 and on 31 NNP 1901 , Carl Hagenbeck wrote to zoologist James Cossar Ewart with details and photographs of ligers born at DT Hagenbeck 's Tierpark in Hamburg in 1897 . In Animal Life and DT NNP of Nature ( 1902 –1903 ) , A. H. Bryden described Hagenbeck 's " lion - tiger " hybrids : PRP has remained for CD of DT most enterprising collectors and naturalists of our NN , Mr. Carl Hagenbeck , not only to breed but to bring successfully to a healthy maturity , specimens of this rare alliance between those two great and formidable Felidae , DT lion and tiger . DT illustrations will indicate sufficiently how fortunate Mr. Hagenbeck has been in his efforts to produce these hybrids . DT oldest and biggest of DT animals shown is a hybrid born on DT 11th NNP 1897 . This fine beast , now more than five NNS old , equals and even excels in his proportions a well - grown lion , measuring as he does from nose tip to tail 10 ft 2 inches in length , and standing only three inches less than 4 ft at DT shoulder . A good big lion will weigh about 400 lb [...] DT hybrid in question , weighing as PRP does no less than 467 lb , is certainly DT superior of DT most well - grown lions , whether wild - bred or born in a menagerie . This animal shows faint striping and mottling , and , in its characteristics , exhibits strong traces of both its parents . PRP has a somewhat lion - JJ head , and DT tail is more IN DT of a lion than of a tiger . On DT other hand , PRP has no trace of mane . PRP is a huge and very powerful beast . [ 5 ] In 1935 , four ligers from two litters were reared in DT Zoological Gardens of Bloemfontein , South Africa . Three of them , a male and two females , were still living in 1953 . DT male weighed 340 kg ( 750 lb ) and stood a foot and a half ( 45 cm ) taller than a full grown male lion at DT shoulder . Although ligers are more commonly found than tigons today , in At Home in DT Zoo ( 1961 ) , Gerald Iles wrote " For DT record I must say IN I have never seen a liger , a hybrid obtained by crossing a lion with a tigress . PRP seem to be even rarer than tigons . " [ 6 ] DT liger is often believed to represent DT largest known cat in DT NN . [ 1 ] Males reach a total length of 3 to 3.6 m ( 9.8 to 11.8 ft ) , [ 7 ] [ 8 ] which means IN PRP rival even large male lions and tigers in length . [ 9 ] Imprinted genes MD be a factor contributing to DT large size of ligers . [ 10 ] These are genes WDT MD or MD not be expressed on DT parent PRP are inherited from , and WDT occasionally play a role in issues of hybrid growth . For example , in some dog breed crosses , genes WDT are expressed only when maternally - inherited cause DT young to grow larger than is typical for either parent breed . This growth is not seen in DT paternal breeds , as such genes are normally " counteracted " by genes inherited from DT female of DT appropriate breed . [ 11 ] Other big cat hybrids can reach similar sizes ; DT litigon , a rare hybrid of a male lion and a female tigon , is roughly DT same size as DT liger , with a male named Cubanacan ( at DT Alipore Zoo in India ) reaching 363 kg ( 800 lb ) . [ 12 ] DT extreme rarity of these second - generation hybrids MD make PRP difficult to ascertain whether PRP are larger or smaller , on average , than DT liger . PRP is wrongly believed IN ligers continue to grow throughout their lives due to hormonal issues . [ 13 ] PRP MD be IN PRP simply grow far more during their growing NNS and take longer to reach their full adult size . Further growth in shoulder height and body length is not seen in ligers over six NNS old , as in both lions and tigers . Male ligers RB have DT same levels of testosterone on average as an adult male lion , yet are azoospermic in accordance with Haldane 's rule . In addition , female ligers MD RB attain great size , weighing approximately 320 kg ( 705 lb ) and reaching 3.05 m ( 10 ft ) long on average , and are often fertile . In contrast , pumapards ( hybrids between pumas and leopards ) tend to exhibit dwarfism . Ligers are about DT same size as DT prehistoric Smilodon populator and American lion . Hercules , DT largest non-obese liger , is recognised by DT Guinness Book of NNP Records as DT largest living cat on NNP , weighing 418.2 kg ( 922 lb ) . [ 14 ] [ 15 ] Hercules was featured on DT Today Show , Good Morning America , Anderson Cooper 360 , Inside Edition , and in a Maxim article in 2005 , when he was only three NNS old and already weighed 408.25 kg ( 900 lb ) . DT Valley of DT Kings Animal Sanctuary in Wisconsin had a male liger named Nook who weighed over 550 kg ( 1,213 lb ) . [ 2 ] [ 16 ] To compare , DT records for DT lion and tiger in captivity are under 1,100 pounds ( 500 kg ) . [ 17 ] [ 18 ] Shasta , a ligress ( female liger ) was born at DT Hogle Zoo in Salt Lake City on 14 NNP 1948 and died in 1972 at age 24 . [ CD ] Nook died in 2007 , at 21 NNS old . [ 2 ] [ 16 ] Hobbs , a male liger at DT Sierra Safari Zoo in Reno , Nevada , lived to almost 15 NNS of age before succumbing to liver failure and weighed 450 kg ( 992 lb ) . [ 20 ] This liger was born in 1943 and died in 1960 . South Africa has two ligers at its zoo at Bloemfontein . [ 21 ] DT fertility of hybrid big cat females is well documented across a number of different hybrids . This is in accordance with Haldane 's rule : in hybrids of animals whose sex is determined by sex chromosomes , if CD sex is absent , rare or sterile , PRP is DT heterogametic sex ( DT NN with two different sex chromosomes e.g. X and Y ) .[ clarification needed ] According to Wild Cats of DT NNP ( 1975 ) by C. A. W. Guggisberg , ligers and tigons were long thought to be sterile ; however , in 1943 , a fifteen - NN - old hybrid between a lion and an ' Island ' tiger was successfully mated with a lion at DT Munich Hellabrunn Zoo . DT female cub , though of delicate NN , was raised to adulthood . [ 22 ] In September 2012 , DT Russian Novosibirsk Zoo announced DT birth of a " liliger " , which is DT offspring of a liger mother and a lion father . DT cub was named Kiara . [ 23 ] Ligers have a tiger - JJ striped pattern WDT is very faint upon a lionesque tawny background . In addition , PRP MD inherit rosettes from DT lion parent ( lion cubs are rosetted and some adults retain faint markings ) . These markings MD be black , dark brown or sandy . DT background color MD be correspondingly tawny , sandy or golden . In common with tigers , their underparts are pale . DT actual pattern and color depend on which subspecies DT parents were and on how DT genes interact in DT offspring . White tigers have been crossed with lions to produce " white " ( actually pale golden ) ligers . In theory , white tigers MD be crossed with white lions to produce white , very pale or even stripeless ligers . EX are no black ligers . Very few melanistic tigers have ever been recorded , most being due to excessive markings ( pseudo - melanism or abundism ) rather than true melanism ; no reports of black lions have ever been substantiated . As blue or Maltese tigers probably no longer exist , gray or blue ligers are exceedingly improbable . PRP is not impossible for a liger to be white , but PRP is very rare . Keeping DT two species separate has been standard procedure .[ citation needed ] However , ligers have occurred , and do occur , by accident in captivity . Several AZA zoos are reported to have ligers .[ citation needed ] DT USA holds DT greatest population of around 30 ligers . NNP holds about 20 ligers . EX are a few NNS worldwide WDT hold a few , but probably less than 100 exist worldwide . [ 24 ] As with DT tigon , DT liger exists only in captivity . Historically , DT Asiatic lion and DT Bengal tiger co-occurred in some Asian NNS , and EX are legends of male lions mating with tigresses in DT wilderness , or of ligers existing RB . [ 3 ] DT Caspian tiger co-occurred with DT lion in places IN northern Iran and eastern Anatolia ( Turkey ) . [ 25 ] In December 2013 , DT first white ligers were born at Myrtle Beach Safari in Myrtle Beach , South Carolina to a white male lion and a white female tiger . text: Agonies of DT feet : Four common foot problems PRP develop when DT joint formed by DT metatarsal and proximal phalanx bones of DT big toe fall out of their normal , relatively straight alignment and angle out , creating an outward bulge at DT base of DT big toe . DT bursa WDT cushions DT joint MD RB VB inflamed and enlarge . Often DT end of DT metatarsal bone becomes larger and misshapen . Causes . Some NNS have a natural tendency to develop bunions because DT big toe 's metatarsal bone is splayed out to begin with . Wear - and - tear and being overweight can splay PRP out even further . Lack of an arch and overpronation ( walking on DT inside of your foot ) put more weight on DT big toe and its metatarsal - phalangeal joint . Jamming feet into narrow shoes puts backward pressure on DT big toe , so PRP buckles out , forming a bunion . To continue reading this article , PRP must login . text: Internet TROLLS , RB known as paid “ forum posters ” , “ internet bloggers , ” or if PRP call them what PRP really are , SHILLS , are increasingly being employed by private corporations and contracted agencies , sometimes for marketing purposes , but mostly to distract from DT truth and prevent JJ outcry about dangerous programs such as geoengineering , genetically modified foods , and any issue where profiteers put their bottom line and lust for control over DT destruction of DT NN and at DT expense of our NN . DT geoengineering trolls , specifically , are employed by DT two main disinformation sites , metaxxxx and contrailxxxxxxx , both run by a gaming programmer . He and his band of hired internet trolls lack expertise in NN , meteorology or any other field related to geoengineering , yet claim to be experts in atmospheric NN , and fancy themselves “ debunkers ” . ( Psychological Warfare – discredit , distract , intimidate , frustrate , divide & conquer ) – Disinformation shills often make outrageous comments for DT sole purpose of deflecting focus from DT truth to distract PRP by creating a “ controversial debate ” where none truly exists . Often , trolls use DT “ Trojan Horse ” method to attempt to elicit an emotional response from NNS online , to evoke hostility with DT intent of twisting PRP around to make DT person look volatile , a classic “ character assassination ” tactic to discredit them , making them appear weak . On some occasions , PRP intentionally keep pushing a person into a heated argument , and will VB so far as to “ report ” DT person as being a “ threat ” to try to VB them kicked off of DT forum . Another major character assassination tactic is to highlight any negative or perceived flaw of an otherwise reputable person , whether true or false , to intentionally discredit them in an attempt to invalidate their viewpoint and make them seem baseless , to detract focus from DT information PRP are sharing . DT trolls often “ make stuff up ” if PRP ca n’t find anything real to highlight for this goal , after all , shills are paid liars . text: A rare , multispecies brawl unfolded recently in DT deep ocean off DT coast of Hawaii . In CD corner , an oceanic whitetip shark ( Carcharhinus longimanus ) — a 7 - foot - long ( 2.1 meters ) predator capable of diving up to 1,000 feet ( 300 m ) below DT surface in pursuit of prey . In DT other corner … PRP 's not clear . But whatever PRP was , PRP was huge , PRP had tentacles and PRP put up a hell of a fight . Undersea photographer Deron Verbeck caught DT aftermath of this mysterious scrap when he snapped a picture of DT offending shark , scarred all along its flank with strange circular patterns and dots . According to a NN published June 3 in DT Journal of Fish Biology , EX are only a handful of creatures in Hawaiian waters capable of creating scars IN DT , and PRP are all enormous cephalopods . While PRP 's impossible to be sure what exactly scarred DT shark , DT researchers argue IN PRP MD have been a " phantom of DT deep " — another name for DT elusive giant squid ( Architeuthis dux ) . Giant squids are mysterious denizens of DT deep ocean , thought to be able to grow anywhere from 33 to 43 feet ( 10 to 13 m ) in length . Because DT sharks are known to dive to extreme depths on foraging missions , PRP 's feasible IN an unlucky whitetip MD find itself snoot - to - sucker with a giant squid . DT MD be what happened to DT scarred shark in DT photo . Only three types of squids known to inhabit Hawaiian waters MD have created DT marks , DT team concluded : a squid in DT genus Thysanoteuthis or Megalocranchia ( both known to grow up to nearly 7 feet ) or DT giant squid . JJ other details of DT encounter remain a mystery . For example , who threw DT first punch ? ( Or bite ? Or slap ? ) According to DT researchers , this is DT first NN such large tentacle markings have been observed on a shark , so PRP 's hard to say whether DT shark was acting in offense or defense . However , " DT lack of any obvious wounding suggests PRP were more likely defensive ( i.e. DT shark attacked DT cephalopod ) , " DT researchers wrote in DT NN . text: With DT round - DT - clock British NN coverage of DT royal family in DT days leading up to DT big day for Prince Harry and Meghan Markle , PRP MD be hard not to conclude IN this NN 's wedding of weddings is a source of delight for every Briton . But not everyone in Britain remains as excited as DT thousands already crowding into Windsor to claim a spot WDT will allow them to grab a glimpse of DT wedding couple and DT pomp and circumstance . Social NN was littered with all kinds of memes deriding DT wedding ceremony . Oscar - winning British actress Emma Thompson chimed in , telling a TV interviewer : " EX 's not a single thought about PRP in my head to share with PRP . " And some viewers are expressing frustration with DT incessant focus on DT wedding — on DT preparations , who 's coming and not , what DT couple will wear and what PRP will eat . DT BBC Breakfast show incurred DT wrath of some for its all - consuming focus on DT royal wedding and its constant and breathless updates . On Twitter some viewers grumbled : " Non-stop coverage of DT # RoyalWedding on @BBCBreakfast this morning . Thankfully , EX 's no other NN happening at all , " CD wrote . Another remarked : " REPORT SOME ACTUAL BL ***Y NN # bbcbreakfast # RoyalWedding . " DT activist anti-monarchy group Republic , which wants DT monarchy abolished and replaced with an elected head of NN , demanded on its website Friday IN DT BBC and other British channels stop celebrating DT royal wedding and report in a balanced way . " DT monarchy is a contentious issue . PRP provides PRP with a head of NN and lies at DT heart of our constitution . This issue must be treated by broadcasters as politics , not entertainment , " VBD Graham Smith of Republic . " DT BBC has willfully ignored a string of stories WDT might put a different complexion on DT wedding story . PRP continue to celebrate and promote DT monarchy , not simply report on PRP . " Republic VBD BBC NN had largely ignored stories about DT removal of homeless NNS from streets in Windsor and " widespread criticism " of how much money DT British taxpayer will have to pay for DT wedding . PRP pointed to a poll conducted by YouGov this week WDT suggested nearly a third of DT British NN MD VB to see DT monarchy abolished . DT poll showed DT Scottish as DT least likely to VB DT queen or care about DT future of DT monarchy , with key findings showing IN north of DT border with England fewer than half of Scots approve of DT queen and most believe IN Britain 's lawmakers should swear allegiance to DT country and not DT monarch . Three - quarters of Scots told DT pollsters PRP were not interested in Saturday 's wedding . Royal critics have highlighted DT bad NN for DT monarchy in DT poll . But overall DT royal family and DT institution of DT nonarchy remains popular , with 68 percent of DT British NN believing DT institution is good for DT country . DT poll coincided with an important landmark for DT queen , who is now DT longest - serving monarch in British history , overtaking Queen Victoria 's reign of 63 NNS , seven months and two days . Despite DT mounting criticism during DT week of DT JJ costs of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle 's big day , DT royal family tried to disarm possible criticism early by announcing IN PRP MD meet DT costs of DT wedding itself . But because PRP RB receive money from taxpayers , PRP was unclear how much of their private money MD defray DT costs . And British taxpayers will still have to foot a huge bill to cover DT security and municipal costs . Thames Valley police will be providing most of DT security in Windsor . DT last royal wedding in 2011 between Prince William and Kate Middleton cost nearly $ 8.7 million , according to Britain 's Press Association . Some commentators VBD DT costs should be lower this NN because DT wedding is being held outside London , reducing logistical challenges . British minsters declined to comment on spending related to DT royal wedding , saying no information MD be released before DT event . But Britain 's Independent newspaper reported Friday IN DT cost of DT big event MD be much higher than previously thought . Wedding planning service Bridebook VBD DT wedding itself MD most likely cost $ 43 million . And some security analysts estimated DT security bill at $ 40 million — a big jump from DT 2011 royal wedding because of heightened threat levels in Britain following a string of terror attacks over DT past 18 months . British ministers say any JJ money used for DT wedding is money well spent , arguing DT event will encourage more tourists — especially Americans — to visit Britain . But no evidence was supplied by DT NN to show IN DT was DT case in 2011 . "

text: EX 's no doubt IN EX 's been a rise in DT popularity of marathons and their accompanying half - marathons — especially in recent NNS .﻿﻿ But if PRP believe these events are reserved for elite athletes , VB again . DT fee increases to $ 295 for residents who are nonmembers , and to $ 358 for non-U.S. residents .﻿﻿ DT costs of putting on a marathon begin to accumulate months before DT race actually happens . text: Believe PRP or not , your feet are a good barometer of your overall NN . From a pesky foot pain to more serious symptoms IN numbness , your feet often show symptoms of NN before any other part of your body . No hair on your feet or toes “ Bald ” feet can be a sign of poor circulation as a result of vascular NN . What can PRP do ? Although DT hair MD never return ( which is n’t necessarily a terrible thing ! ) , PRP ’ll VB to see a doctor about improving your circulation and getting your vascular NN in check . If PRP have a wound on your foot WDT just wo n’t heal , PRP MD be at risk for diabetes . Elevated blood glucose levels over NN can lead to nerve damage in DT feet , and so PRP MD not feel an ulcer on your DT bottom of your foot . Left untreated , this can lead to serious consequences , even to amputation . For women , cold feet MD indicate an “ underfunctioning ” thyroid problem , which is DT gland WDT regulates temperature and metabolism . Poor circulation is another possible cause for both men and women . DT solution : Aside from potential thyroid medications , EX ’s not much PRP can do other than bundle up your feet in thick wool socks and slippers to keep warm . If CD or more of your toenails starts to thicken , VB color , and separate from DT skin , PRP probably means PRP have a fungal infection living beneath DT toenail . NNS with diabetes , rheumatoid arthritis , and other immune deficiencies MD be more susceptible than others in contracting toenail fungus . DT solution : See a podiatrist or internist for care and treatment . If your big toe suddenly blows up , PRP MD be experiencing gout . This medieval sounding NN is actually a form of arthritis and is caused by DT build up of DT natural substance , uric acid . Why DT big toe ? DT excess uric acid forms in DT body part with DT lowest temperature , which just happens to be your big toe . Having a persistent “ pins and needles ” feeling in your feet , or actual loss of feeling , can be a sign of peripheral neuropathy . Peripheral neuropathy means EX ’s been some damage to your peripheral nervous system and can be caused by several things , but DT most common are diabetes and alcohol abuse . DT solution : See your doctor and explain your symptoms . DT skin condition psoriasis can RB manifest itself in your toenails . Affecting up to half of those living with psoriasis MD find their toenails ( and fingernails ) to have JJ tiny holes . NNS with DT related joint condition , psoriatic arthritis , RB MD experience this issue . DT pain is usually concentrated in DT heel and gets worse throughout DT day . DT solution : If PRP have persistant pain , see a podiatrist and avoid high heeled shoes . Sunken toenails MD be a sign of anemia . Anemia often shows up in toenails with as concave or spoonlike indentations in DT toes ’ nail beds , and is most prevalent in moderate - to - severe NNS . To be sure , your doctor will VB to do a complete blood count . If PRP experience frequent cramping , try stretching your feet before bed and eating more calcium - rich foods . Sore toe joints MD be a sign of DT degenerative joint NN , rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) . RA typically attacks smaller joints first – IN joints in DT wrist and toes , so pay attention if PRP have a persistent achy feeling or swelling . DT inability to raise DT foot upward from DT heel is called “ drop foot . ” This MD be DT result of nerve damage or trauma in your neck , back , or leg . If PRP experience this , PRP should contact your doctor immediately , since this can be reversed or permanent , depending on what caused PRP and how PRP ’s treated . Dry , flaky skin on DT feet MD be a sign of athlete ’s foot , which is a fungal infection . Athlete ’s foot usually shows up between DT first two toes and usually starts as dry , itchy skin WDT then progresses to inflammation and blisters . If PRP suspect PRP have athlete ’s foot , be sure to keep your feet clean and dry . Toes WDT show a variation of color – from white , to blue , to red – MD be experiencing a symptom of Raynaud ’s NN . DT colors appear as DT vessels spasm . text: DT error was corrected after some investigating by CNBC Quick , how much money MD PRP say EX is in hunting Bigfoot ? DT ’s at least according to DT Wednesday morning assessment of Tom Biscardi ’s Bigfoot Project Investments Inc by FactSet , a data provider WDT tracks publicly traded companies . This week , DT current share price was $ 50.01 , which , with number of shares in DT company outstanding ( 200 million ) , created DT $ 10 billion figure . DT thing is , no NN understands where DT $ 50.01 figure came from , because , as CNBC reports , BGFT ’s current assets are “ $ 221 in cash along with 73 original casts of Bigfoot footprints , a 109 - inch skeleton and a rubber suit from a 2008 Bigfoot hoax . ” ( Filings RB note IN Bigfoot is known by 15 names across DT NN , such as “ Yeti ” in Tibet , “ Yowie ” in Australia and “ Hibagon ” in Japan . DT more PRP VBP . ) Biscardi does not collect a salary . text: Oarfish are large , greatly elongated , pelagic lampriform fish belonging to DT small family Regalecidae . [ 1 ] Found in all temperate to tropical oceans yet rarely seen , DT oarfish family contains three species in two genera . CD of these , DT giant oarfish ( Regalecus glesne ) , is DT longest bony fish alive , growing up to 8 m ( 26 ft ) in length . DT common name oarfish is thought to be in reference either to their highly compressed and elongated bodies , or to DT now discredited belief IN DT fish " row " themselves through DT NN with their pelvic fins . [ 2 ] DT family name Regalecidae is derived from DT Latin regalis , meaning " royal " . DT occasional beachings of oarfish after storms , and their habit of lingering at DT surface when sick or dying , make oarfish a probable source of JJ NN serpent tales . Although DT larger species are considered game fish and are fished commercially to a minor extent , oarfish are rarely caught alive ; their flesh is not well regarded for eating due to its gelatinous consistency . [ 3 ] DT dorsal fin originates from above DT ( relatively large ) eyes and runs DT entire length of DT fish . Of DT approximately 400 dorsal fin rays , DT first 10 to 13 are elongated to varying degrees , forming a trailing crest embellished with reddish spots and flaps of skin at DT ray tips . DT pelvic fins are similarly elongated and adorned , reduced to CD to five rays each . DT pectoral fins are greatly reduced and situated low on DT body . DT anal fin is completely absent and DT caudal fin MD be reduced or absent , as well , with DT body tapering to a fine point . All fins lack true spines . At least CD account , from researchers in NNP Zealand , described DT oarfish as giving off " electric shocks " when touched . [ 2 ] IN other members of its order , DT oarfish has a small yet highly protrusible oblique mouth with no visible teeth . DT body is scaleless and DT skin is covered with easily abraded , silvery guanine . In DT streamer fish ( Agrostichthys parkeri ) , DT skin is clad with hard tubercles . All species lack gas bladders and DT number of gill rakers is variable . Oarfish coloration is RB variable ; DT flanks are commonly covered with irregular bluish to blackish streaks , black dots , and squiggles . These markings quickly fade following death . DT giant oarfish is by far DT largest member of DT family at a published total length of 8 m ( 26 ft ) — with unconfirmed reports of 11 m ( 36 ft ) and 17 m ( 56 ft ) [ 4 ] [ 5 ] [ 6 ] specimens — and 270 kg ( 600 lb ) in weight . [ 7 ] DT streamer fish is known to reach 3 m ( 10 ft ) in length , [ 8 ] while DT largest recorded specimen of Regalecus russelii measured 5.4 m ( 18 ft ) . [ 9 ] Oarfish have DT longest known length of any living species of bony fish . [ 10 ] DT oarfish is thought to inhabit DT epipelagic to mesopelagic ocean layers , ranging from 200 meters ( 660 ft ) to 1,000 meters ( 3,300 ft ) and is rarely seen on DT surface . A few have been found still barely alive , but usually if PRP floats to DT surface , PRP dies . At DT depths DT oarfish live , EX are few or no currents . As a result , PRP build little muscle mass and PRP cannot survive in shallower turbulent NN . [ 11 ] DT members of DT family are known to have a worldwide range . However , human encounters with live oarfish are rare , and distribution information is collated from records of oarfish caught or washed ashore . [ 2 ] Oarfish were first described in 1772 . [ 12 ] Rare encounters with divers and accidental catches have supplied what little is known of oarfish ethology ( behavior ) and ecology . Oarfish are solitary animals and MD frequent significant depths up to 1,000 m ( 3,300 ft ) . An oarfish measuring 3.3 m ( 11 ft ) and 63.5 kg ( 140 lb ) was reported to have been caught in February 2003 using a fishing rod baited with squid at Skinningrove , NNP Kingdom . [ 13 ] A photograph on display in bars , restaurants , guesthouses and markets around Laos and Thailand captioned " Queen of Nāgas seized by DT American Army at Mekhong River , Laos Military Base , on June 27 , 1973 , with DT length of 7.80 metres [ 25.6 ft ] " is , as far as DT caption goes , a hoax . DT photograph itself is real , however , and was taken by Dr. Leo Smith of DT Field Museum , of an oarfish found in September 1996 by NNP NNPS Navy SEAL trainees on DT coast of Coronado , California , USA . [ 14 ] [ 15 ] In 2001 , an oarfish was filmed alive in situ : DT 1.5 - metre ( 4.9 - foot ) fish was spotted by a group of U.S. Navy personnel during DT inspection of a buoy in DT Bahamas . [ 16 ] DT oarfish was observed to propel itself by an amiiform mode of swimming ; DT is , rhythmically undulating DT dorsal fin while keeping DT body itself straight . Perhaps indicating a feeding posture , oarfish have been observed swimming in a vertical orientation , with their long axis perpendicular to DT ocean surface . In this posture , DT downstreaming light MD silhouette DT oarfishes ' prey , making them easier to spot . In July 2008 , NNS captured footage of DT rare fish swimming in its natural habitat in DT mesopelagic zone in DT Gulf of Mexico . PRP is DT first ever confirmed sighting of an oarfish at depth , as most specimens are discovered dying at DT NN surface or washed ashore . DT fish was estimated to be between five and ten metres ( 16 and 33 ft ) in length . [ 17 ] As part of DT SERPENT Project , five observations of apparently healthy oarfish Regalecus glesne by remotely operated vehicles were reported from DT northern Gulf of Mexico between 2008 and 2011 at depths within DT epipelagic and mesopelagic zones . [ 18 ] These observations include DT deepest verified record of R. glesne ( 463–492 m or 1,519 –1,614 ft ) . [ CD ] From December 2009 to March 2010 , unusual numbers of DT slender oarfish Regalecus russelii [ 9 ] ( 竜宮の使い “ Ryūgū - No - Tsukai ” , ) known in Japanese folklore as DT Messenger from DT NNP God 's Palace , appeared in DT waters and on DT beaches of Japan , DT appearance of which is VBN to portend earthquakes . [ 20 ] After DT 2011 Fukushima earthquake and tsunami which killed over 20,000 NNS , JJ pointed to DT oarfish from 2009 – ⁠2010 to build up this myth . [ 21 ] In 2016 , Animal NNP aired an episode of DT television series River Monsters named " Deep NNP Demon " in which Jeremy Wade was filmed during an encounter with a live oarfish while diving . DT oarfish at this location seemed to be using a buoy anchor chain as a guide to ascend to DT surface . On his second diving attempt , he was able to film two live oarfish as PRP ascended relatively close to DT surface . This is DT only known footage of human interaction with a healthy oarfish in its own environment . Wade was even able to touch CD of DT oarfish with his hand . DT oarfish were propelling themselves by an amiiform mode of swimming as noted by other sightings . [ 22 ] In January 2019 two oarfish were found alive in DT nets of fisherman on DT Japanese island of Okinawa . [ 21 ] Oarfish feed primarily on zooplankton , selectively straining tiny euphausiids , shrimp , and other crustaceans from DT NN . Small fish , jellyfish , and squid are RB taken . Large open - ocean carnivores are all likely predators of oarfish . DT oceanodromous Regalecus glesne is recorded as spawning off Mexico from July to December ; all species are presumed to not guard their eggs , and release brightly coloured , buoyant eggs , up to six millimetres ( 0.24 in ) across , which are incorporated into DT zooplankton . DT eggs hatch after about three weeks into highly active larvae WDT feed on other zooplankton . DT larvae have little resemblance to DT adults , with long dorsal and pelvic fins and extensible mouths . [ 2 ] Larvae and juveniles have been observed drifting just below DT surface . In contrast , adult oarfish are rarely seen at DT surface when not sick or injured . • Fishes : An Introduction to ichthyology . Peter B. Moyle and Joseph J. Cech , Jr ; p. 338 . Printed in 2004 . text: A run-of - DT - mill sasquatch story is spiced up — and aged down — by telling DT tale not from DT perspective of DT creature himself , but from his human teenage son in “ DT Son of Bigfoot . ” DT animated adventure follows Adam ( voiced by Pappy Faulkner ) as he undergoes a transformation WDT is far more than just puberty . This English - language Belgian production does n’t feature quite DT budget , visuals or imagination of its American blockbuster counterparts , but PRP will likely provide a fun 90 - minute diversion for kids . Adam is bullied at school , and he longs to VB more about a father he never met . When he starts sprouting wild hair and his feet outgrow his shoes , he soon discovers IN his father ( Chris Parson ) is n’t dead IN he ’s been told . Instead , he ’s a sasquatch and has been hiding in DT woods because evil corporation HairCo. wants to experiment on him in their quest to cure baldness . DT script misses DT spark of better family films with its overly complicated plot and lackluster dialogue . However , “ DT Son of Bigfoot ” features some nice animation , particularly in its action scenes , and its moments between father and son are especially sweet . text: SAN RAMON , Calif . --( BUSINESS WIRE ) -- Nov 21 , 2018 -- Chevron Corporation ( NYSE : CVX ) today announced IN DT Chevron - operated Big Foot deepwater project , located in DT U.S. Gulf of Mexico , has started crude oil and natural gas production . DT field is located approximately 225 miles ( 360 km ) south of NNP Orleans , La. , in a NN depth of approximately 5,200 feet ( 1,584 m. ) . This press release features multimedia . View DT full release here : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20181121005441/en/ DT Chevron - operated Big Foot project uses a 15 - slot drilling and production tension - leg platform , DT deepest of its kind in DT NN , and is designed for a capacity of 75,000 barrels of oil and 25 million cubic feet of natural gas per day . ( Photo : Business Wire ) DT Big Foot field was discovered in 2006 , is estimated to contain total recoverable resources of more than 200 million oil - equivalent barrels and has a projected production life of 35 NNS . DT project uses a 15 - slot drilling and production tension - leg platform , DT deepest of its kind in DT NN , and is designed for a capacity of 75,000 barrels of oil and 25 million cubic feet of natural gas per day . “ DT Big Foot project strengthens Chevron ’s deepwater portfolio and further demonstrates IN DT Gulf of Mexico is an integral part of our diverse JJ portfolio and long - term strategy , ” VBD Jeff Shellebarger , NNP of Chevron North America Exploration and Production . “ DT project advances our interest in safely providing reliable , affordable NN to meet a growing JJ demand . ” Chevron ’s subsidiary , Chevron U.S.A. Inc. , is DT operator of Big Foot with a 60 percent working interest . Co-owners are Equinor Gulf of Mexico LLC ( 27.5 % ) and Marubeni Oil & Gas ( USA ) LLC ( 12.5 % ) . Chevron Corporation is CD of DT NN ’s leading integrated NN companies . Through its subsidiaries WDT conduct business worldwide , DT company is involved in virtually every facet of DT NN industry . Chevron explores for , produces and transports crude oil and natural gas ; refines , markets and distributes transportation fuels and lubricants ; manufactures and sells petrochemicals and additives ; generates power ; and develops and deploys technologies WDT enhance business value in every aspect of DT company ’s operations . Chevron is based in San Ramon , Calif . More information about Chevron is available at www.chevron.com . Its abstract forms and high - velocity , intersecting colors accompany arriving employees on their long walk from DT security turnstiles to DT elevators , and catch DT eye of passersby on DT corner of Vesey and West Streets , which is where I had arranged to meet DT artist on a frigid , windy morning in early January . text: ­ PRP is amazing , but DT total amount of gold in DT NN is a surprisingly small q­uantity . Here 's how PRP can calculate DT total amount WDT is available . If PRP look at a page IN this NN , or if PRP look PRP up in an encyclopedia , PRP will find IN DT annual worldwide production of gold is something IN 50 million troy ounces per NN . Gold has a specific gravity of 19.3 , meaning IN PRP is 19.3 times heavier than NN . So gold weighs 19.3 kilograms per liter . A liter is a cube WDT measures 10 centimeters ( about 4 inches ) on a side . EX are 32.15 troy ounces in a kilogram . Therefore , DT NN produces a cube of gold WDT is about 4.3 meters ( about 14 feet ) on each side every NN . In other words , all of DT gold produced worldwide in CD NN MD just about fit in DT average person 's living room ! This cube weighs 1,555,210 kilograms ( 3,110,420 pounds ) . A recent spot price for gold was $ 256.10 U.S. -- using DT number , all of DT gold produced in a NN is worth $ 12,805,000,000 . DT 's a lot of money , but not an unimaginable amount . For example , DT 's about how much DT Pentagon spent launching DT GPS satellite system . NASA 's budget in 1998 was $ 13.6 billion . Figuring out DT total amount of gold WDT has been produced by man is a little harder . To VB at some kind of estimate , let 's figure IN DT NN has been producing gold at 50 million ounces a NN for 200 NNS . DT number is probably a little high , but when PRP figure IN DT Aztecs and DT Egyptians produced a fair amount of gold for a long NN , PRP 's probably not too far off . Fifty million ounces * 200 NNS = 10 billion ounces . Ten billion ounces of gold MD fit into a cube roughly 25 meters ( about 82 feet ) on a side . Consider IN DT Washington Monument measures 55 feet by 55 feet at its base and is 555 feet tall ( 17 x 17 x 170 m ) . DT means IN if PRP MD somehow gather every scrap of gold WDT man has ever mined into CD place , PRP MD only build about CD - third of DT Washington Monument . Platinum is even more scarce than gold . Only 3.6 million troy ounces are produced per NN . Its specific gravity is 21.45 , and PRP was discovered in DT 18th century , not in 3,000 B.C. If PRP assume IN DT NN has produced 3.6 million ounces per NN for 50 NNS to estimate DT total worldwide supply , all of DT platinum in DT NN MD fit in a cube WDT is 6.3 meters ( about 20 feet ) on a side . text: Okay . Let s begin having a look at some modern propaganda techniques . On two separate occasions , someone mentioned something to me about terrorism , or DT war on terror , and I responded by asking " PRP do VB IN EX is indisputable scientific evidence WDT proves beyond any doubt IN DT Twin Towers were demolished with explosives , right ? " For me , any discussion of terrorism has to begin with DT understanding of what actually happened on 9 - 11 , rather than what PRP were told to believe . On both occasions , DT person I was talking to responded by saying " I heard IN DT NN of Mexico saw a UFO . " DT first NN this happened , I shook my head and thought to myself " what DT hell is this girl thinking ? Maybe DT NN of Mexico sniffs glue and sees all kinds of things , but what does CD thing have to do with DT other ? How did she make DT jump from 9 - 11 to Mexican UFOs without a sentence between DT two subjects ? DT second NN PRP happened I thought to myself " Holy shit . This is a conditioned response . " Somehow , DT herd has been taught to immediately make an association with UFOs , Bigfoot , or DT ghost of Elvis whenever someone talks to them about crimes committed by NNS within our NN . This is incredibly convenient for a NN comprised of crooks and perverts , but how did PRP accomplish this ? If PRP take a look at a typical " NN website " , youll see all kinds of revelations about DT 9 - 11 attacks , DT FEMA concentration camps , and possibly DT latest information on DT shadowy and elusive group known only as " DT NNP NNP Order , " and youll RB see DT latest crop circle designs , DT most recent UFO photos , DT image of Christ in an NN cube , a first - hand account from DT man who wrestled Bigfoot , DT true location of DT sunken city of Atlantis , and all manner of non-sense designed to make any important information appear ridiculous by this association . DT Daily Globe is CD of two newspapers I m aware of DT exists for this same purpose . This is CD of DT thin papers WDT usually sports a headline involving 800 - pound Siamese twins suing each other for and against surgical separation , or DT poor man whose wife was mysteriously transformed into a hammer - head shark . Because everyone knows IN these newspapers epitomize incredulity , PRP re DT perfect place to print any information WDT needs to be immediately discredited . " ALIEN ABDUCTEE SAYS U.S. GOVT BEHIND 9 - 11 ATTACKS " MD be a probable headline . See how this works ? PRP dont have to buy DT paper . Nobody does . A few copies are prominently displayed near every supermarket checkout line , and this is what NNS remember when someone tries to warn them IN DT NN of this nation has gotten completely out of control . Their mind makes an association between DT important information , and DT ridiculous information , and PRP feel confident IN its nothing PRP need to worry about , but PRP MD carry on DT silly conversation about UFOs and stuff just to be polite . Silently PRP re convinced IN because PRP tried to warn them about their criminal NN , PRP must RB spend your nights on DT roof searching DT skies for E.T . Theres RB no shortage of TV and movie characters who openly insist IN our NN is involved in all kinds of heinous activity , but every last CD of them is a lunatic . Cosmo Kramer is a recent example . He promotes alternative medicine , doesnt trust DT NN , and besides DT , hes completely off DT wall . Not DT type of lunatic PRP MD fear , but hes definitely not someone PRP MD look to for reliable information , or even sane discourse . Look closely at every TV character who questions or mistrusts DT NN , and PRP will see IN this behavior is linked with CD abnormal personality after another . DT sub -conscious lesson here is IN anyone who questions DT NN or suggests PRP MD be involved in any crime has an abnormal personality , so PRP can quickly dismiss everything he has to say . Through decades of repetition of these messages , youve been taught to ignore any criminality on DT part of anyone in our NN , and anyone who might make such an accusation . While PRP were being so trained , PRP were robbed of your wealth and freedom . EX are NNS commonly referred to as " NN theorists " . In reality , absolutely no NN hangs around theorizing about conspiracies , but this label is applied to anyone who feels a civic duty to warn other Americans of criminal activity within their NN . DT " NN theorist " is a character WDT only exists on television and in movies , and this character , who is always a lunatic , was created for PRP to make an association with when someone tries to warn PRP about NN crimes . DT result is IN when someone tries to explain to PRP IN your own NN is doing all PRP can to either kill or enslave PRP , he MD as well be crying to PRP about his wife turning into a shark during his most recent UFO abduction , regardless of any proof he has . For most Americans , DT NNS on TV have replaced their normal human society , and DT exchange of ideas PRP MD have once had with neighbors and others in their community is now fed to them via DT almighty tube . PRP are fed two sides of a debate , allowed to choose between them , and this choice allows them to feel a bond with other NNS of CD opinion or DT other , and lets them feel IN PRP re wise enough to have an opinion in DT matter , and free enough to express PRP . DT reality here is IN neither side of DT debate ever contains DT entire truth of DT matter , but just enough information , or misinformation , to make them feel PRP re informed , and give them something to enter a futile debate with , if PRP did actually talk to their neighbor . Political correctness silenced DT rest of them by teaching a reluctance to saying or hearing anything controversial or possibly disturbing . What Americans are shown on TV are allegedly DT products of various independent broadcasting companies who compete for viewers who will supposedly watch DT commercial messages WDT are injected into DT entertainment , but if this is DT case , why DT incredible similarity between DT allegedly competing companies ? Wouldnt PRP VBP IN eventually CD network or Hollywood studio might experiment with a sane and respectable character who doesnt trust DT NN ? Are EX any other typified characters WDT exist on all networks ? As PRP happens , EX are JJ . Just to name a few ; every father is an idiot , as is every private citizen who owns a firearm , every mother is an over - worked and under - appreciated slave , everyone who works for DT NN is a hero who endlessly risks his life for your protection , and everyone who sells drugs is black or hispanic . Every Arab is a screaming madman , and every Jew is kind , gentle and wise . Every homosexual is moral , kind , and intelligent , and everyone who lives in a rural area of DT country is an idiot . I dont need to VB on . PRP can probably name a few of your own , but DT important point here is IN DT same personality traits transcend all characters on all networks . This is obviously no accident . If PRP can see common themes and messages WDT are being foisted upon DT NN by all networks , PRP proves IN either EX is no real competition between them and PRP all share a common political goal , or IN all of their programing is being influenced or dictated by an outside entity , or both . Nothing else can explain DT incredible similarity of stereotyped personality traits in all these fictional characters . Now DT next logical step MD be to recognize and list as JJ of these common themes as possible , and see if PRP all serve a particular political agenda . Just by skimming DT surface PRP see an effort to thwart private gun ownership , discourage masculinity , encourage homosexuality , promote women to " head of household " status , and foster hatred against all Arabs . Then EX are DT constant attacks on DT " antiquated document " known as DT Bill of Rights , which permeate every episode of " Law and Order " and " CSI " ** ( if not for DT silly forth amendment , all those mangled NNS MD be alive , kind of thing ) . Whose interests does this propaganda serve ? Who benefits by trying to shape JJ opinion in this direction ? Certainly not DT TV viewer , because as well see in DT next episode of our action - packed adventure through main - stream NN propaganda , DT TV viewers been taught to work against his own self - interests . text: By DT NN PRP reach your 50th birthday , PRP 've prob-ably RB reached another milestone : PRP 've put 75,000 miles on your feet . PRP MD reach this milestone much earlier if PRP 've led a foot - active lifestyle . By age 50 , PRP MD have lost nearly half of DT fatty padding on DT soles of your feet . And PRP MD be wearing a shoe WDT 's a size bigger than what PRP wore in your 20s , in part because of weight gain WDT puts greater pres-sure on your feet , and in part because your ligaments and tendons have lost some of their elasticity ( which RB predisposes them to potentially painful ruptures or microtears ) . If PRP 've given birth , PRP have another reason for DT increase in shoe size : hormones released during pregnancy RB cause ligaments to relax . Menopause , too , can affect foot NN . Unless countered by medications or exercise , DT loss of estrogen and other hormonal changes generally lead to lower bone density , resulting in osteoporosis if enough bone mass is lost . This condition can raise DT risk of stress fractures ( hairline breaks ) in any of DT bones of DT foot . Unless treated appropriately , stress fractures can worsen and cause DT bones to shift out of place . To learn more about your feet and ways to keep them pain - free , read Healthy Feet , a Special NNP Report from Harvard NNP School . text: Monos is set in a South American paradise but comes off IN Lord of DT Flies in hell . Following an eight - strong group of teen soldiers and their adult prisoner of war , PRP is sensual , and gorgeous and intensely , continuously disturbing . DT kids – Dog , Lady , Bigfoot , Boom - Boom , Rambo , Swede , Wolf , Smurf – are left to their own devices except for DT occasional visit from “ DT Messenger ” , who works for whatever organisation has recruited them . So PRP scrap and kiss and fire their AK - 47s into DT sky . Alejandro Landes , DT film ’s 39 - NN - old director , says PRP does n’t matter who PRP ’re fighting for . “ Colombia ’s been war - torn for so JJ decades . I ’ve seen DT violence happen from DT left and I ’ve seen PRP happen from DT right . My grandfather ’s favourite place in DT NN , his farm WDT he worked all his life to buy , became DT headquarters for DT most gruesome rightwing paramilitary group , DT AUC , and I ’ve had part of my family kidnapped by guerrillas . ” Who , exactly ? “ My grandfather ’s sister , my cousin … things IN DT . ” Were PRP freed ? “ Some yes , some no . So DT is something WDT I had seen and experienced . ” These experiences inspired and informed Monos . PRP ’re given no specifics of NN and place – PRP ’s somewhere in Latin America . Landes , who lives in NNP York , has Colombian roots but grew up in Ecuador , his parents having left Medellín in DT 1980s to escape DT violence . To find his actors , he and his producers sifted through 800 tapes , selecting 25 possibles totake part in a mock training camp for four weeks in DT Andes . Most had never acted before , though EX was CD major exception : Moisés Arias ( Bigfoot ) was a regular in Miley Cyrus ’s Disney series Hannah Montana . CD PRP saw on a tape playing basketball , a kid with a close crop , referred to on DT court as Matt , but in fact named Sofia ( Buenaventura ) . She plays Rambo in DT film and , says Landes , “ was very inspirational for DT fluidity of DT character ” . He calls DT character , who is written as male , “ post - gender ” . Researching DT film , Landes visited Colombian reinsertion camps , meeting adult rebel fighters who had laid down their guns and wanted to enter civil society . In CD he found Wilson Salazar , a man with dwarfism who became a child soldier at 11 and deserted when he was 24 . EX was a sizeable price on his head , dead or alive . “ He was very good at what he did , ” says Landes . “ He had risen to be part of a column called Teófilo Forero , CD of DT most feared combat units . He was an amazing destroyer of things . ” Landes hired Salazar as a military consultant , then asked him to play DT Messenger , too , as he was so convincing . At DT camp , Salazar woke his young charges at 4 am each day . PRP ’d undertake acting exercises in DT mornings , and in DT afternoons Salazar MD give them clandestine military training . “ PRP was intense , ” says Landes . “ PRP was a boot - camp scenario – DT kids were living , sleeping , eating together , everything together , all at DT same NN . ” Landes then selected his eight , tweaking DT screenplay to fit . DT shoot was yet more full - on . DT opening mountaintop segment was shot at almost 14,000 ft ( 4,300 m ) : punishingly cold and wet . “ PRP move slower up RB , ” says Landes . “ EX ’s low oxygen , PRP move in a bit of a daze . ” On DT first day , someone from DT camera department had an epileptic seizure . A baptism by fire , thought Landes ; things will VB easier . PRP did not . Mules carried their food ; Colombia ’s national kayak team helped with filming on DT rapids ; a family of local gold miners built their military tents . EX was no electricity , no running NN , no refrigerated food and torrential downpours all night every night . EX were food rations . DT shoot took its toll . “ NNS were dropping IN flies , including me , ” says Landes . “ Everyone had their day . Everyone cried on this movie . PRP ’re working six - day weeks , very high - intensity scenarios . ” Landes himself was working seven - day weeks . CD morning he woke up and MD n’t move . DT gold miners put him on a stretcher and carried him up a canyon until PRP reached a local JJ centre . He cried on DT journey , distraught IN DT production might collapse . He was back behind DT camera 20 hours later . “ I VBP PRP was just DT stress , ” he says . “ And DT ration diet . ” PRP was worth PRP . DT film has earned universal raves – and a special prize in San Sebastián film festival , Spain , for accurately reflecting “ DT values and reality ” of LGBTQ NNS . DT story is a nightmare in which nothing – gender , sexuality , political allegiance – is muddled or irrelevant . “ PRP ’s not binary . DT ’s why I VBP PRP reaches much further than Colombia . DT is what ’s most timely and relevant . I wanted to make sure IN DT film spoke not to DT moment but to PRP as a species . ” • Monos is released in DT UK on 25 October

text: Genetic testing confirms DT legendary Bigfoot is a human relative WDT arose some 15,000 NNS ago — at least according to a press release issued by a company called DNA Diagnostics detailing supposed work by a Texas veterinarian . DT release and alleged NN by Melba S. Ketchum RB suggests such cryptids had sex with modern human females WDT resulted in hairy hominin hybrids , but DT scientific community is dubious about her claim . " A team of NNS can verify IN their five - NN long DNA NN , currently under peer - review , confirms DT existence of a novel hominin hybrid species , commonly called ' Bigfoot ' or ' Sasquatch , ' living in North America , " DT release reads . " Researchers ' extensive DNA sequencing suggests IN DT legendary Sasquatch is a human relative WDT arose approximately 15,000 NNS ago . " For her NN , Ketchum obtained three " whole nuclear genomes from purported Sasquatch samples . DT genome sequencing shows IN Sasquatch mtDNA is identical to modern Homo sapiens , but Sasquatch nuDNA is a novel , unknown hominin related to Homo sapiens and other primate species . " ( Mitochondrial DNA , or mtDNA , is DT DNA WDT resides in DT cell 's NN - producing structures , and is typically passed down from mothers , while nuclear DNA , nuDNA , resides in DT cells ' nuclei and is passed down from both parents to offspring . ) " Our data indicate IN DT North American Sasquatch is a hybrid species , DT result of males of an unknown hominin species crossing with female Homo sapiens , " DT statement reads . [ Infographic : Tracking Belief in Bigfoot ] So where 's DT evidence ? Well , EX is none . Not yet , anyway : Ketchum 's research has not appeared in any peer - reviewed scientific journal , and EX 's no indication when DT might happen . If DT data are good and DT NN is sound , any reputable NN journal MD jump at DT chance to be DT first to publish this groundbreaking information . Until then , Ketchum has refused to let anyone else see her evidence . Of course DT history of Bigfoot is rife with exaggerated and premature claims about proof of DT creature 's existence . For decades , various types of evidence have been offered as final , definitive proof , ranging from Bigfoot hair to blood to dead bodies . Without exception , DT evidence has always been hoaxed , misidentification or inconclusive . Because Ketchum has released no information at all about her findings ( nor have PRP been examined by outside experts ) , PRP 's impossible to evaluate DT validity of her conclusions . But an important clue can be found in her statement IN " Sasquatch mtDNA is identical to modern Homo sapiens . " If DT mitochontrial DNA is identical to Homo sapiens ( i.e. , modern humans ) , then this suggests CD of two options . DT first , endorsed by Ketchum , is IN Bigfoot ancestors had sex with women about 15,000 NNS ago and created a half - human hybrid species currently hiding across North America . [ Rumor or Reality : DT Creatures of Cryptozoology ] EX is , however , another , simpler interpretation of such results : DT samples were contaminated . Whatever DT sample originally was — Bigfoot , bear , human or something else — PRP 's possible IN DT NNS who collected and handled DT specimens accidentally introduced their DNA into DT sample , which can easily occur with something as innocent as a spit , sneeze or cough . No NN outside of Ketchum 's team knows how this alleged Bigfoot DNA was collected , from where or by whom . PRP MD have been collected by DT NN 's top forensics experts , or by a pair of amateur Bigfoot buffs with no evidence - gathering training . How did DT team definitively determine IN DT samples were from a Bigfoot ? Did PRP take a blood or saliva sample from a living Bigfoot ? If so , how did PRP VB DT close , and why did n't PRP simply capture PRP or photograph PRP ? If DT samples were found in DT wild , how do PRP VB PRP was n't left by another animal — or possibly even a hunter , hiker or camper who left human genetic material ? Previous alleged Bigfoot samples subjected to DNA analysis have been deemed " unknown " or " unidentified . " However , " unknown " or " unidentified " results do not mean " Bigfoot . " EX are JJ reasons why a DNA sample might come back unknown , including IN PRP was contaminated or too degraded by environmental conditions . Or PRP MD simply mean IN DT animal PRP came from was not among DT reference samples WDT DT laboratory used for comparison . EX is no reference sample of Bigfoot DNA to compare PRP with , so by definition , EX can not be a conclusive match . Ketchum RB issued a statementrequesting IN DT U.S. NN immediately recognize Bigfoot as " an indigenous NNS and immediately protect their human and Constitutional rights against those who MD see in their physical and cultural differences a ' license ' to hunt , trap , or kill them . " Since no Bigfoot has ever been hunted , trapped or killed , PRP 's not clear IN DT creatures — if PRP exist — require any special federal protection . Ketchum's is not DT only genetics - based project intended to find Bigfoot . Earlier this NN , researchers from Oxford University and DT Lausanne Museum of Zoology announced PRP were collecting samples of alleged Bigfoot and Yeti hair for genetic identification . Oxford geneticist Bryan Sykes collected materials from DT NN from NNP through September , and is currently conducting DNA analysis . Once DT results are in , he plans to submit his results to a peer - reviewed scientific journal . If Ketchum has DT definitive proof she claims , DT NN will soon VB about PRP , and Bigfoot will be proven once and for all . On DT other hand , if DT evidence never appears , or is inconclusive and flawed , DT search will continue . Benjamin Radford is deputy editor of Skeptical Inquirer NN magazine and author of six books , including Tracking DT Chupacabra and Scientific Paranormal Investigation : How to Solve Unexplained Mysteries . His website is www.BenjaminRadford.com.
