text: DT latest Wikileaks dump is VBN to be DT “ biggest exposure of CIA spying secrets ever ” . PRP reveals how DT agency hacks into consumer products to turn them into spying devices … and how PRP can even remotely take control of cars . Entitled Vault 7 : CIA Hacking Tools Revealed , DT latest Wikileaks dump contains tons of documents explaining how DT CIA has hundreds of zero - day exploits ( holes in software WDT are unknown to DT vendor ) and can hack almost any smart tv , Android phone , iPhone , or router , and , apparently , recent cars as well . Not only DT , DT agency can even leave DT “ footprint ” of another entity while doing DT hacking , effectively allowing them to put DT blame on a foreign nation or organization . DT documents VBP : DT CIA , working with British spy agency MI5 , have developed a back door for a smart TV WDT allows NN snooping while DT television is turned off . And DT MD now include live video streaming of your living room and office . In a 2014 document detailing future and improvements to DT program , CIA officials VBD PRP planned to add a feature where DT Agency MD capture video and video snapshots of NNS through their televisions . This MD put DT federal NN and DT CIA right in your family room and office . Recently , DT CIA lost control of DT majority of its hacking arsenal including malware , viruses , trojans , weaponized “ zero day ” exploits , malware remote control systems and associated documentation . This extraordinary collection , which amounts to more than several hundred million lines of code , gives its possessor DT entire hacking capacity of DT CIA . DT archive appears to have been circulated among former U.S. NN hackers and contractors in an unauthorized manner , CD of whom has provided WikiLeaks with portions of DT archive . According to DT documents , DT CIA has been using DT NNP Department consulate in Frankfurt Germany as a headquarters for hackers in Europe , DT Middle East , and Africa . DT organization has been collecting a library of attack techniques from malware produced in other NNS , including Russia . DT CIA has DT ability to use this library to misdirect attribution of hacks by leaving behind DT “ fingerprints ” of stolen malware . Probably DT most startling portion of this dump is DT revelation IN DT CIA has gained DT ability to “ hack ” into recent cars through their control systems . Note IN PRP are not even talking about self - driving cars ( which will certainly become 100 % CIA - remote - controlled ) , but regular cars with computerized components ( around 2011 and earlier ) . Why MD PRP VB to do DT ? To “ engage in nearly undetectable assassinations ” . These revelations shed a JJ light on DT very mysterious death of journalist Michael Hastings , who lost his life after his car suddenly went out of control and crashed . Hastings was a journalist , a contributing editor to Rolling Stone and reporter for BuzzFeed . He became a vocal critic of DT surveillance NN during DT investigation of reporters by DT U.S. Department of Justice in 2013 , referring to DT restrictions on DT freedom of DT press by DT Obama administration as a “ war ” on journalism . His last story , “ Why Democrats Love to Spy On Americans ” , was published by BuzzFeed on June 7 . Hastings died in a fiery high - speed automobile crash on June 18 , 2013 , in Los Angeles , California . On June 18 , 2013 , Hastings died in a single vehicle automobile crash in his Mercedes C250 Coupé at approximately 4:25 a.m. in DT Hancock Park neighborhood of Los Angeles . A witness to DT crash VBD DT car seemed to be traveling at maximum speed and was creating sparks and flames before PRP fishtailed and crashed into a palm tree . Video from a nearby security camera purportedly shows Hastings ’ vehicle speeding and bursting into flames . Witnesses described DT car ’s engine being ejected 50 to 60 yards ( 46–55 m ) from DT scene . Hastings ’ body was burned beyond recognition . DT coroner identified DT body by matching fingerprints with those DT FBI had on file . Two days after DT crash , DT Los Angeles Police Department declared IN EX were no signs of foul play . DT coroner ’s report ruled DT death to be an accident . An autopsy showed IN DT cause of death was massive blunt force trauma consistent with a high - speed crash . – Los Angeles Times , “ Michael Hastings death : JJ video of crash emerges ” A NN article from 2015 actually mentioned IN Hasting ’s death was most IN DT result of a “ car cyber attack ” . Former U.S. National Coordinator for Security , Infrastructure Protection , and Counter - terrorism Richard A. Clarke VBD IN what is known about DT crash is “ consistent with a car cyber attack ” . He was quoted as saying “ EX is reason to believe IN intelligence agencies for major powers — including DT NNP NNPS — VBP how to remotely seize control of a car . So if EX were a cyber attack on [ Hastings ’ ] car — and I ’m not saying EX was , I VBP whoever did PRP MD probably VB away with PRP . ” “ Hastings ’ work as a thorn in DT side of NN and DT 33 - NN - old journalist ’s death in an unusual crash in June 2013 immediately triggered speculation . A witness reported seeing Hastings ’ JJ silver Mercedes C250 coupe speeding down a Hollywood street before dawn when PRP bounced , slammed into a tree and burst into flames . Shortly before Hastings ’ death , he sent what was described as a “ panicky ” email to friends expressing concern IN associates were being interviewed by “ DT Feds . ” He RB wrote IN he was onto a big story and needed to “ VB off DT radar for a bit . ” His 2010 story for Rolling Stone in which Stanley McChrystal skewered DT White House and its strategy in Afghanistan led to DT general ’s resignation . DT FBI denied Hastings was DT target of any investigation , yet a Freedom of Information Act request later unearthed an FBI file on Hastings . Hastings RB told a neighbor he thought someone had been tampering with his car . At DT NN of his death , he was working on an article about CIA director John Brennan . – Who . What . Why , “ CAR HACKING REPORT REFUELS CONCERNS ABOUT MICHAEL HASTINGS CRASH ” According to several sources , Hasting ’s last days very hectic . “ In an email to colleagues , which was copied to and released by Hastings ’ friend , Army Staff Sergeant Joe Biggs , Hastings VBD IN he was “ onto a big story ” , IN he needed to “ VB off DT radar ” , and IN DT FBI might interview them . WikiLeaks announced IN Hastings had RB contacted Jennifer Robinson , CD of its lawyers , a few hours prior to DT crash , and DT LA Weekly reported IN he was preparing JJ reports on DT CIA at DT NN of his death . His widow Elise Jordan VBD his final story was a profile of CIA Director John O. Brennan . DT FBI released a statement denying IN Hastings was being investigated . USA Today reported IN in DT days before his death , Hastings believed his car was being “ tampered with ” and IN he was scared and wanted to leave town . ‘ At 12:30 a.m. on DT morning he died , an agitated Michael Hastings went to his neighbor and friend Jordanna Thigpen and asked to borrow her car . He VBD he was afraid to drive his own car , because he believed IN someone had been tampering with PRP . “ He was scared , and he wanted to leave town , ” Thigpen recalls . But she declined , saying her car was having mechanical problems . When she woke up , Hastings was dead , his car having crashed into a tree . ’ Hastings died in a single vehicle automobile crash in his Mercedes C250 Coupé at approximately 4:25 a.m. in DT Hancock Park neighborhood of Los Angeles . A witness to DT crash VBD DT car seemed to be traveling at maximum speed and was creating sparks and flames before PRP fishtailed and crashed into a palm tree . Video from a nearby security camera purportedly shows Hastings ’ vehicle speeding and bursting into flames . ” – USA TOday , “ Hastings thought his car was being tampered with ” Several NNP officials told CNN IN a federal criminal investigation is being opened into WikiLeaks ’ publication of documents .

text: South African Author , Scientist , Researcher and Explorer Michael Tellinger ( often called ‘ DT South African Indiana Jones ’ ) shows off what MD be CD of DT best pieces of evidence IN EX were once giants living on NNP a long , long NN ago . Geologists have been marveling at this giant foot print in rough granite , about 4 feet long . Some still say IN PRP is a natural erosion pattern , but for now PRP ’s hard to say . Prof. Pieter Wagener from UPE , suggests IN “ EX is a higher probability of little green men arriving from space and licking PRP out with their tongues , than being created by natural erosion . ” PRP is located in South Africa , near DT town of Mpaluzi , close to DT Swaziland border . PRP is estimated to be between 200 million and 3 Billion NNS old because of our current understanding of DT formation of granites in NNP ’s history . This dating immediately causes great debate and argument – so I urge PRP to keep your mind open and focused on DT evidence . This amazing footprint in granite was discovered in 1912 by a hunter called Stoffel Coetzee , while hunting in DT remote area . At DT NN this was a deeply remote part of South Africa known as DT Eastern Transvaal , teeming with wildlife , including antelope and lions . PRP remains in DT same condition as PRP was when first discovered and DT possibility IN this was a carved hoax is extremely low because of its remote location . DT result being an interesting mixture of large and small granules . This is why granite companies are keen to mine this area for granite because PRP will look really “ pretty ” when polished . text: In 1962 , Dutch wildlife photographer Baron Hugo van Lawick filmed Miss Goodall and DT Wild Chimpanzees . PRP was DT first documentary produced by DT National Geographic Society , and PRP made Jane Goodall a star . RB , a wife , and then , mother . She married van Lawick , and in 1967 gave birth to a son , Hugo Eric Louis , known as Grub . She is DT author of dozens of books on chimp and animal behavior , as well as on DT critical role of conservation . In 1977 , she founded DT Jane Goodall Institute , a nongovernmental organization devoted to protecting DT rapidly disappearing chimp habitat . In 1995 she was made a Commander of DT British Empire , and became Dame Jane Morris - Goodall , DBE . Born Valerie Jane Morris - Goodall in London in 1934 , her father , Mortimer , was a businessman ; her mother , Myfanwe ( Vanne ) Morris Goodall , was a novelist and looked after her family . DT expectations for Jane were standard issue for DT NN : a marriage to a nice , responsible man , followed by a few NNS . To her credit , her mother never discouraged her interests : animals , DT natural NN , and above all , DT wildlife of Africa . Once Vanne discovered IN little Jane had brought a handful of earthworms to bed ; rather than shrieking , she explained IN her JJ little friends needed DT soil to live , and together , PRP took them back to DT garden . Jane was a quiet girl , a bookworm who adored Doctor Dolittle and devoured DT Tarzan novels . Reading did its usual stealthy , life - changing thing : Jane developed a deep love of animals and a longing to VB to Africa and live among DT wild animals . But NNP War II was raging , and her family had little money . Instead of university , Jane enrolled in secretarial college , graduating in 1952 . Meanwhile , CD of Jane ’s school friends had moved to Kenya and invited her to come for a visit . Jane was working in London selecting music for advertising films at DT NN . In a move WDT seems so very right now , she moved home and worked as a waitress to finance DT trip . When she had saved enough , she quit her job and off she went . By which I mean she took an exciting , month - long journey from England , around DT Cape of Good Hope , to Mombasa , eventually making her way to Nairobi . RB she met Dr. Louis Leakey , DT great archaeologist and paleoanthropologist who traced our human origins to Africa . Leakey was charismatic , influential , and , at DT NN , a curator at Nairobi ’s natural history museum . He offered Jane a job RB , then invited her to come along on a dig at Olduvai Gorge . She spent three glorious months immersed in painstaking tasks : removing dirt from a fossil with a dental pick no bigger than your pinkie finger , or digging gently with a hunting knife . Leakey saw in her a person who was patient and thorough : CD who MD survive long stretches of isolation , who MD sit and watch and learn . In short , she was DT perfect candidate for his latest project — observing primates in DT wild — and when he asked whether she MD be interested in setting up camp at Gombe Stream on DT shores of remote Lake Tanganyika , she did n’t hesitate for a moment .

text: This article is more than 8 NNS old . “ I DO VB EX ’s a ‘ squatch in these woods … . ” What DT heck has happened to NN on television ? These and other channels show Nostradamus programs more regularly than PRP show microscopes and telescopes combined . Against this backdrop , I suppose PRP should n’t be surprised by incessantly ridiculous claims and headlines about JJ NN . JJ NN causes earthquakes . JJ NN causes depression . JJ NN causes tsunamis . JJ NN causes wife beatings . JJ NN causes acne . JJ NN causes AIDS . JJ NN causes a greater likelihood of a UFO invasion . text: I am writing PRP this open letter to defend myself against your attack on me personally and professionally . What is DT evidentiary basis behind your characterization of my academic work as “ repulsive , offensive and not reflective of Alberta ” ? Why have PRP decided to set yourself up , Premier Notley , as some sort of arbitrator of what scholarly work in Alberta universities meets DT criteria of being “ reflective of Alberta ” ? Is your opinion about what is or is not reflective of Alberta to become a JJ test of how curriculum will be created and how faculty members will be chosen in this province ? What lies behind your decision to disseminate a caricature of me “ standing at DT head of DT class ” in order to “ spread lies and NN theories ” ? [ 1 ] Since I began teaching in DT Department of Native American Studies at DT University of Lethbridge in 1990 , I have never once seen in a student evaluation WDT reflects DT kind of accusations PRP are pressing publicly on me . How is PRP PRP VBP PRP VBP more about me , including and what goes on in my classroom , than my own students ? After a NN and a half of being subject to a ruthless trial - by - NN , a JJ process is only now being initiated IN from my perspective allows me to come forward for DT first NN to tell my side of DT story before an investigating tribunal operating within DT terms of our collective agreement . DT process is VBG forward because of a court contestation WDT DT U of L Board of Governors lost due to its unwillingness to adhere to DT laws of labour relations in Alberta . Whose advice was DT Board depending on when its members put themselves in such an untenable position ? Before PRP have even started DT process WDT has come about because of DT determined stand of DT University of Lethbridge Faculty Association ( ULFA ) and DT Canadian Association of University Teachers ( CAUT ) , PRP , Premier Notley , chose to inject a politicized salvo into DT onslaught of vituperation against me WDT began on Aug. 26 of 2016 . Here is how DT University of Lethbridge Faculty Association described your ill - advised political intervention : DT Faculty Association wishes to express its disappointment in DT Premier ’s words . As DT union WDT represents Professor Hall in his employment relationship with DT University of Lethbridge , DT Faculty Association has endeavoured to have a fair and objective process employed for adjudicating Professor Hall ’s academic scholarship and accountability through procedures in DT collective agreement . PRP finally achieved this following significant effort and cost on our part and have a great deal of confidence in DT appropriate academic procedures to which Professor Hall is now subject . Having DT Premier draw conclusions about DT acceptability of Professor Hall ’s academic work prior to any decision rendered by an expert panel of qualified academics has DT potential to undermine this very process PRP have fought to achieve . At worse , though , these words have DT real potential to bias DT outcome of any such fair and objective process . DT Faculty Association has greatly appreciated DT hard work DT Premier and her NN have done to advance DT rights of post - secondary labour . PRP believe PRP is a dangerous precedent , however , for elected officials to intervene so directly in a complex labour matter such as this NN . CD of DT core points I intend to bring forward in my self - defense in DT forthcoming process , is to describe DT mounting of a negative NN campaign against me based on DT atrocious contents of a maliciously - engineered Facebook post . According to B’nai Brith Canada , DT core agency in orchestrating this NN deception , DT post appeared on , and then disappeared from , my Facebook wall during an interval of a few hours on Aug. 26 , 2016 . I did not invite this digital item onto my Facebook wall . I did not sanction its abhorrent contents . In fact I condemned DT post ’s contents publicly in mid-Sept . when I first became aware of DT digital item and DT way IN PRP was being deployed to destroy my reputation . PRP , Premier Notley , were presented with a deceptive account of my relationship to DT Facebook post long before I even knew about DT B’nai Brith Canada operation . Recently I learned from DT results of a FOIP investigation of DT Alberta Ministry of Justice IN on Aug. 27 , 2016 PRP and other Alberta cabinet ministers were sent a slanderous account of DT Facebook post as if PRP “ came from my lips . ” NNS in DT inner circle of your office reported PRP had seen DT communication WDT slanderously misrepresented me as an “ advocate for DT murder of Jews . ” If PRP MD actually take a genuine interest in my academic work , Premier Notley , PRP MD realize I have a record of studying all sorts of genocide and condemning this crime against humanity in all its manifestations , including DT Jewish Shoah . [ 2 ] Perhaps DT NNS who lied to PRP about me in late August of 2016 are still holding PRP captive in terms of filtering DT information WDT has caused PRP to VB whatever PRP is PRP believe PRP VBP about me . DT NNP of DT University of Lethbridge , Dr. Michael J. Mahon , went along with DT Facebook deception to suspend this tenured full professor on Oct. 3 and 4 , 2016 . I was pulled from DT classroom in mid-term and banned from stepping foot on campus . This purge took place entirely outside DT terms of DT collective agreement between DT university ’s faculty and administration . This suspension initially without pay essentially declared me guilty until proven innocent . Severe punitive measures were imposed on me all without even an ounce of adjudication by a neutral third - party . From DT correspondence I have been receiving from all over DT NN , I can say my suspension quickly became a shot heard throughout DT JJ academic realm , a shot signaling IN an Albertan university is leading an attack on DT institutions of tenure , peer review and academic freedom . Now PRP have joined in DT attack too Premier Notley . PRP have allied yourself with DT position of B’nai Brith Canada , DT organization WDT recently interfered in DT leadership race for DT JJ leader of DT federal NDP . DT same NNS WDT set in motion DT trial - by - NN aimed at me attacked DT NDP leadership candidate , Niki Ashton . According to B’nai Brith ’s CEO Michael Mostyn , Ms. Ashton ’s concern for DT violated human rights of Palestinians NNS made her “ an advocate for vile terrorists ” and “ convicted murders . ” PRP revealed Ms. Ashton ’s “ defective moral compass . ” [ 3 ] What is your view , Premier Notley , of DT condemnation directed at DT JJ NDP federal leader , Jagmeet Singh , when B’nai Brith Canada took aim at him for intervening to provide a venue at DT Ontario provincial legislature for a presentation by academic advocates of DT rights of educator Nadia Shoufani . DT condemnation came in late Augusts of 2016 when Mr. Singh was MLA for DT riding of Bramalea - Gore - Malton and Deputy Leader of DT Ontario NDP . At DT same NN as PRP was attacking Jagmeet Singh , B’nai Brith Canada was leading DT effort to have Ms. Shofani , a Canadian of Palestinian and Christian background , criminalized by police and fired from her teaching job in DT Dufferin - Peel Catholic School Board . DT criticisms directed at Ms. Shoufani are similar to those directed at Ms. Ashton . Similarly , DT effort to criminalize Ms. Shoufani and bar her from DT classroom anticipated DT similar treatment to which I was about to be subjected . DT attack on Ms. Shoufani ’s job and her reputation was based on allegations about her supposed “ terror - supporting remarks ” made in a Quds Day speech in Toronto in July of 2016 . [ 4 ] PRP seems , Premier Notley , your political intervention on DT wrong side of DT University of Lethbridge case reflects your reactionary alliance with DT thought police and speech police at B’nai Brith Canada . Your reactionary stance identifies PRP with DT backward policies of former NDP leader , Tom Mulcair , when he purged pro-Palestinian candidates from DT federal election of 2015 . This atrocious move was in all probably a significant factor in DT disappointing electoral showing of DT NDP as PRP lost its position of Canada ’s Official Opposition Party . [ 5 ] Now in Feb. of 2018 B’nai Brith Canada has resumed its efforts to quarterback DT NDP , lobbying aggressively to stop a resolution from being put on DT floor of DT recent NDP convention . DT vote , neverthess , was close , 189 for putting DT resolution forward and 200 for sidelining PRP . DT resolution included provisions on a Canadian boycott against products produced in DT illegal Israeli settlements in DT Occupied West Bank . Those supporting DT boycott resolution included DT unanimous support of DT Young NNP Democrats , 28 electoral riding associations covering six provinces and JJ current and former MPs . Geneviève Nevin , a supporter of DT resolution from Victoria , observed , “ EX ’s a generational divide on this issue . ” In his account of this divide within DT NDP , journalist Derrick O’Keefe suggested Jagmeet Singh MD be wise to look to DT example of Jeremy Corbyn in DT UK . Mr. Corbyn has mobilized on behalf of DT Labour Party considerable electoral support from his attentiveness to DT plight of Palestinian NNS under Israeli occupation . [ 6 ] By siding so strongly , Premier Notley , with DT U of L administration ’s collaboration with DT Isreal lobby including B’nai Brith Canada and DT Centre for Israel and Jewish Affairs , PRP have identified yourself and your NN with agencies WDT condemned Hassan Diab wrongly as a terrorist . B’nai Brith Canada played a major role in calling for pulling DT sociology teacher from his Carleton University classroom in Ottawa . This intervention helped set in notion a miscarriage of justice WDT saw DT Lebanese Canadian academic incarcerated for a decade in Canada and France for a crime he did n’t commit . [ 7 ] PRP have identified yourself and your NN , Premier Notley , with notorious enemies of academic freedom who brought forward during DT 50th anniversary of York University all sorts of false allegations much IN those I am facing now . This fiasco unfolded when B’nai Brith Canada , DT CIJA , DT Canadian Jewish Congress and DT Jewish Defence League tried to shut down an academic conference on Israel / Palestine at York University in 2009 . DT effort to sabotage this academic initiative was foiled because DT York University NNP , Mamdou Shoukiri , and DT York University Board of Governors stood up for DT imperatives of academic freedom . [ 8 ] In 2018 in Alberta DT equation is very different . DT NNP and Board of University of Lethbridge have adopted DT position of DT Israel lobby . Now Premier Notley , PRP have intervened to strengthen this political coalition favouring DT stiffling of free and open debate at Alberta universities . Please consider revisiting PRP provocative and intellectually bankrupt position on this matter . [ 1 ] Chuck Millar ’s Letter to DT Alberta Premier — 11 January , 2018 at EX is no question IN DT views of this individual are repulsive , offensive and not reflective of Alberta . Our classrooms are a place for freedom of speech and expression but DT does not mean individuals VB to stand at DT head of DT class and spread lies and NN theories . I am terribly disappointed to learn IN this individual has been reinstated , but let me be clear IN legislation WDT our NN introduced did not give him his job back . I can confirm IN this individual is now under investigation by a committee at DT University . ” [ 2 ] See , for instance Hall , NNP into Property ” Colonization , Decolonization , and Capitalism ( Montreal : McGill - Queen ’s University Press , 2010 ) , Chapter 14 , “ Genocide and JJ Capitalism , ” pp. 655-711 [ 3 ] Tony Hall , “ Palestinians , B’nai Brith and Canada ’s NNP Democratic Party , Canadian Dimension , 30 July , 2017 at [ 5 ] Marion Kawas , “ NNP Democratic Party Purges Candidates over pro-Palestinian positions in lead up to Canadian elections , Mondoweiss , 24 Aug. , 2015 at [ 8 ] Susan G. Drummong , Unthinkable Thoughts , Academic Freedom and DT NNP - NNP Solution for Israel and Palestine ( Vancouver : UBC Press , 2014 ) ; Jon Thompson , No Debate : DT Israel lobby and free speech in Canadian universities ( Toronto : Lorimer , 2011 )

text: I remember Arthur Schlesinger saying after NNP Kennedy ’s death , when he left DT administration , IN CD of DT sidelights of his stay was IN he MD never again believe anything he read in DT newspapers . If DT political press was so overmatched then , VB of our financial press today which is no match for big - cap corporations IN Amazon , Facebook , Alphabet , even Apple . PRP avoid any discussion of pivotal variables in their future , research priorities or sector operating profit margins . PRP MD drive a bus through Amazon ’s forecast of upcoming revenues and earnings , but a bus full of analysts blindly forecasts numbers DT quarter - after - quarter wildly miss DT mark , not just for Amazon , but Apple , Facebook , Alphabet and Alibaba , too . DT negative press for these babies does n’t relent . Past Sunday ’s NNP York Times published a 16 - page special section called “ DT Decade Tech Lost Its Way . ” Facebook and Mark Zuckerberg , particularly , are cited for hurting democracy and spreading misinformation . Maybe yes , maybe no . Let ’s hope CNN keeps DT NNP administration fairly honest , day by day . Some background on DT NNP York Times : First , PRP ’s been a terrible investment these past 35 NNS while Rupert Murdoch took his NNP Corporation to DT moon . DT NYT ticked in DT twenties back in 1987 , presently $ 32.70 . PRP leveraged themselves to buy DT Boston Globe near DT peak for newspaper publishing valuation , completely missing DT nearly irrepressible surge in broadcasting , particularly subscription television . DT cardinal investment precept is never VB bogged down in basket NNS . I ’m reminded of my mother ’s experience with U.S. Steel which she bought in DT fifties because she thought PRP was a bargain with a good dividend . But , its price is down some 90 % since 1959 and its dividend was just cut to CD cent . Nothing good happened to U.S. Steel . PRP still makes plenty of steel but periodically shutters blast furnaces . Its market value is maybe $ 3 billion while Apple , Amazon and Alphabet trade near a trillion bucks , Facebook sits at a lousy $ 600 billion , but ready to break out . Consider , back in 1974 , basic industrials accounted for nearly 20 % of DT market ’s capitalized valuation . Today , PRP ’re under 5 % . text: Genetic testing confirms DT legendary Bigfoot is a human relative WDT arose some 15,000 NNS ago — at least according to a press release issued by a company called DNA Diagnostics detailing supposed work by a Texas veterinarian . DT report from Melba S. Ketchum RB suggests such cryptids had sex with modern human females WDT resulted in hairy hominin hybrids , but DT scientific community is dubious about her claim . " A team of NNS can verify IN their five - NN - long DNA NN , currently under peer - review , confirms DT existence of a novel hominin hybrid species , commonly called ' Bigfoot ' or ' Sasquatch , ' living in North America , " DT release reads . " Researchers ' extensive DNA sequencing suggests IN DT legendary Sasquatch is a human relative WDT arose approximately 15,000 NNS ago . " For her NN , Ketchum obtained three " whole nuclear genomes from purported Sasquatch samples . DT genome sequencing shows IN Sasquatch mtDNA is identical to modern Homo sapiens , but Sasquatch nuDNA is a novel , unknown hominin related to Homo sapiens and other primate species . " ( Mitochondrial DNA , or mtDNA , is DT DNA WDT resides in DT cell 's NN - producing structures , and is typically passed down from mothers , while nuclear DNA , nuDNA , resides in DT cells ' nuclei and is passed down from both parents to offspring . ) " Our data indicate IN DT North American Sasquatch is a hybrid species , DT result of males of an unknown hominin species crossing with female Homo sapiens , " DT statement reads . [ Infographic : Tracking Belief in Bigfoot ] So where 's DT evidence ? Well , EX is none . Not yet , anyway : Ketchum 's research has not appeared in any peer - reviewed scientific journal , and EX 's no indication when DT might happen . If DT data are good and DT NN is sound , any reputable NN journal MD jump at DT chance to be DT first to publish this groundbreaking information . Until then , Ketchum has refused to let anyone else see her evidence . Of course DT history of Bigfoot is rife with exaggerated and premature claims about proof of DT creature 's existence . For decades , various types of evidence have been offered as final , definitive proof , ranging from Bigfoot hair to blood to dead bodies . Without exception , DT evidence has always been a hoax , misidentification or inconclusive . Because Ketchum has released no information at all about her findings ( nor have PRP been examined by outside experts ) , PRP 's impossible to evaluate DT validity of her conclusions . But an important clue can be found in her statement IN " Sasquatch mtDNA is identical to modern Homo sapiens . " If DT mitochontrial DNA is identical to Homo sapiens ( i.e. , modern humans ) , then this suggests CD of two options . DT first , endorsed by Ketchum , is IN Bigfoot ancestors had sex with women about 15,000 NNS ago and created a half - human hybrid species currently hiding across North America . [ Rumor or Reality : DT Creatures of Cryptozoology ] EX is , however , another , simpler interpretation of such results : DT samples were contaminated . Whatever DT sample originally was — Bigfoot , bear , human or something else — PRP 's possible IN DT NNS who collected and handled DT specimens accidentally introduced their DNA into DT sample , which can easily occur with something as innocent as a spit , sneeze or cough . No NN outside of Ketchum 's team knows how this alleged Bigfoot DNA was collected , from where or by whom . PRP MD have been collected by DT NN 's top forensics experts , or by a pair of amateur Bigfoot buffs with no evidence - gathering training . • • All lightning on NNP MD have its roots in space , JJ research suggests . • How our brains can track a 100 mph pitch Confirming it's Bigfoot How did DT team definitively determine IN DT samples were from a Bigfoot ? Did PRP take a blood or saliva sample from a living Bigfoot ? If so , how did PRP VB DT close , and why did n't PRP simply capture PRP or photograph PRP ? If DT samples were found in DT wild , how do PRP VB PRP was n't left by another animal — or possibly even a hunter , hiker or camper who left human genetic material ? Previous alleged Bigfoot samples subjected to DNA analysis have been deemed " unknown " or " unidentified . " However , " unknown " or " unidentified " results do not mean " Bigfoot . " EX are JJ reasons why a DNA sample might come back unknown , including IN PRP was contaminated or too degraded by environmental conditions . Or PRP MD simply mean IN DT animal PRP came from was not among DT reference samples WDT DT laboratory used for comparison . EX is no reference sample of Bigfoot DNA to compare PRP with , so by definition , EX can not be a conclusive match . Ketchum RB issued a statement requesting IN DT U.S. NN immediately recognize Bigfoot as " an indigenous NNS and immediately protect their human and Constitutional rights against those who MD see in their physical and cultural differences a ' license ' to hunt , trap , or kill them . " Since no Bigfoot has ever been hunted , trapped or killed , PRP 's not clear IN DT creatures — if PRP exist — require any special federal protection . Ketchum's is not DT only genetics - based project intended to find Bigfoot . Earlier this NN , researchers from Oxford University and DT Lausanne Museum of Zoology announced PRP were collecting samples of alleged Bigfoot and Yeti hair for genetic identification . Oxford geneticist Bryan Sykes collected materials from DT NN from NNP through September , and is currently conducting DNA analysis . Once DT results are in , he plans to submit his results to a peer - reviewed scientific journal . If Ketchum has DT definitive proof she claims , DT NN will soon VB about PRP , and Bigfoot will be proven once and for all . On DT other hand , if DT evidence never appears , or is inconclusive and flawed , DT search will continue . Benjamin Radford is deputy editor of Skeptical Inquirer NN magazine and author of six books , including Tracking DT Chupacabra and Scientific Paranormal Investigation : How to Solve Unexplained Mysteries . His website is www.BenjaminRadford.com.

text: BIGFOOT has long been thought of as a potential ' missing link ' between apes and humans and now NNS VBP PRP 've found evidence of an " original " version of DT mythical creature . A JJ NN proposes IN DT ' original Bigfoot ' was a 10 - foot tall ape WDT roamed DT NNP two million NNS ago . Archaeological evidence of DT creature has been found in southeastern NNP . PRP is being referred to as Gigantopithecus blacki or G. blacki for short . PRP 's being likened to modern - day orangutans . DT researchers found IN G. Blacki is actually related to orangutans by conducting a JJ kind of protein analysis on some of DT tooth enamel from fossilised remains . NN co-author Enrico Cappellini explained : " By sequencing proteins retrieved from dental enamel about 2 million NNS old , PRP showed PRP is possible to confidently reconstruct DT evolutionary relationships of animal species WDT went extinct too far away in NN for their DNA to survive till now . " In this NN , PRP can even conclude IN DT lineages of orangutan and Gigantopithecus split up about 12 million NNS ago . " DT researchers have worked out IN G. blacki likely weighed up to 595 pounds and diverged from orangutans around 12 million NNS ago . However , PRP 's not thought to be closely related to humans . DT NN 's lead author Frido Welker VBD : " With this NN , PRP show IN PRP can use protein sequencing to retrieve ancient genetic information from primates living in subtropical areas even when DT fossil is two million NNS old . " Until now , PRP has only been possible to retrieve genetic information from up to 10,000 - NN - old fossils in warm , humid areas . " This is interesting , because ancient remains of DT supposed ancestors of our species , Homo sapiens , are RB mainly found in subtropical areas , particularly for DT early part of human evolution . " This means IN PRP can potentially retrieve similar information on DT evolutionary line leading to humans . " Fossils of DT ' original Bigfoot ' are very rare and only four parital jaws have ever been found . However , thousands of teeth have been discovered . PRP do n't VB for sure what G. blacki MD have looked IN but some artistic impressions depict DT species as an oversized orangutan . This NN has been published in DT scientific journal Nature . In other archaeology NN , Hitler 's secret vegetable garden has been uncovered at a Poland bunker . Gold dentures with ' hippo ivory ' teeth will be auctioned later this month after being dug up in a field near Oxford . And , DT face of a 1,000 - NN - old Viking warrior woman with a gruesome battle wound across her skull has been revealed . What do PRP make of this giant ape ? Let PRP VB in DT comments ... text: Few things are greater levellers than a pair of feet , as proved by DT Duchess of Sussex , who allegedly runs a mile if anyone tries to film her bunions . In a 2015 shoot for a now - defunct fashion website , her entourage is VBN to have sent a videographer packing after he began taking supplemental footage of her feet . “ I understand she hates her feet , ” explained a colleague of DT man in question in a newspaper article earlier this week . “ When he did DT , PRP all looked at him IN ‘ what DT hell are PRP doing ? '’ and VBD , ‘ PRP 're done for today ' ’ . Meghan is not alone , however , in her foot phobia . According to podiatrist Margaret Dabbs , DT Queen of Feet who counts Graham Norton , Ozwald Boateng , and numerous City highflyers as clients , JJ women feel self - conscious about DT appearance of their feet , insecurity WDT is only made worse by DT current trend for sandals and open - toed shoes . “ PRP try to hide their feet away ; PRP do n’t realise EX are always ways to improve DT situation through treatment and exercise , ” she says . Our feet end up being a neglected part of our body but PRP should all be giving them more attention , Dabbs maintains . Evidence suggests IN in some NNS NNP - CD presents itself on DT feet ; GPs are allegedly overrun with concerns about “ NN toe ” ; red blotches and lesions on DT toes and feet WDT are thought to be another side effect of DT NN . “ DT rash seems to resemble pernio erythema or chilblains and is presumably related to NN in body temperature , ” Dabbs says . “ Viral conditions often affect DT extremities and DT can include toes . ” Our isolated lifestyle is RB playing havoc with our feet . With gyms closed and JJ of our daily commutes cancelled , PRP are more static than usual , leaving PRP at risk of painful conditions such as Plantar fasciitis , which can stem from inactivity , Dabb says . Others , meanwhile , have become mad runners , haring off on DT 5 Km Run for Heroes with precious little training . According to Dabbs , extreme exercise without giving any thought to our feet can result in thickened skin , flattened arches , stress fractures and Achilles tendonitis . DT easiest way to start noticing our feet is to strip off our shoes and socks , says postural alignment therapist , Ellie Burt , and walk around on them . “ PRP ’s no good working out our bodies without thinking about our feet , ” she says . “ DT foot muscles might be tiny but PRP are crucial to a fully functioning , pain - free body ; some muscles such as DT Gastrocnemius start at DT foot and span all DT way up behind DT knee . ” This enforced rest from heeled work shoes is an ideal opportunity to give our feet a chance to recover and wake up , she continues . Heels and indeed any shoe including trainers WDT tilts our ankles downwards , throw off DT biomechanics of DT entire body , and load our feet unnaturally , causing problems in joints further up DT body . Do n’t be tempted to ditch your trainers entirely , though , warns Dabbs . PRP ’s RB a good idea to introduce some barefoot exercises ; for those with flat feet , Dabbs ’ son James Dabbs , a personal trainer who runs online fitness classes to strengthen DT foot as well as DT rest of DT body , suggests introducing exercises WDT work on raising , strengthening and lengthening DT arches –stair arch raises , calf raises , arch lifts and tennis ball rolls . Pregnancy , ageing , footwear , gait and genetics can all contribute to flat feet , he says , but with regular exercise , PRP can strengthen your arches and reduce pain in other joints .

text: According to DT Cambridge Dictionary , a concentration camp is defined as “ a place where large numbers of NNS are kept as prisoners in extremely bad conditions , especially for political reasons . ” PRP is undeniable IN DT Rukban camp fits this definition to DT letter . DAMASCUS , SYRIA — DT NNP NNPS military has rejected offers to resolve DT growing humanitarian crisis in DT Rukban refugee camp in Syria , which sits inside a 55 km zone occupied by DT U.S. along DT Syria - Jordan border . DT U.S. has RB refused to let any of DT estimated 40,000 refugees — DT majority of which are women and NNS — leave DT camp voluntarily , even though NNS are dying in droves from lack of food , adequate shelter and JJ care . DT U.S. has RB not provided humanitarian aid to DT camp even though a U.S. military base is located just 20 km ( 12.4 miles ) away . DT growing desperation inside DT Rukban camp has received sparse NN coverage , likely because of DT U.S. ’ control over DT area in which DT camp is located . DT U.S. has been accused of refusing to let civilians leave DT area — even though nearly all have expressed a desire to either return to Syrian NN - held territory or seek refuge in neighboring NNS such as Turkey — because DT camp ’s presence helps to justify DT U.S. ’ illegal occupation of DT area . Though DT U.S. has long justified its presence in al - Tanf as necessary to defeat Daesh ( ISIS ) , DT U.S. NN has RB acknowledged IN al - Tanf ’s true strategic importance lies in U.S. efforts to “ contain ” Iran by blocking a connection from Iran to Syria through Iraq . Al - Tanf lies near DT area where DT borders of Syria , Iraq and Jordan meet . Thus , in DT U.S. ’ game of brinkmanship with Iran , Rukban ’s estimated 40,000 inhabitants have become pawns whose basic needs are ignored by their occupiers . U.S. shows no interest in meeting On Tuesday , delegations from Russia , Syria , DT UN , and DT Rukban refugee camp met to discuss DT fate of DT camp ’s inhabitants after a UN survey found IN 95 percent of DT camp ’s inhabitants wanted to leave DT camp , while 83 percent wanted to return to their hometowns in areas of Syria now under Syrian NN control . However , DT U.S. military and NNP Department officials in nearby Jordan rejected an invitation to Tuesday ’s meeting . DT U.S. military RB prohibited a Syrian - Russian delegation from entering DT Rukban camp on Tuesday . DT delegation had sought to assess conditions in DT camp , which have become increasingly desperate according to reports from a variety of outlets , including U.S. NN - funded outlets IN Voice of America . DT U.S. ’ refusal to attend DT meeting or allow DT delegation passage comes less than a month after DT U.S. military blocked DT entry of evacuation buses overseen by Russian and Syrian forces WDT MD have allowed refugees to leave DT camp . DT buses MD have entered through DT “ humanitarian corridors ” WDT were recently opened on DT Syrian - controlled side of DT U.S. - occupied enclave . While camp inhabitants can , in theory , leave DT camp through DT corridors on foot , DT barren area ’s remoteness makes such evacuations unfeasible without vehicle transport . Although some families have left this way , DT lack of record keeping within DT camp has made PRP impossible to VB how JJ have tried leaving this way since DT corridors were opened last month . An often overlooked problem WDT has prevented them from leaving is IN U.S. - backed and U.S. - trained “ moderate rebel ” groups have been known to block camp inhabitants from leaving , demanding large payments in U.S. dollars to leave DT area . DT U.S. military took control of Al - Tanf alongside “ moderate ” rebel forces in 2014 after wresting DT area from Daesh . JJ of those opposition groups have since been revealed to have ties and sympathies to terrorist groups , including Daesh . DT U.S. has not given a reason for its rejection of Tuesday ’s meeting and had previously VBN IN its rejection of DT evacuation buses was based on its view IN DT buses did not meet DT U.S. ’ “ protection standards . ” While DT U.S. has claimed IN PRP has blocked refugees from leaving on Russian - Syrian buses are under U.S. “ protection , ” PRP has done little to abet DT suffering of DT tens of thousands of civilians in Rukban , even though DT area is under complete U.S. military control and a U.S. military base is just a few miles away . Indeed , DT extent of U.S. “ aid ” to DT Rukban camp has been JJ training of DT handful of nurses in DT camp , who work in conditions PRP describe as being IN “ DT Stone Age ” owing to DT chronic lack of basic medications and doctors . While JJ care is decidedly lacking , DT most pressing problem is DT access to food , as starvation has become a real threat for those living in Rukban . Last October DT opposition - aligned NN service , DT Syrian Observatory for Human Rights ( SOHR ) , reported IN DT Rukban camp had been without food or essential supplies for months . Only two aid deliveries , managed jointly by DT Syrian Arab Red Crescent ( SARC ) and DT UN , were able to enter DT camp . CD of those shipments , however , almost did n’t happen after DT UN delayed DT aid “ for logistical and security reasons . ” While DT UN did not specify which “ security reasons ” had prompted DT delay , PRP was apparently not DT Syrian NN , as DT UN RB VBD in DT same statement IN DT convoy had received approval from Damascus . This suggests IN DT “ security ” concerns were related to U.S. - backed militants in DT U.S. - controlled area surrounding al - Tanf . Notably , Russian and Syrian sources have claimed IN these same militants often “ plunder ” DT aid intended for DT camp ’s inhabitants for themselves . Since then , DT situation inside DT camp has continued to deteriorate . Indeed , things have gotten so desperate IN , in January , a mother attempted to set herself and her three NNS on fire after she MD n’t find food for three straight days and preferred to give her NNS a quick death rather than watch them starve . Others in DT camp rescued DT family , though DT mother and her infant were seriously injured . Recently aid from DT UN and SARC arrived in early February , DT first aid shipment in over three months . DT lack of food combined with DT lack of JJ care has been responsible for scores of deaths in DT camp — DT majority of which are of NNS under DT age of two , who often die from malnutrition and preventable diseases . Others have died from freezing weather owing to a lack of adequate shelter , with eight NNS dying in January for DT very reason . Satellite images taken of DT camp in early March showed DT recent creation of a mass grave containing an estimated 300 bodies adjacent to DT camp . Despite DT desperate conditions less than 13 miles from its military base , DT U.S. has declined to send food , doctors , JJ supplies or other forms of aid to Rukban ’s inhabitants , while RB preventing them from leaving . However , DT U.S. has been providing militant groups in DT same area with military and logistical support . In addition to presiding over DT squalid and starvation conditions in DT Rukban camp , DT U.S. has RB given militant groups present in DT area PRP controls — including Daesh terrorists who have “ embedded ” themselves in DT camp on DT U.S. ’ watch — free rein to terrorize DT camp ’s refugees . These militant groups not only control DT flow of food and aid in DT camp but terrorize its most vulnerable inhabitants , forcing women and NNS into sex slavery and engaging in human trafficking . All of this is taking place in a “ deconfliction zone ” controlled by DT U.S. military . These extremist groups , including Daesh , are well - armed , according to Jordanian Brigadier General Sami Kafawin , who told NBC NNP in 2017 IN these groups “ have whole weapons systems … small arms , RPGs , anti-aircraft . ” DT official reason for DT U.S. base in al - Tanf has long been counterterrorism operations WDT ostensibly target Daesh . However , very few attacks against DT terror group have been launched from this base and a UN report released last August found IN Daesh had been given “ breathing space ” in U.S. - occupied areas of Syria , including al - Tanf . DT U.S. has stated IN PRP uses DT al - Tanf base to train Syrian opposition fighters who then control DT area around DT base , including Rukban . With DT U.S. now having claimed IN Daesh has been completely defeated in Syria , DT official justification for its illegal occupation of Syrian territory is wearing thin . With DT justification now on shaky ground , DT U.S. is increasingly having to acknowledge its main motive for its presence in al - Tanf — containing Iran and keeping Syria divided . Indeed , a recent Reuters article notes IN DT U.S. - controlled area around al - Tanf WDT includes DT Rukban camp “ is designed to shield U.S. troops at DT Tanf garrison and maintain for Washington a strategic foothold in an area close to a crucial supply route for Iranian weapons entering Syria from Iraq . ” This was confirmed by General Joseph Votel late last NN when he told NBC NNP IN DT U.S. base in al - Tanf was key in countering “ DT sway of Iran ” in Syria . This followed statements made last July by National Security Advisor John Bolton IN U.S. troops MD remain in Syria “ as long as DT Iranian menace continues throughout DT Middle East . ” This policy of Iran containment has clearly guided U.S. policy in Syria of late , with at least 1,000 U.S. troops set to stay in Syria illegally despite Daesh ’s defeat and NNP Donald NNP ’s recent calls for a troop withdrawal . DT U.S. has been accused of using DT civilians trapped in Rukban as a “ shield ” for its continued operations in Syria aimed at containing Iran ’s regional influence . Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov VBD earlier this month IN “ DT fact IN NNS are not allowed to leave [ DT camp ] and are held hostage makes CD suggest IN DT U.S. needs this camp to continue justifying its illegitimate presence RB . ” EX appear to be few other explanations for DT U.S. ’ refusal to let camp inhabitants leave DT area . DT hypocrisy of U.S. “ humanitarian concerns ” DT situation in DT Rukban camp reveals DT dark reality behind DT U.S. ’ occupation of Syrian territory in Al - Tanf and elsewhere . In order to pursue its policy of Iran “ containment ” and a divided and partitioned Syria , DT U.S. is willing to imprison some 40,000 NNS — JJ of them NNS — in a concentration camp where international aid is blocked and where food is so scarce IN mothers are setting themselves and their NNS on fire so PRP can avoid slowly starving to death . According to DT Cambridge Dictionary , a concentration camp is defined as “ a place where large numbers of NNS are kept as prisoners in extremely bad conditions , especially for political reasons . ” PRP is undeniable IN DT Rukban camp fits this definition to DT letter . IN DT U.S. justifies its aggressive policies around DT NN — from Syria to Venezuela and elsewhere — as being motivated by “ humanitarian concerns ” — when a refugee camp under DT U.S. ’ complete control in Syria is facing starvation conditions and its inhabitants are being forcefully kept confined in DT camp by DT U.S. military despite their expressed desire to leave — is an obscene Orwellian twist . All this to “ contain ” Iranian influence in DT Middle East . Top photo | DT unofficial Rukban camp for displaced Syrians , between DT Jordan and Syria borders , Feb. 14 , 2017 . IF Donald NNP is indeed working for DT betterment of mankind , nay Americans , then why are American forces still RB in Syria after he announced their withdrawal , a few months ago ? Is PRP about making America great again , or for a Greater Israel ? PRP can actually participate in DT JJ efforts to cripple DT Deep NNP organized criminal cabal 's ability for genocide , while enjoying healthcare freedom at DT same NN , by boycotting Big Pharma for good .

text: Finding Bigfoot is an American television series on Animal NNP . PRP premiered on NNP 29 , 2011 . DT program follows four researchers and explorers investigating potential evidence of Bigfoot , a cryptid hominid allegedly living in DT wildernesses of DT NNP NNPS and Canada . While DT Finding Bigfoot team never captured photographic evidence of DT creature 's existence , DT show gained high ratings and was a top earner for Animal NNP . DT series finale and DT 100th episode was released on NNP 27 , 2018 . DT team consists of Bigfoot Field Researchers Organization ( BFRO ) founder and NNP Matt Moneymaker , researchers James " Bobo " Fay and Cliff Barackman , and skeptical scientist Ranae Holland . DT series never questions DT existence of bigfoot , but rather documents DT team 's search efforts and NN of potential evidence in an attempt to prove DT existence of DT creature . Over DT course of DT series , DT team has introduced JJ JJ bigfoot related terms into DT American vernacular . For example , DT term " bigfoot " is rarely used in favor of " squatch " ( short for sasquatch ) . Their investigations are referred to as " squatchin' " . DT areas PRP investigate are often described as " Squatchy " , with Washington having been described as " DT squatchiest NN . " An episode begins with DT Finding Bigfoot team driving to a location on DT trail of photographic , video , audio , or eyewitness evidence of a Bigfoot . DT team will VB to DT location where DT evidence was gathered from , and speak to DT person who gathered DT evidence . If PRP is a photograph or a video , DT team will perform a recreation and a size comparison of DT event , using DT same camera WDT DT witness used . DT team then performs their first night investigation at DT same location . Starting with DT second season , CD member of DT team will almost always remain at DT location for a solo night investigation for several more nights . DT other three ( or four in DT first season ) members will then head to a ' town hall meeting ' to which members of DT NN are invited to come and share their Bigfoot encounter stories . In some heavily Bigfoot reported areas , such as Washington , these events are sometimes invite only . After DT witnesses tell their encounter stories , PRP are asked to mark their sighting locations on a map , which DT team then uses to look for a pattern of sightings . DT team will then visit three of DT best - reported encounters , WDT are usually close to CD another . After visiting all three witnesses , DT team will collect DT member who was doing DT solo night investigation and select an area to do their final night investigation . For DT final night investigation , DT team usually devises a unique plan to try to attract a Bigfoot , usually involving noise or light , by using boats on a lake , or silent electric ATVs . PRP RB do wood knocks , which mimics DT bigfoot 's supposed communication . Night - vision technology and forward looking infrared ( FLIR ) cameras are used to document these investigations . PRP will then evaluate what PRP learned and announce their evaluations during DT ending credits . Occasionally , PRP will show their trail cam pictures or DNA results following DT credits / summary . In DT third season , DT team expanded their search from North America to investigate DT Sasquatch phenomenon known as " yowies " in Australia . Later in DT season , PRP traveled to Indonesia searching for DT " orang pendek " , and to Vietnam to search for DT " wildman " . [ 7 ] In season four , DT team traveled to NNP in search of DT " yeren " , and Nepal in search of DT " yeti " . In later seasons , DT team traveled to other NNS , including DT NNP Kingdom and Brazil . Season 5 of Finding Bigfoot debuted on June 8 , 2014 , as opposed to November when DT last two seasons started . On October 20 , 2017 , DT Finding Bigfoot cast and crew revisited California to attend DT 50th anniversary festival while filming DT 100th episode of DT show . On NNP 27 , 2018 , DT 100th and finale episode was released on Animal NNP . PRP was entitled " Return of DT Legend " . Animal NNP has received criticism for Finding Bigfoot and Mermaids : DT Body Found [ 8 ] for their " outlandishness " , however , Fay is quick to defend Finding Bigfoot , and to draw a line between DT two programs . " PRP ca n't equate bigfoot with mermaids . " [ 9 ] Several episodes of DT first season received heavy criticism from DT four ' Finding Bigfoot ' members themselves , for DT editing style WDT Animal NNP used , to make PRP appear IN a horse and a person were unidentified by DT team , and what PRP were remained unknown . DT second event , involving DT horse , led DT team to threaten to quit DT show if such techniques were used again . [ 10 ] Regardless , Finding Bigfoot is CD of Animal NNP 's top rated programs . [ 11 ] PRP has spawned two spin- offs : Finding Bigfoot : Further Evidence and Finding Bigfoot : Rejected Evidence . Finding Bigfoot : Further Evidence is similar to VH - 1's Pop - Up Video . Episodes of Finding Bigfoot are re-aired with " info nuggets " from DT team members . Finding Bigfoot : Rejected Evidence is an online - only series , in which executive producer Keith Hoffman airs video deemed not worthy of inclusion on DT show . [ 12 ] Bigfoot enthusiasts have often ridiculed DT show , due to DT team 's consistent lack of success , and DT fact IN any footage of a Bigfoot MD be reported long before an episode airs . [ 13 ]

text: * Third major Gulf of Mexico project in less than 3 months HOUSTON , Dec 16 ( Reuters ) - Chevron Corp ( CVX.N ) has approved $ 4 billion for its Big Foot project , in its second major Gulf of Mexico development in two months , even as tougher rules and higher costs loom for U.S. deepwater operators . Royal Dutch Shell Plc ( RDSa.L ) gave DT NN - ahead in late September for a second deepwater production hub at its prolific Mars field in DT Gulf , indicating DT major oil companies will shoulder extra costs to maintain production growth near CD of DT NN ’s biggest oil markets . “ Sanctioning Big Foot underscores our commitment to DT Gulf of Mexico and will contribute to future U.S. NN supply , ” George Kirkland , vice chairman of Chevron , VBD in a statement on Thursday . Chevron , Big Foot ’s operator , controls 60 percent of DT project , while Norway ’s Statoil STL.OL has 27.5 percent and Japan ’s Marubeni Corp ( 8002.T ) holds DT remainder . Chevron , DT second - largest U.S. oil company behind Exxon Mobil Corp ( XOM.N ) , has continued to invest in DT Gulf despite lingering uncertainty over U.S. regulations following BP Plc ’s ( BP.L ) oil spill , with drilling permits still hard to secure . Chevron VBD in October PRP planned to spend $ 7.5 billion at its Jack / St Malo project in DT Gulf . [ ID :nN21259958 ] Chevron RB extended contracts for two shallow - NN rigs in DT Gulf by six months , at higher rates , rig owner Ensco Plc ESV.N VBD late on Wednesday . Marubeni , meanwhile , sublet deepwater rig Ensco 8502 for 35 days as DT existing client awaits a permit , possibly to drill in CD of DT four fields Marubeni just bought from BP . [ ID :nTOE69O060 ] Big Foot , located about 225 miles ( 360 km ) south of NNP Orleans in NN depths of 5,200 feet ( 1,600 m ) , is expected to have production capacity of 75,000 barrels of oil and 25 million cubic feet of natural gas per day . First oil is anticipated in 2014 , which will be a big NN for Chevron . DT company is expecting overall annual production growth of only 1 percent through 2014 , when its first massive natural gas development off Australia will start up . DT San Ramon , California - based company VBD last week PRP planned to increase spending by 20 percent next NN , with most of its $ 26 billion budget earmarked for exploration and production . [ ID:nN09222898 ] . Chevron shares rose 1.2 percent on Thursday to $ 89.06 , their best close since September 2008 , compared with a 0.56 percent rise in DT Chicago Board Options Exchange index of oil companies . . OIX ( Reporting by Anna Driver and Kristen Hays in Houston and Braden Reddall in San Francisco , editing by Gerald E. McCormick , John Wallace and Matthew Lewis )

text: DT U.S. NN released Bigfoot 's FBI file yesterday ( June 5 ) . PRP contains a few NN clippings , and some formal letters to and from a monster hunter in DT 1970s — leading to an examination of 15 hairs and some skin DT hunter believed came from " a Bigfoot . " PRP appears IN Peter Byrne , DT monster hunter , first wrote to DT FBI on Aug. 26 , 1976 . His note , printed on fancy letterhead reading " DT Bigfoot Information Center and Exhibition , " suggested IN DT FBI was in possession of flesh and hair belonging to a mysterious creature , possibly belonging to a " Bigfoot . " " Gentlemen , " Byrne wrote , " Will PRP kindly , to set DT record straight , once and for all , inform PRP if DT FBI , has examined hair which might be DT of a Bigfoot ; when this took place , if PRP did take place ; what DT results of DT analysis were . " [ Titanosaur Photos : Meet DT Largest Dinosaur on Record ] He did n't indicate why he suspected IN DT FBI might have done such an analysis , only IN , " from NN to NN PRP have been informed IN hair , supposedly of a Bigfoot … has been examined by DT FBI . , and with DT conclusion , as a report of DT examination , IN PRP was not possible to compare DT hair with DT of any known creature on this continent . " Byrne appears to have been concerned IN DT agency MD n't take DT Bigfoot Information Center seriously . " Please understand IN our research here is serious , " he wrote , " IN this is a serious question WDT needs answering . " He RB assured DT agency IN PRP need n't worry about his implying their involvement in his work . " An examination of hair , or DT opposite , but DT FBI . , does not in any way , as far as PRP are concerned , suggest IN DT FBI. , is associated with our project or confirms in any way DT possibility of DT existence of DT creature (s ) known as Bigfoot , " he wrote . Assistant FBI Director of DT agency 's laboratory division Jay Cochran Jr. replied two weeks later , on Sept. 10 , 1976 . " Since DT publication of DT ' Washington Environmental Atlas ' in 1975 , which referred to such examinations , PRP have received several inquiries similar to yours , " he wrote . " However , PRP have been unable to locate any references to such examinations in our files . " More than two months later , on Nov. 24 , 1976 , Byrne replied . Perhaps emboldened by DT earlier response , he asked not for information but for a favor . [ Real or Not ? DT NNP Behind 12 Unusual Sightings ] " Briefly , PRP do not often come across hair which PRP are unable to identify , and DT hair WDT PRP have now , about 15 hairs attached to a tiny piece of skin , is DT first WDT PRP have obtained in six NNS which PRP feel MD be of importance , " he wrote . He asked if Cochran " MD possibly arrange for a comparative analysis " of DT tissue to determine its origin . At DT NN all this was VBG on , Bigfoot was in DT NN . Byrne had been searching for DT creature for five NNS , supported by DT Academy of Applied NNP ( AAS ) , a small institution in Boston WDT , according to a document in DT file , RB sponsored hunts for DT Loch Ness monster . DT NNP York Times had profiled DT 50 - NN - old Byrne 's adventures in June of 1976 , calling him a " former professional hunter in Nepal who switched from tiger shooting and yeti hunting to tiger conservation and Bigfoot hunting . " " Most [ Bigfoot sightings ] are eventually discounted as insubstantial or faked , " DT NNP York Times wrote . " But a handful hold up and are given high credibility . So far Mr. Byrne , though he has never seen a Bigfoot himself , has collected DT details of 94 reported sightings WDT seem believable . EX are JJ more reports of tracks . " DT paper recounted several of those supposedly more credible sightings , and a clipping of DT article was included in DT FBI file . DT next document in DT file , in chronological order , was Cochran 's instruction to examine DT hairs Byrne passed along . " This does not represent a NN in Bureau policy , " a memorandum included in DT file NNS , in an apparent effort to justify DT decision . " DT … Laboratory Branch has a history of making its unique services and expertise available to DT Smithsonian Institution , other museums , universities and NN agencies in archeological matters and in DT interest of research and legitimate scientific inquiry . " [ DT 25 Most Mysterious Archaeological Finds on NNP ] Unfortunately for Bigfoot hunters , DT results were n't what PRP MD have hoped . In 1977 , DT lab examined DT 15 hairs . A final letter from Cochran , addressed to Howard S. Curtis , Executive Vice NN of DT AAS , read IN this : DT hairs which PRP recently delivered to DT FBI Laboratory on behalf of DT Bigfoot Information Center and Exhibition have been examined by transmitted and incident light microscopy . DT examination included a NN of morphological characteristics such as root structure , medullary structure and cuticle thickness in addition to scale casts . RB DT hairs were compared directly with hairs of known origin under a comparison microscope . PRP was concluded as a result of these examinations WDT DT hairs are of deer family origin . DT hair sample PRP submitted is being returned as an enclosure to this letter , Curtis replied March 8 , thanking Cochran and saying he'd pass DT NN on to Byrne when DT monster hunter returned from Nepal . PRP can read DT full FBI Bigfoot file here . Live NNP has reached out to Byrne for additional comment , and will update this article if he replies . • Rumor or Reality : DT Creatures of Cryptozoology

text: — Germany puts its foot down on DT e-Privacy Regulation , asking for more protection for users . — Digitization and artificial intelligence are among DT priorities of DT European Parliament 's leaders for DT next five NNS . Good morning and welcome to Morning Tech . PRP 's a JJ holiday in some EU NNS , including Belgium . But PRP 're here to keep PRP$ company if PRP 're stuck at work . LONDON TECH WEEK : Yes , PRP ’s DT NN of NN again when techies from DT British capital ( and a whole bunch of politicians ) break out DT party balloons to celebrate London ’s top spot on DT European scene . Expect NN announcements , claims of record investment and a lot of crowing IN Brexit wo n’t hurt DT U.K. digital economy . But if PRP dig a little deeper , EX are two warring factions within ' U.K. Tech ' fighting over what DT country ’s pending departure from DT European Union really means — and how DT NN ’s policies are affecting how DT local industry will grow . For more from Mark , read below or click here . Case of DT optimists : PRP do n’t have to venture far from hipster Shoreditch or well - heeled Mayfair to hear startup founders and venture capitalists tell PRP IN DT volatility created by Brexit ‘ is a great opportunity . ” And so far , DT figures show IN DT U.K. is doing just fine . DT country garnered $ 8.7 billion in venture funding last NN , according to Dealroom , DT data provider . And wherever PRP look , local ‘ unicorns ’ are being created faster than PRP can pay £ 5 for an overpriced flat white coffee near Silicon Roundabout . Case for DT pessimists : Just IN everything in divided Britain , not everyone agrees with this assessment , claiming IN lagging indicators IN venture money do n’t really tell PRP what ’s VBG on around DT country today . Instead , PRP point to a gradual fall in JJ techies showing up to work in DT country ’s digital ecosystem ( and DT ongoing development of rival hubs in Berlin and Paris ) as a telling ( leading ) indicator IN not all is well in DT NN of U.K. tech . What about DT politicians ? Glad PRP asked . Amid this techie stand - off , U.K. lawmakers are playing DT ‘ cake and eat PRP , too ’ strategy of both trying to woo NNS to DT local tech scene , while RB pushing ahead with some of DT most aggressive digital regulation anywhere in DT Western NN . Just IN a page out of DT Brexit playbook , few policymakers are yet willing to make tough decisions about how to handle DT future growth of London and DT rest of DT country ’s tech sector . DT ’s leaving JJ locals scratching their heads about how DT U.K. will continue to grow without proper leadership from those in Westminster . Talking of London Tech Week , Theresa NNP , DT outgoing U.K. prime minister announced £ 153 million in NN funding this morning focused on supporting next - generation computing technology . She RB VBD IN 2,500 places MD be made available on artificial intelligence and data conversion courses starting in 2020 , and IN a panel of local techies MD write a NN on DT country 's tech competitiveness amid DT uncertainty caused by Brexit . " If PRP are VBG to maintain our position as a JJ leader , our challenge is how PRP develop British Tech and make PRP even better , " NNP is expected to say later this morning . " PRP VBP this to be DT place everyone thinks of — and comes to — first when PRP VBP to develop their NN changing tech ideas . " COMMISSIONERS ' WHEREABOUTS : Justice Commissioner Vĕra Jourová is in Prague , where she speaks at a roundtable on Artificial Intelligence . Digital Commissioner Mariya Gabriel is in Sofia , and meets with various Bulgarian ministers . MARK YOUR CALENDAR : DT Court of Justice of DT European Union will rule on DT Google vs. Germany ’s telecoms regulator case June 13 . Judges will have to determine whether Gmail is a telecoms service . GERMANY ASKS FOR MORE PROTECTION IN E-PRIVACY : Morning Tech did not see DT NN coming . During Friday ’s Telecom Council , DT German minister VBD Berlin “ ca n’t support DT [ e - Privacy ] text at DT moment because of DT wide - ranging powers to process communications data without DT consent of DT final user . ” Pressing for a higher level of privacy protection , he VBD Germany “ rejects Article 6 at DT moment , particularly when PRP comes to localization data and compatible further processing . ” Ministers were discussing DT Romanian presidency 's progress report . Watch out for Germany ’s position paper : DT minister VBD PRP are preparing a document to feed future discussions . Ireland and DT U.K. on a different page : Ireland RB has reservations about Article 6 , but for different reasons : Dublin fears PRP is over - protective and MD hinder DT fight against child pornography ( a POLITICO investigation in March showed Facebook RB pushes DT argument in lobby meetings with DT Irish NN ) . DT U.K. RB mentioned child sexual abuse , but RB insisted on DT importance of clarifying DT interaction between e-Privacy and GDPR to avoid legal uncertainty . DT British minister asked for “ future - proof definitions ” and VBD DT scope was not entirely clear . “ PRP MD not VB this measure to take JJ broadcasting into DT definition of direct marketing , ” she VBD . DT Commission ’s ( unsurprising ) disappointment : Digital Commissioner Mariya Gabriel expressed disappointment as she wanted EU NNS to have made an agreement on DT text by now . She urged “ DT incoming Finnish presidency [ to ] tackle DT remaining points . ” Finland will take DT helm of DT EU Council in July , but already hinted PRP MD not reach a general approach on DT file . GDPR AT CJEU : A German court asked a preliminary question to DT Court of Justice of DT EU on DT scope of DT right of data access by users under DT GDPR . DT court wishes to VB whether DT right of access is “ applicable to DT committee of a parliament of a constituent NN of a Member NN WDT is responsible for processing DT petitions of citizens — namely DT Petitions Committee of DT Hesse Land Parliament . ” H/T Frederik Borgesius . ** Ready for DT two big revolutions facing JJ affairs ? 1 . A total political reset after DT 2019 EU election and 2 . DT political pressure from customer - citizens on businesses . Your JJ affairs function will become increasingly strategic to safeguard your company 's interests . To VB ready , join PRP on September 27 , 2019 in Paris at DT NNP NNP Affairs Forum . Contact PRP today at gpac@dii.eu or call PRP at +33 1 43 12 85 58 .** DIGITIZATION AND AI AMONG DT PARLIAMENT LEADERS ’ FIVE PRIORITIES : Leaders of DT European Parliament last week agreed on five areas PRP VBP DT EU to prioritize over DT next five NNS , according to DT group leaders ' agreement seen by POLITICO ’s Florian Eder . Environmental and NN issues top DT list , followed by JJ , competition policy and industrial policy ; taxation ; innovation , digitalization , artificial intelligence and consumer protection ; rule of law and fundamental rights . Austrian EPP MEPs make committee picks : DT delegation of former chancellor Sebastian Kurz , which has seven MEPs , is led by Othmar Karas . Several parliamentarians will ask for committees involved in tech regulation : Karas himself wants to be on DT Industry committee , Karoline Edtstadler on DT Civil Liberties and Legal Affairs committees , Barbara Thaler on DT Internal Market committee and Alexander Bernhuber on DT Culture committee . G20 AGREES , OR DOES PRP ? Over DT weekend , finance ministers from DT NN 's largest economies agreed to overhaul how DT likes of Google and Facebook pay taxes worldwide , a potential breakthrough in DT bitter debate about where these tech giants should pay tax . As part of DT proposals , which are expected to be finalized by DT end of next NN , NNS will now hammer out DT details , including potential divvying up DT rights to tax firms when their goods or services are sold locally , even if companies do n't have a physical presence nationally . If DT still does n't work , governments MD then be able to levy a JJ minimum tax rate . At first , PRP 's hard not to see this as a victory for France ( and DT NNP Kingdom ) , both NNS WDT have pushed ahead with their own local ( digital revenue ) taxes because of DT lack of a consensus , either across DT EU or globally . Speaking at DT G20 conference , France 's Bruno Le Maire VBD : " PRP have a JJ JJ model based on digital activities and based on DT sale and exchange and use of massive data . ” But , but , but : DT NNP NNPS still remains opposed to such digital taxes , claiming IN PRP represent unfair taxation against its tech giants , whereas other NNS ' JJ firms ( IN Germany 's automakers ) VBP a free pass under DT proposed JJ regime . With more than a NN to VB before these rules are supposed to come into force , expect a heavy lobbying fight to either VB down DT digital tax proposals , or efforts to extend them to other parts of DT JJ economy ( where other NNS ' firms dominate ) . Yes , DT G20 is moving ahead . But DT does n't mean DT fight is over . TELECOM MINISTERS ’ WISHLIST : Telecom ministers highlighted cybersecurity , artificial intelligence and fair competition as priorities for DT next five NNS , in their conclusions adopted at Friday 's Telecoms Council . National governments VBD : " Europe ’s cybersecurity capacity should be reinforced in order to protect its digital infrastructures , products , services and users , and its JJ competitiveness and digital sovereignty . " PRP called for regional hubs on cybersecurity to boost " technological and industrial capacity . " DT text RB mentioned DT " importance of transparency , fairness , accountability and responsibility in DT use of algorithms , so IN online platforms across DT EU operate in a transparent and predictable manner . " MACRON TALKS 'SMART REGULATION ' WITH TWITTER CEO : DT French NN Emmanuel Macron met with Jack Dorsey Friday in Paris to discuss DT G7 Call to Action and Twitter 's efforts on content regulation . " NNS VBP more safety , more privacy , more trust on DT web . PRP VBP their lives protected and democracy preserved . PRP are willing to make Twitter a safer place and I share this goal . I count on PRP [ Jack Dorsey ] to deliver together on smart regulation , transparency , data ownership , " Macron tweeted after DT meeting . Dorsey VBD ( in French ) he MD continue working towards a " safer internet . " DT Élysée palace did not reply to a request for comment . MICROSOFT CUTS DEAL WITH FRENCH TAX AUTHORITIES : DT U.S. company agreed last NN to pay €350 million in back taxes to cover DT 2010 - 2012 period , according to French NN . French authorities made similar deals with Amazon and Apple . “ Neither [ DT ministry of economy ] nor Microsoft have officially communicated on DT agreement , ” ZDNet added . DT RUSSIA EDITION : Russia ’s telecoms regulator VBD nine major VPNs MD soon be blocked because PRP refused to deny access to sites featuring on DT country 's national blacklist , Torrent Freak reports . Kaspersky Secure Connection , however , agreed to comply , DT regulator ’s chief VBD . Russian disinformation draws ads on YouTube : Researchers found IN 14 YouTube channels linked to Russia and spreading fake NN generated billions of views and millions of dollars in ad revenues . RB , videos from those channels were not labeled as NN - sponsored , despite pledges from Google ’s YouTube to flag such content . Read more on Reuters . CHIFFRE DU JOUR : €55 billion . DT ’s how much more DT rolling out of 5G networks in Europe MD cost without Chinese vendors Huawei and ZTE , according to a NN by GSMA .
