Email pro@politico.eu with DT code " TECH " for a complimentary trial . UK ca n’t make up its mind on tech Digital Politics is a column about DT JJ intersection of technology and DT NN of politics . LONDON — EX 's a lot Britain can't agree on . Brexit . Who should be DT country 's next prime minister . Jeremy Corbyn's leadership of DT Labour Party . Add to DT list : What to do about tech . This week , London — still Europe 's tech capital despite DT ongoing political uncertainty — will play host to its annual " tech week " — part marketing ploy , part cheerleading fest to showcase what DT British capital , and DT rest of DT country , has to offer when PRP comes to glitzy startups , venture capital investment and NN support for DT digital economy . Yet in Westminster 's halls of power , DT hipster mecca of East London and DT well - heeled offices of Mayfair , two rival factions are bickering over DT NN of DT U.K.'s tech sector — and how PRP will fare once DT country eventually leaves DT European Union . On CD side are DT optimists , those who cite DT country 's record tech investment figures since PRP voted for Brexit in 2016 as a sign IN everything is VBG great . PRP dismiss DT current political impasse as a mere speed bump on DT road to DT U.K. putting tech at DT center of its future industrial strategy . On DT other side stand DT pessimists , who fret about DT gradual slowdown of highly educated ( European ) tech migrants rocking up to fill much - needed jobs in both startups and legacy tech companies . On top of DT , DT NN 's aggressive push to regulate DT industry — everything from proposed JJ digital taxes on Big Tech to greater policing of NNS 's social NN chatter — has raised eyebrows about its future support for local tech . DT stakes MD not be higher . DT U.K. NN has largely bet its JJ future on DT country 's burgeoning digital sector . And so far , PRP can't make up its mind whether to double down on its assistance for local firms and international giants IN Google and Facebook — be PRP through hundreds of millions of pounds of JJ funding or high - profile digital skills programs — or fall in line with politicians worldwide and DT growing " techlash " against all things digital . " PRP really need to attract investment funds to make sure DT tech sector keeps growing , " VBD Luca Schiavoni , a digital regulation analysts at Assembly Research , a consultancy firm in London . " But at DT same NN , PRP 's really difficult to run into someone in Westminster who believes DT tech sector does n't need more regulation . " Surely PRP does n't have to be a binary choice between pro-industry JJ policies and arguably CD of DT toughest regulatory clampdowns anywhere in DT Western NN ? But just IN DT other hot - button socio- JJ topics now confronting DT British NN , what to " do " about tech needs an answer . And PRP needs CD quickly . What 's muddying DT waters is how DT local tech scene has faired since DT 2016 Brexit referendum . Depending on whom PRP talk to , DT country 's digital economy is either full steam ahead or rocketing toward a cliff edge . Figures published on Monday by TechNation ( a quasi - NN entity ) paint a rosy picture , with U.K. venture capital investment last NN hitting $ 8.7 billion — easily outmatching France and Germany to claim top spot in European tech funding . DT number of U.K. startups worth at least $ 1 billion in 2018 RB reached 13 , more than all similar fledgling firms in Germany , Israel and Sweden combined . On top of DT , local lawmakers have earmarked hundreds of millions of additional funding through DT British Business Bank ( another quasi - NN institution ) to help local techies . Industry veterans — JJ of whom invested locally , so have skin in DT game to play up DT positives — RB highlight London 's continued ability to attract top talent as reasons why Westminster 's disjointed approach to DT sector should not be cause for concern . " DT U.K. is not DT only country having a problem with politics , " VBD Martin Mignot , a French partner at Index Ventures , a London - based fund whose investments include Transferwise , a successful local foreign currency exchange startup , and Net - A - Porter , DT British e-commerce giant . " But once PRP 've got DT basics IN rule of law and functioning democracy , startups are n't VBG to do badly or well just because of DT political situation . " Not everyone is so sanguine . While DT U.K. NN has increased DT number of visas for foreign nationals looking to start a tech ( or other ) business , JJ in industry are n't convinced IN DT current conveyor belt of international talent will continue when DT country finally leaves DT 28 - nation bloc . Britain has already lost its top spot among EU destinations as DT place to VB for DT region 's tech workers , according to data from LinkedIn . In 2017 , 14.9 percent of all Europe 's tech talent headed to DT U.K. in search of work , compared with 13.8 percent of workers traveling to Germany , DT second most popular country . But last NN , Germany pulled even with Britain , with both garnering 14.6 percent of all EU digital nomads , while France — championed by its NN , Emmanuel Macron — has done all WDT PRP can to knock DT U.K. off its perch as DT region 's top digital ecosystem . PRP 's not just talent WDT MD be drying up . A recent survey by KPMG and IHS Markit , two consultancies , shows IN JJ output from DT U.K.'s tech sector had begun to slow , though PRP 's still expanding each quarter at a faster rate than other sectors , and wages to attract and hold onto talent have skyrocketed , hurting businesses ' overall bottom lines . For Giles Derrington , associate director of policy at TechUK , a local trade body whose members include JJ giants IN Google and Apple as well as U.K. players IN chip designer ARM Holdings and Sage , DT digital accountancy provider , this uncertainty is making PRP harder for companies to justify future investment in Britain — particularly when DT chances of a no -deal Brexit are on DT rise . " DT U.K. has always been an obvious center for investment into DT EU , " he VBD . " Now , DT 's a lot harder case to make for businesses . PRP do n't have a clear sense of what DT rule of law will look IN in DT U.K. for DT foreseeable future . "

text: PRP all started when Denver Riggleman , an Air Force veteran and distillery owner - turned Republican Congressional nominee in Virginia , posted two Bigfoot drawings on his Instagram account . A shrugging Bigfoot , with a black censored bar covering DT genitals , and Riggleman ’s face digitally superimposed on DT shoulders of another naked North American mythological creature . text: As he became DT first person to set foot on DT moon , Neil Armstrong announced , “ DT ’s CD small step for [ a ] man , CD giant leap for mankind . ” This exhibition celebrates DT fiftieth anniversary of DT remarkable achievement as DT last step in a long series WDT stretches back through DT centuries to DT beginnings of DT modern scientific understanding of our place in DT universe . On display are landmarks in DT history of NN from Houghton Library ’s collections — such as first editions of Copernicus , Galileo , and Newton — together with rarely exhibited highlights from a private spaceflight collection , including artifacts used during DT Apollo 11 mission and on DT moon itself by astronauts Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin . Together , these objects illuminate DT path of research and discovery WDT made Apollo 11 possible . DT exhibition is free and open to DT NN . Closes August 3 . DT exhibition is accompanied by a commemorative catalog which focuses on DT loaned items only and is RB available for free online here . Join curator John Overholt for a guided tour of DT exhibition to learn about DT ways early modern NN inspired and made possible DT historic Apollo 11 moon landing . • Saturday June 8 , 2:00 - 2:45 PM , followed by a screening of Moon Medley : Moon -Related Short Films from Around DT NNP at DT Harvard Film Archive , 3:00 PM ( estimated running NN 70 min ) , 24 Quincy Street • Saturday July 20 , 4:30 - 5:15 PM , followed by a screening of DT Right Stuff ( 1983 ) at DT Harvard Film Archive , 5:30 PM ( running NN 193 min ) Tours are free and open to DT NN . Reservation not required . In collaboration with Houghton Library , DT Harvard Film Archive presents films about human exploration of space . DT HFA ’s Weekend Matinee series will highlight moon - themed films appropriate for space travelers of all ages . • Saturday June 8 , 3:00 PM , Moon Medley : a compilation of Moon - related short films from around DT NN , including A Trip to DT Moon ( 1902 ) , live musical accompaniment ( estimated running NN 70 min ) . $ 5 Weekend Matinee Admission or Free with Cambridge NNP Library Card . text: JJ dream of summiting DT NN ’s tallest peak , Mount Everest , which soars to 29,035 feet and straddles DT Nepal - NNP border . Sir Edmund Hillary and Tensing Norgay first accomplished DT feat in 1953 via Nepal ’s South Col , which remains CD of DT most common routes today . DT Nepali NN relies on DT tourism revenue generated by Everest , and in 2019 PRP issued a record 381 permits to climbers and a nearly equal number to local Sherpas , who set up DT camps and lead DT climbers up DT mountain . ( Here 's why DT NN 's most daunting mountains inspire PRP . ) Besides DT glory of standing on DT roof of DT NN , climbing Everest comes with a significant amount of controversy . Over DT NNS , DT large number of climbers and support staff have left massive amounts of trash and waste on DT mountain , though in recent NNS DT Nepali NN and private organisations have taken steps to clean up DT area around base camp . This NN critics cited DT large number of permits as a possible contributor to some of DT season 's 11 deaths on DT mountain . DT large number of NNS seeking to make DT summit combined with fewer windows of favourable weather created traffic jams on DT route to DT summit . ( Read more stories about adventurers on Mount Everest . ) Until conditions improve at Mount Everest , beat DT crowds and help preserve DT environment by looking to other epic climbs around DT NN . Here are nine of our favorites . In Mongolia , PRP ’s easy for a traveller to be quickly swept away by DT endless green steppes , DT heartiness of DT Kazakh nomads , and DT rolling landscapes WDT define DT Altai Mountains . This makes DT trek to Mount Khuiten as enjoyable and scenic as DT climb itself . DT mountain straddles DT corners of Russia , NNP , and Mongolia . To reach PRP , trekkers must cross a golden , vast , and barren landscape WDT is CD of DT last remote regions on NNP . This remarkable journey is enhanced by DT gentle hospitality of DT Kazakh nomads . Flat - topped Kilimanjaro is Africa ’s highest mountain . Reaching DT top of Kilimanjaro is exhilarating . Take DT Machame Route up so PRP can see DT region ’s wonderful animals and birds . Then PRP ’ll begin DT trek across DT Shira Plateau through DT Grand Barranco Canyon and on to DT top . If all goes as planned , PRP ’ll reach Stella Point with a chance to continue around Kibo ’s rim to Uhuru . DT highlight is Machu Picchu , DT famed lost city of DT Inca WDT was discovered in 1911 by Hiram Bingham . Then continue your trek to what was DT heart and soul of DT Inca Empire , Cusco . In DT shape of a roughly chiseled rock pyramid , this peak serves as a defining geographical landmark . For JJ climbers , ascending DT Matterhorn , DT birthplace of DT sport of mountaineering , represents a return to DT purist traditions of climbing . Elbrus is a large , double - coned volcano , whose summits vary by about 65 feet . For DT climber with moderate skills , DT highest mountain in Europe has great appeal because PRP presents a strenuous , yet rewarding climb . DT mountain ’s location affords visitors excellent opportunities to see DT region ’s large melting pot of ethnic groups , such as Turkish , Georgian , Azeri , and Russian . DT first is 18,406 feet tall , while DT second is 17,159 feet tall . Ascents of these two volcanoes are by far DT most attractive climbs in Mexico . text: As an independent Scientist and JJ researcher since 1994 , I have been working ( ) , on a completely JJ theory for circulation within humans , animals and plants . My discovery was initially in trees . In 1995 , I demonstrated DT JJ paradigm to Forestry Commission NNS and journalists , causing NN to flow up a single length of open ended tubing at a cliff in Brixham , Devon , to a height of 78 feet and demolished a three hundred NN old law of physics ( Torricelli ) . DT discovery is founded upon gravity and evaporation . Salts and sugars are concentrated as a result of evaporation , making DT fluids heavier , gravity draws DT heavy fluids down and DT less dense fluids are drawn up in a return flow ( for every action EX must be a reaction ) . Anything WDT interferes with evaporation ( damp / humidity ) , compromises circulation , when circulation within DT human body is compromised , PRP causes lethargy and affects feet and hands first ! Since 1994 , my efforts have been concentrated on helping NNS with debilitating illnesses by tilting DT bed in an inclined position , ( head raised 5 - 8 degrees to DT horizontal . Gravity has been shown to be significant in reversing neurological and non-neuro conditions , non-more compelling than DT recent Carlton TV NN coverage of a man walking , after ten NNS of paralysis due to a spinal cord injury . ( Reporter : Tim Iredale , Carlton TV NNP , Devon . ) This discovery is simple , true and repeatable and has DT most profound implications for DT benefit of mankind ! Yet , NNS , ministers , charities and most of DT JJ profession chose to ignore , what is after all basic , pure NN . How long can a scientific truth be ignored ? Once gravity is accepted as DT primary cause of circulation , PRP becomes clear to understand why foot and mouth NN affects DT flesh around DT hooves of grazing animals . PRP is not a coincidence IN hooves , tusks and even finger and toenails occur where PRP do . PRP are merely disposal sites for heavy substances , which arrive , where PRP do because of gravity ! PRP is no coincidence IN PRP , DT most vertical of all species , are DT most successful ! Gravity is evolution ! DT specific gravity of urine for instance was used to determine whether gravity driven circulation MD be taking place in humans and animals , In a similar process . For example respiration causes NN to evaporate from DT lungs and respiratory tract . Fluids remaining in DT body contain minerals and must therefore be concentrated by DT loss of mineral free NN ( evaporation ) . Gravity causes DT heavy solution to be drawn back through DT lining of DT lungs and respiratory tract and down through DT vessels in DT body , carrying dissolved oxygen with PRP . Concentrated solutions arrive at DT bladder via DT kidneys where PRP are excreted in DT urine . However DT kidneys are not 100 % efficient and some minerals arrive in DT lowest anatomical extremities , solidifying as finger and toenails or horses hooves etc . Clippings of which sink when dropped into NN . 5 degree to DT horizontal head down tilt over CD week decreased DT specific gravity of urine to a near zero reading . 5 degree to DT horizontal head up tilt over CD week significantly increased DT specific gravity of urine when compared to horizontal bedrest . Gravity does indeed play an important roll in renal function ! Toxins leave DT body more efficiently when DT human body is correctly aligned with DT direction of gravity . DT physiology of pig is very close to humans . So close in fact IN pig is now used to cultivate replacement organs for humans . PRP MD deduce IN JJ of todays illnesses affecting PRP MD RB be affecting pig and visa - versa . In fact almost all of DT drugs used in veterinary practice today have a human equivalent which in JJ NNS is identical to those prescribed to animals in all but DT name of DT drug . ( See Page 5 NN NN ) PRP is RB worth remembering IN JJ of these drugs have been tested on animals before entering DT £ multi-billion consumer marketplaces , which currently satisfies DT JJ and scientific industries . Towards DT end of DT NN 2000 , while driving past a pig farm on three occasions , I noticed IN DT animals were walking around ankle deep in NN , mud , urine and excrement . Due undoubtedly to DT excessive rainfall Britain was experiencing at DT NN and I remember thinking to myself IN these unfortunate animals were exposed to environmental factors WDT MD not be healthy to say DT least . If NNS were correct about DT physiological similarities between pigs and humans , then these pigs were in real trouble due to DT appalling weather conditions PRP were exposed to . Take a thousand NNS , strip them naked and leave them to face DT same elements and NN logged fields PRP have seen here in Britain for six months and see how JJ of PRP survive . Of course this MD be considered inhumane and MD never happen to humans , but PRP is happening !- all DT NN to pigs and other farm animals ? Remember IN long soak in DT bath or spending too long at DT swimming baths . Toes feet and fingers WDT looked IN PRP belonged to someone much older , all wrinkled and horrible . Soldiers on manoeuvres in tropical regions face foot rot due to DT wet and humid conditions . Jungle fever , leprosy , typhoid and JJ other diseases abound in such environments . Or do PRP ? MD PRP be IN DT adverse environment reduces our resistance to JJ of these illnesses ? Wet weather certainly affects our NN and is bore out by DT sudden increase in deaths among DT elderly every Autumn and Winter . Sudden Infant and adult deaths occur more frequently and influenza outbreaks , which have wiped out JJ thousands of NNS , are well documented .
